DLC_MOD_2NDPLAYTHROUGHBOOST.moddesc: Contains a few quality of life mods in a single download. For use with mod manager.

DLC_MOD_32BITRESOURCES.moddesc: A very simple mod that modifies the games files to allow for resource gathering up to the 2 billion 32-bit integer maximum. More than enough resources for ANY playthrough.

DLC_MOD_ABM.moddesc: Adds 6 Breather Mask options for the default N7 Helmet.

DLC_MOD_ADEPTOVERHAUL.moddesc: Class abilities makeover that I made for my game and decided to share

DLC_MOD_AFSHIR.moddesc: Adds several hairstyle conversions for custom Female Shepard in Mass Effect 2 Legendary Edition

DLC_MOD_ALEXISLYSTHEIAFORKASUMIPARTY.modname: Alexis, Lysandra, and Theia for Kasumi Party
DLC_MOD_ALEXISLYSTHEIAFORKASUMIPARTY.moddesc: Batch of outfits that contains dresses and skirts from Sims CC Creators and Original Sims Content as buyable Casual Clothes for FemShep LE2

DLC_MOD_ALLIANCE_CONSISTENCY.moddesc: Makes Admiral Steven Hackett and optionally Admiral David Anderson use their unique dress blues from Mass Effect 3. Additionally, you can use Anderson's face from Mass Effect either with his dress blues from Mass Effect 1 or those from 3. Additionally, Anderson's picture of Kaidan is replaced by that of Kahlee Sanders.

DLC_MOD_ALLNEWADEPT.moddesc: Class abilities makeover that I made for my game and decided to share

DLC_MOD_ALOVLE2.modname: A Lot of Videos for LE2
DLC_MOD_ALOVLE2.moddesc: ALOV is an exhaustive and comprehensive 4K 60fps video overhaul project powered by AI and augmented with faithful in-game remakes, error corrections and other misc improvements.

DLC_MOD_ALOVRELAYJUMP.modname: ALOV for LE2 - Relay Jump Remaster
DLC_MOD_ALOVRELAYJUMP.moddesc: A completely new 4K relay jump video for LE2, combining a new shot from the incredible plasmaFLOW with ME3 footage.

DLC_MOD_ALOVUWLE2.moddesc:
This mod optimises ALOV for ultrawide monitors by scaling, reframing and in some instances recreating in-game footage in 21:9.

ALOV (A Lot of Videos) is an exhaustive and comprehensive 4K 60fps video overhaul project for Mass Effect LE, powered by AI and augmented with faithful in-game remakes, error corrections and other misc. improvem

DLC_MOD_ALOVUW_RELAY_JUMP.moddesc:
This mod optimises ALOV for ultrawide monitors by scaling, reframing and in some instances recreating in-game footage in 21:9.

ALOV (A Lot of Videos) is an exhaustive and comprehensive 4K 60fps video overhaul project for Mass Effect LE, powered by AI and augmented with faithful in-game remakes, error corrections and other misc. improvem

DLC_MOD_ALTCREWCASUAL_CH2.modname: Alternate Squad Casuals for Casual Hubs 2
DLC_MOD_ALTCREWCASUAL_CH2.moddesc: Alternate casual outfits for Casual Hubs 2. Grunt, Jacob, Kasumi, Mordin, Thane, and Zaeed available.

DLC_MOD_ALTPERSUASION.moddesc: Roll the dice for Persuasion, and be ready to make some hard choices. Paragade/Renegon friendly. Or a cheat option to make Charm/Intimidate dialog lines always available.

DLC_MOD_ALT_ARM_GARRUS_LE2.modname: Alternate Armour Options for Garrus - LE2
DLC_MOD_ALT_ARM_GARRUS_LE2.moddesc: Replacers for Garrus's red and blue alternate appearance pack armour. Undamaged armor including his regular blue armour and two other recolours.

DLC_MOD_AMMOPOWERICON.moddesc: Removes ammo power icons on weapons and optionally the holograms encasing them in ME2 and ME3.

DLC_MOD_ANPCSLE2.moddesc: Outfits several NPCs in arms and custom armor.

DLC_MOD_APARTMENT.moddesc: Ports the Pinnacle Station apartment to LE2, complete with an overhauled exterior.

DLC_MOD_APOLLO.moddesc: This mod restores the cut ambiance dialogue about Neil's Armstrong Spacesuit being on display at Donovan's Hock vault, during the quest Kasumi: Stealing Memory. Moreover, it adds an appropriate model to reflect the presence of such historical item.

DLC_MOD_ARIA.moddesc: Makes Aria consistent with her looks from the Omega DLC, both for her outfit as well as facial features, providing updated models and textures.

DLC_MOD_ARKHAMKNIGHTARMORFORMALESHEPARDL.modname: Arkham Knight Armor For Male Shepard LE2
DLC_MOD_ARKHAMKNIGHTARMORFORMALESHEPARDL.moddesc:
Report In All of You! This is Militia Commander Shepard

Ports the Arkham Knight Armor from Batman Arkham Knight For Male Shepard

DLC_MOD_ARM_SHP_ME3.modname: More Modular Armour Parts for LE2
DLC_MOD_ARM_SHP_ME3.moddesc: Adds ME3's Armax Arsenal, Ariake Technolgies and N7 armour parts to LE2's modular armour system

DLC_MOD_ASARIDASH.moddesc: Quickly move between your foes with well-known ME3-style evade, personalized for your character - an Asari Dash for biotics, and a Soldier Roll for the others.

DLC_MOD_ASHARM.moddesc: Adds Ashley's Battle armor and Casual outfit

DLC_MOD_ASHHAIR.moddesc: Replacing the default FShep or PROCustomShort02 hair with LE3 Ash Hair

DLC_MOD_ASLE2.moddesc: Some options to replace the default Femshep with!

DLC_MOD_ASMLE2.moddesc: Equips your squad in full armor and helmets.

DLC_MOD_ASSKRIOS.moddesc: Gives Thane the APP outfit during his recruitment mission.

DLC_MOD_AUC_LE2.moddesc: Backports the Mass Effect 3 Cerberus/Alliance fatigues and armour/officer uniforms to Cerberus/Alliance personnel throughout LE2, as well as adds 3 new casual outfits for Shepard.

DLC_MOD_AUTOCOVEROFF.moddesc: Are you sick of getting in cover when you don't want to? Install this mod and to get cover you would need click button.

DLC_MOD_A_BETTER_JACOB.moddesc: This mod simply makes Jacob have his Mass Effect Galaxy Skills !!!

DLC_MOD_BARASHIRT.moddesc: Adds t-shirt casual outfits for male Shepard.

DLC_MOD_BASICENEMIESLE2.moddesc: Removes Armor and Shield bonuses granted to enemies at Hardcore and Insanity. Doubles enemy health at same difficulties. In effect removes protections from basic enemies and doubles their health making squad powers more useful while basic enemies are still more durable.

DLC_MOD_BATMANV804ARMORFORMSLE2.modname: Batman V8.04 Armor For Male Shepard LE2
DLC_MOD_BATMANV804ARMORFORMSLE2.moddesc: Time to put this suit to the test...

DLC_MOD_BDGOWNVHANDKDKASUMIPARTY.modname: BeltedDress, GownVTwist, and HandkerchiefDress for Kasumi Party
DLC_MOD_BDGOWNVHANDKDKASUMIPARTY.moddesc: Bunch of outfits from Sims 4 imported as store buyable Casual Clothes for femShepard for LE2

DLC_MOD_BETTERCREWABDUCTIONS.moddesc: "Crew Abductions - Plot Hole Fixed" implements a shockingly simple fix to a decade-old case of poor writing, during which Shepard undertakes an unknown and unnamed mission that is never established or elaborated upon, all for the purpose of getting the crew abducted.

DLC_MOD_BETTER_GRENADES_LE2.moddesc: Mod that removes Flashbang and Inferno grenades from shared cooldown, plus some small tweaks for Inferno Grenade to make it more interesting and useful power.

DLC_MOD_BIOTICDESTROYER.moddesc: Class abilities makeover that I made for my game and decided to share

DLC_MOD_BLONDEMIRANDA.moddesc:
Changes Miranda to be a blonde!

Just as nature always intended her to be!

DLC_MOD_BLUEARCHONVISOR.moddesc: The Archon Visor, now in blue.

DLC_MOD_BLUE_HANAR_LE2.moddesc: Makes Hanar blue across the trilogy

DLC_MOD_BONUSBONUSPOWERS.moddesc: Bonus Bonus Powers for LE2 has arrived. Add and remove powers from Shepard between missions to your heart's content, all in game. All regular and bonus powers are available. No need to open package editor to build a custom class or save editor to add multiple bonus powers.

DLC_MOD_BONUSES.modname: Alternative behaviour of LE2 NG bonuses
DLC_MOD_BONUSES.moddesc: Alternative behaviour of LE2 new game bonuses.

DLC_MOD_BONUS_TALENT_FIX.modname: DLC Bonus Talent Fix for ME2 Legendary Edition
DLC_MOD_BONUS_TALENT_FIX.moddesc: Fixes bugs with the 3 DLC Bonus Talents (Inferno Grenade, Flashbang Grenade, and Stasis) in Mass Effect 2 Legendary Edition

DLC_MOD_BOT_LE2.moddesc: A random collection of mods (and ports) I made for myself and decided to share.

DLC_MOD_BREATHER4THANE.moddesc: Replacing the ugly hood that is covering Thane's gorgeous face, because his eyes are too beautiful to be hidden. Only for the default and loyalty armors. I didn't want to do the AAP with risk for conflict with No Headgear.

DLC_MOD_BROOKHAIR.moddesc: Give Brooks hair to default femshep.

DLC_MOD_BROOKSHR.moddesc: Adds Brooks' hair as a hairstyle option to Mass Effect 2 and 3 Legendary Edition.

DLC_MOD_BROWSRESTORATION.moddesc: Restores eyebrow and facial hair appearance in LE2

DLC_MOD_BRRAPMOD.moddesc: Restores the original camera data from the original trilogy and nothing else.

DLC_MOD_BUFFED_ARMORY.moddesc: Tired of using Kestrel for every Insanity run? This mod may be for you. This mod adds a buffed copy of LE2's in-game armor pieces: helmets, torso, shoulders, arms and legs. (Not full suits). The pieces use a standard set of stats freeing the player to chose their armor pieces however they wish.

DLC_MOD_BUTT.moddesc: Restores Miranda's various butt shots, from OT, in LE2.

DLC_MOD_BUTTONS.moddesc: Trigger "ambush" events with a button press. Allows players to delay Horizon, the Collector Ship, Arrival message and the Crew Abduction until a time of their choosing.

DLC_MOD_C5_NUW.moddesc: Nearly Unrestricted Weapons (NUW) allows Shepard to equip any five of the six weapon types available in LE2, regardless of class, by allowing Shepard to unequip weapons. Never reinstall a weapon mod again.

DLC_MOD_CALIBRATIONSAGARRUSANDTALIENHANC.modname: Calibrations A Garrus  And Tali Enhancement
DLC_MOD_CALIBRATIONSAGARRUSANDTALIENHANC.moddesc: Tweaks to our Favorite pair from the trilogy!!!

DLC_MOD_CAMERAMODE.moddesc: Contains a few quality of life mods in a single download. For use with mod manager.

DLC_MOD_CAM_LE2.moddesc: CAM is the successor to Classic Heatsinks and Universal Thermal Clips. Incorporating both mods and new features such as Omni Ammo. The Omni Ammo setting generates new Thermal Clips/Ammo from your Omni-Tool over time during a mission.

DLC_MOD_CARNIFEXAMMO.moddesc: Doubles the amount of spare ammo the Carnifex has so it's usable.

DLC_MOD_CASUALHUBS.moddesc: Allows Shepard and squadmates to wear casual clothes on the Citadel, Omega, and Illium, and gives certain squadmates casual appearances on the Normandy.

DLC_MOD_CASUALS_AS_ARMOUR.moddesc: This mod adds casual outfits for both BroShep and Femshep to the armour section of the locker. So you can go on Illium in a hoodie for example.

DLC_MOD_CATSUITS.moddesc: Adds several new Cat Suits for female Shepard. LE2 only.

DLC_MOD_CAUC_LE2.moddesc: Backports the Mass Effect 3 Cerberus/Alliance fatigues and officer uniforms to Cerberus/Alliance personnel throughout LE2.

DLC_MOD_CDNE.moddesc: Incorporates the defunct Cerberus Daily News articles written by Bioware back into the game as emails.

DLC_MOD_CERBERUSLADIES.moddesc: This mod restores the correct uniforms to most of the female Cerberus crew members of the Normandy that Bioware never patched. It also includes the option to give Kelly her hair from the original Mass Effect 2.

DLC_MOD_CERB_SCIENCE.moddesc: Collection of NPC mods for LE2

DLC_MOD_CERW.moddesc: Backports the Cerberus manufactured weapons from Mass Effect 3 to Mass Effect 2.

DLC_MOD_CHILDRENOFRANNOCH.moddesc: An extensive visual overhaul for quarians

DLC_MOD_CICHOLO.moddesc: Forces Normandy, Galaxy Map and Private Terminal Holos in CIC to always be on in ME2 and ME3, regardless of your position.

DLC_MOD_CITTEST.moddesc: Expands the Human Embassy by allowing you to explore outside of just Anderson's office.

DLC_MOD_CLASSICARMORS.moddesc: Ports classic Light, Medium and Heavy Armors from LE1 to LE2.

DLC_MOD_CLASSICCUSTOMARMORS.moddesc: Ports the Light, Medium and Heavy Armors from LE1 to LE2 and LE3.

DLC_MOD_CLASSICHEATSINKS_LE2.moddesc: Restores LE1 style heatsink systems to all regular weapons.

DLC_MOD_CLASSICHEATSINKS_LE2_CERBERUS.modname: Cerberus Weapons Patch for Classic Heatsinks (LE2)
DLC_MOD_CLASSICHEATSINKS_LE2_CERBERUS.moddesc: Restores LE1 style heatsink systems to all regular weapons.

DLC_MOD_CLASSICHEATSINKS_LE2_CLASSIC.modname: Classic Weapons Patch for Classic Heatsinks (LE2)
DLC_MOD_CLASSICHEATSINKS_LE2_CLASSIC.moddesc: Restores LE1 style heatsink systems to all regular weapons.

DLC_MOD_CLASSICSQUADMOD_LE2.moddesc: Squadmates gain Full Armor and Helmets for combat. Regular Casual wear when in the Normandy. Armor replacements for VS and Liara available. Shepard has optional casual wear updates and ME1 style armor replacements available.

DLC_MOD_CLASSICWEAPONS.moddesc: Adds 36 Weapons from Mass Effect 1 to Mass Effect 2.

DLC_MOD_CLEAR_MNEMONIC_VISOR_LE2.moddesc: [LE2] Gives Shepard back the ability to see what's in front of them while wearing the Mnemonic Visor.

DLC_MOD_CLERICHOODIE_MSHEPLE2.moddesc: Adds a new hoodie outfit for Male Shepard to wear using a variety of Destiny 2, vanilla, and Sims 4 CC assets. Comes in three mesh variants (Fatigue Pants, Techwear Pants - Sims 4 CC by Darte77, Spacer Pants) with four logos/colors each: N7, Alliance, Cerberus and Spectre.

DLC_MOD_CLERIC_BOMBER_MSHEPLE2.moddesc: Adds a bomber jacket outfit for Male Shepard using a mixture of FFXV and Vanilla ME3 assets. Two mesh variants (Jeans or Fatigues) with four jackets each are provided (N7, Spectre, Cerberus, and Alliance).

DLC_MOD_CLERIC_TSHIRTS_LE2.modname: Cleric's T-Shirt Outfits for Male Shepard (LE2)
DLC_MOD_CLERIC_TSHIRTS_LE2.moddesc: Adds a few T-Shirts to Male Shepard's locker using a mixture of vanilla and Fortnite assets.

DLC_MOD_CNLE2.moddesc: Overhauls many NPCs to add or change custom armor, weapons, outfits, and even facial appearances.

DLC_MOD_COATSJACKETSMALESHEPLE2.moddesc: Adds outfits with long coats & jackets to the locker for Male Shepard with content from Sims 4 CC Creators: Darte77 & Lazyeyelids

DLC_MOD_CODEX.moddesc: Ever since the original Mass Effect 2, several Codex Entries have been missing due to lack of implementation or wrongly set flags. The Legendary Edition finally restored the entry for the M-920 Cain, but still did not fix Thermal Clips, Grenade Launcher and Drell. This mod restores them at their appropriate place. They are fully voiced.

DLC_MOD_CODEXIMAGES.moddesc: Updates the outdated images from the codex/user interfaces and replaces them with new pictures taken with LE assets.

DLC_MOD_COLORS.moddesc: This mod adds 595 additional new colors to Tint 1, Tint 2, and Pattern Colors in Shepard's Armor Locker.

DLC_MOD_COMBATRADAR2.moddesc: Restores the Combat Radar to the regular HUD.

DLC_MOD_CONRAD.moddesc: Conrad Verner Remembers solves the Conrad Verner bug in which the incorrect stage is set, and he always believes you pointed a gun at him on Mass Effect 1. Since a fix on Mass Effect 1 is not implemented yet, a special, in-universe mechanic has been introduced to fix the import before meeting Conrad.

DLC_MOD_COUNCILRENAME.moddesc: Simple fix that changes all the councilors misspelled names to their actual name to have continuity from ME1LE.

DLC_MOD_CROUCH.moddesc: This mod adds the unused Crouch command to a button of your choice with controller support.

DLC_MOD_CSTNT_QRN_SUIT_F_TALI.modname: Daughter of the Raya - Tali Suit Overhaul
DLC_MOD_CSTNT_QRN_SUIT_F_TALI.moddesc: Replaces Tali's vanilla suit with one representing her more like her quarian brothers and sisters.

DLC_MOD_CUC_LE2.moddesc: Backports the Mass Effect 3 Cerberus/Alliance fatigues and armour/officer uniforms to Cerberus/Alliance personnel throughout LE2, as well as adds 3 new casual outfits for Shepard.

DLC_MOD_CUSTOMFEMSHEP.moddesc: My custom female Shepard. Not a save game or sliders, but a fully custom head mesh.

DLC_MOD_CWFLIPPEDKUWASHIIVISOR.moddesc: Adds a mirrored Kuwashii visor. Identical stats, acquired when you buy the original.

DLC_MOD_CWUNMARKEDARMORPARTS.moddesc: Removes the N7 markings from the modular armor pieces and headgear in the game.

DLC_MOD_DADDY.moddesc: Ronald Taylor's Fate Fix properly records the choice done with Jacob's father on his loyalty mission. Although the bug is noticeable if you pay close attention to one specific line in Mass Effect 2; it is especially a noticeable BUG in Mass Effect 3. Fixing it in 2 will ensure both Shepard and Jacob remember what they chose.

DLC_MOD_DADDYISSUES.moddesc: This mod tweaks Ronald Taylor's appearance to make him look more like his son Jacob.

DLC_MOD_DARKVANGUARD.moddesc: Missing DA2 magic? Well, now you can have a Bloodmage/ Force Mage build for Shepard! I made this for my Renegade Male Shepard and am sharing if others might like the build too.

DLC_MOD_DDOLE2.moddesc: Provides different outfits for LE2's Drell characters. Scale color changes are included in each outfit.

DLC_MOD_DEADLYCOMBAT_LE2.moddesc: Faster, more accurate weapons. Henchmen and AI do more damage. Heavy weapons operate at 10x damage.

DLC_MOD_DEATHSTROKEARMORFORMALESHEPARDLE.modname: Deathstroke Armor For Male Shepard LE2
DLC_MOD_DEATHSTROKEARMORFORMALESHEPARDLE.moddesc:
These things should never be personal.I'm a trained killer.

Ports the Deathstroke's Armor from Batman Arkham Knight For Male Shepard

DLC_MOD_DEPLETED_RICH.moddesc: Mod introduces a customizable mechanism that hides rich resource tags for resource depleted planets. You can choose one of three predefined configurations.

DLC_MOD_DISABLEMOUSESMOOTHDAMP.moddesc: Contains a few quality of life mods in a single download. For use with mod manager.

DLC_MOD_DISABLESPRINTTOCOVER.moddesc: Contains a few quality of life mods in a single download. For use with mod manager.

DLC_MOD_DISABLE_CODEX_NARRATION.moddesc: This simple DLC mod disables the codex voiceover narration in LE2.

DLC_MOD_DLC_MOD_SCANNER_SPEED_INCREASED.moddesc: Gives a couple of different options for the speed of the scanning reticle when you are scanning planets for resources.

DLC_MOD_DMGNUMS.moddesc: Damage Numbers adds dynamic damage indicators to every hit -  telling you exactly how much damage each attack dealt. (LE2 and LE3)

DLC_MOD_DMVLE2.moddesc:
"Druu's Modding Varieties" is where I will be uploading the majority of my mass effect mods. With guaranteed short waiting times and a shared enthusiasm for getting things done on time, the DMV is fun for all mod users. Or not.
The DMV currently offers several new clothing options ranging from business casual, formal wear to party outfits.

DLC_MOD_DOF.moddesc: Disables the Depth of Field during conversations.

DLC_MOD_DOSREW.moddesc: Replaces and rewrites a variety of character dossier files available to read on the Shadow Broker base. Applies to Miranda, Tali, Jacob and Kasumi.

DLC_MOD_DRESSESPT2KASUMIREPLACER.moddesc: Bunch of new outfits that contains dresses and similar stuff from Sims CC Creators as buyable Casual Clothes for FemShep LE2.

DLC_MOD_DTWE_LE2.moddesc: A variety of Weapon visual and gameplay enhancement options for LE2.

DLC_MOD_E2ENEMIESSHIELDREGEN.moddesc:
Now you can play with any difficulty with customized value of bonuses for enemies (whatever if enemies feel too weak or too strong for you - with this mod you can tweak it ).
You want more interesting and tougher gameplay? You can enable enemies shield regeneration like in ME1/ME3 - this is more lore friendly and enrich gameplay

DLC_MOD_EAC.moddesc: Ports the LE3 expanded selection of Armor Colors to LE2. Get matching sets across games and express yourself as colorful or colorless as you want!

DLC_MOD_EARLY_CABIN_INVITES.moddesc: This mod unlocks the short cabin invites with your Love Interest before the suicide mission, once you accept their romance. It does not unlock the romance culmination scenes early. Only the post Suicide Mission invites. Miranda, Tali, Jack, Thane, Jacob or Garrus.

DLC_MOD_EAS.moddesc: Adds Weapon Stats and moves armor stats above their descriptions.

DLC_MOD_EGM_ARMORS.moddesc: The Initiative Armors from Ark Mod and MP Armors from EGM all set up as  a brand new DLC Mod for LE3.  Includes T5-V Battlesuit, N7 Pathfinder, Initiative Spearpoint,  N7 Slayer and many more.

DLC_MOD_EGM_CUTSCENEWEAPONS.modname: EGM Fix Weapons in Cutscenes LE2
DLC_MOD_EGM_CUTSCENEWEAPONS.moddesc: Support DLC to fix a few issues with the Fix Cutscene Weapons mod for LE2.

DLC_MOD_EMLE2.moddesc: Gives Morinth a sinister, more evil appearance.

DLC_MOD_EMPERORS_CLOTHES.moddesc: The Emperor's Clothes is a mod that provides invisible armor pieces for the head, shoulders, arms and legs. This mod can be used stand alone or with IVAP, its inspiration. It can also be used with the Expanded Shepard Armory (ESA).

DLC_MOD_ERS.moddesc: Extended Romance Scenes expands on the LE2 romance scenes by adding the romantic cinematics from LE3 to all 7 LE2 romance scenes.

DLC_MOD_ESA.moddesc: Expanded Shepard Armory mod unlocks helmetless versions of the official DLC armors to players who wish to use them and see their Shepard's faces; as well as adds additional armors and casual outfits ported from Mass Effect 1, 3 and Andromeda.

DLC_MOD_ESA_ADDON.moddesc:
Expanded Squadmate Armory is the first addon to Expanded Shepard Armory mod for Mass Effect 2 Legendary Edition. This new optional addon allows you to dress your squadmates with some of those many armors you have collected but never used on Shepard.

This mod REQUIRES the main ESA package to be installed.

DLC_MOD_EVIESHEP_LE2.moddesc: My custom Evelyn Shepard, LE1/2 version, is now replacing the custom headmesh in all three games.

DLC_MOD_EXTENDED_WEAPON_BONUS.moddesc: During the Collector ship mission, you can choose one bonus each playthrough and eventually collect them all. As a result, all character classes will be able to carry any type of weapon.

DLC_MOD_EXTRAKEYBINDS.moddesc:
Separates the keybinds for Use / Sprint / Cover into three separate keys. (Mass Effect 1 only separates Use / Sprint)
Space Bar will Skip Conversation without selecting a Dialogue Option. (Mass Effect 1 cannot be fixed, new keybinding "Escape" added instead)
Optional for Mass Effect 2: Prevent Sprint/Storm from entering Cover.

DLC_MOD_FANCIFULEDI.moddesc: Port of Fanciful EDI mod from ME3, adding dozens of new fun (and some risque) outfits for FemShep.

DLC_MOD_FASTERNUKES.moddesc: Nukes from the Cain impact instantly.

DLC_MOD_FASTER_TRACERS_LE2.moddesc: LE2 bullet tracers are far slower than the tracers from LE1 or LE3. With this mod bullet tracers from weapons now travel much faster. Similar to the other games.

DLC_MOD_FA_PADME_SHEP_LE2.moddesc: This mod replaces default femshep's headmorph with PadmÃ© Amidala's from Force Arena game.

DLC_MOD_FEMSHEPHAIR.moddesc: More Hair for Femshep brings to the Legendary Edition Sims 4 Hairs created by Anto and originally ported by Kittentails to the original Mass Effect 3. Players who want to use them will need to use the Trilogy Savegame Editor to change their Shepard's hair as for the moment it is not possible to include them on the Character Creator.

DLC_MOD_FEMSHEPHAIRLE2.moddesc: More Hairstyles for Femshep, for MELE2.

DLC_MOD_FISH_FEEDER.moddesc: Tired of seeing your fish die because you forgot to feed them after that short N7 mission? Annoyed that the only way to get them to be fed automatically requires taking your yeoman for dinner? Worry no more and go purchase the Fish Feeding VI on the Citadel and take out one less worry from your shoulders while you fight the Collectors.

DLC_MOD_FN_BOBA.moddesc: This mod provides you with custom outfit options to play as Boba Fett.

DLC_MOD_FORCEMAGE.moddesc: Since I did a DA2 Bloodmage Vanguard I decided to make a Force Mage Adept

DLC_MOD_FORCEMAGEADEPT.moddesc: Since I did a DA2 Bloodmage Vanguard I decided to make a Force Mage Adept

DLC_MOD_FRECKLES2.moddesc: A DLC mod with various freckled complexions for femShep. This is NOT a texture mod!

DLC_MOD_FRECKLES_M2.moddesc: A DLC mod with various freckled complexions for maleShep. This is NOT a texture mod!

DLC_MOD_FREEJACK_LE2.moddesc: Jack wears a real shirt for all appearances. No nipple straps or visors in sight. Includes compatibility for Casual Hubs 2.

DLC_MOD_FSHEPARM.moddesc: Adds a selection of modified armors for femshep to use in LE2.

DLC_MOD_FSHEPCLOTHES.moddesc: Some clothes for Femshep to wear (LE2),

DLC_MOD_FUW.moddesc: Equip all 6 weapon types simultaneously, regardless of class and without limitations.

DLC_MOD_GAMEOVERDELAY.moddesc: Contains a few quality of life mods in a single download. For use with mod manager.

DLC_MOD_GARRUSUNDAMAGED.moddesc: Replaces Garrus' Alternate Appearance Armor with the undamaged version of his default blue armor. Includes squad selection images.

DLC_MOD_GAR_ARC_LE2.moddesc: A collection of new standalone outfits for squadmates.

DLC_MOD_GAR_LE3_ARM.moddesc: A collection of new standalone outfits for squadmates.

DLC_MOD_GAR_VSR_LE2.moddesc: Collection of NPC mods for LE2

DLC_MOD_GAY.moddesc: More Gay Romances is a mod for Mass Effect: Legendary Edition that adds more same-gender romance options to the game.

DLC_MOD_GAYRRUS_LE2.moddesc: Makes Garrus a Romance option for Male Shepard

DLC_MOD_GCM_LE2.moddesc: Replaces Garrus's head mesh in LE2 with his head mesh from LE3.

DLC_MOD_GDLGLE2.moddesc:
Corrección de erratas e introducción de nuevas reglas de la RAE y modificaciones/unificación de formato para los textos en español de los tres juegos de la saga Mass Effect (LE).
-Versión para LE2-

DLC_MOD_GENESIS_BEGONE.moddesc: Restores the original Mass Effect 2 experience by removing all Genesis DLC references. Miranda and Illusive Man prologue lines, title card flow (optional), and the full Miranda interrogation are restored, which includes references to choices regarding the Destiny Ascension, Council, and the new human councilor.

DLC_MOD_GETHPULSE.modname: Geth Pulse Rifle on Lower Difficulties
DLC_MOD_GETHPULSE.moddesc: Removes the difficulty requirement to get the Geth Pulse Rifle on Tali's recruitment mission.

DLC_MOD_GIDUMLE.modname: Genesis Intro Dialogue Undo Mod - Legendary Edition
DLC_MOD_GIDUMLE.moddesc: Restores the original Mass Effect 2 opening dialogue from before BioWare created the Genesis 2 DLC, while retaining all features of the Genesis Recap comic. Remake of the OT ME2 mod.

DLC_MOD_GODDESS_OF_WAR.modname: WarzKnight's Goddess of War for ME2 LE
DLC_MOD_GODDESS_OF_WAR.moddesc: This is my custom soldier class for ME2 LE. I see this more as a stand your ground or push to advance with weapons rather than powers as that is my personal preference.

DLC_MOD_GOD_OF_WAR.modname: WarzKnight's God of War for ME2 LE
DLC_MOD_GOD_OF_WAR.moddesc: This is my custom soldier class for ME2 LE. I see this more as a stand your ground or push to advance with weapons rather than powers as that is my personal preference.

DLC_MOD_GUARDIAN_ARM_LE2.moddesc: Ports the Destiny 2 x Mass Effect collab to ME:LE2 for both Shepards. Includes the N7 Titan, Vakarian Hunter, and Shadow Broker Warlock armors and helmets.

DLC_MOD_GUNSHIPSHIELD.moddesc: This mod is for those who wish to skip Kasumi's loyalty mission gunship boss fight that has regenerating shields. With this mod, the shield is removed at the beginning of the fight and makes the fight much shorter and easier.

DLC_MOD_HACKETT_OUT.moddesc: Adds a single line to the end of Hackett's correspondence on the Shadow Broker dossier console.

DLC_MOD_HAIRMIX.moddesc:
Another bunch of hair mixtures for LE1, LE2, and LE3.
Two new hairstyles now available.

DLC_MOD_HALCYONHAIRPACKLE2.moddesc: A dozen new hairs (5 male, 3 female, 3 crossgender) based on hairstyles from The Outer Worlds.

DLC_MOD_HAMMERHEADBUFF.moddesc: Contains a few quality of life mods in a single download. For use with mod manager.

DLC_MOD_HAMMERHEADSM.moddesc: This bug fix ensures the Hammerhead shows on the cargo bay during the endgame if the player had previously acquired it.

DLC_MOD_HAMMERSOUND.moddesc: Fixes the audio glitch when the Hammerhead stops mining.

DLC_MOD_HANDS.moddesc: Ever since the original release of Mass Effect 2, asari on the Citadel have been known to have human hands. The LE patch fixed some of them, but not all. Now all are included, as well as some extra corrections to props placement around the levels.

DLC_MOD_HEATSINKSRETURN_LE2.moddesc: Returns the built-in Weapon cool down to all regular weapons.

DLC_MOD_HIDEHELMETS.moddesc: Makes all helmets and headgear except for the N7 Breather Helmet invisible.

DLC_MOD_HMF_HGR_FIX.moddesc: FIxes very small parts of Femshep's skin peeking through her helmets.

DLC_MOD_HONEST_DEPOT.moddesc: New, more honest and configurable charging system for fuel depots.

DLC_MOD_HOODEDCASUALSFORLE2.moddesc: Kasumi's Armor with remodeled hood and updated/custom textures for LE2 and LE3

DLC_MOD_HUDENHANCE.moddesc: Various Improvements to the HUD in Mass Effect 2 (Legendary Edition).

DLC_MOD_HUGOGERNSBACKCONSISTENCY.moddesc: Restores weapons used by the survivors to LE1 models and removes Thermal Clips. The Heavy Weapon Powercell before the boss fight remains available.

DLC_MOD_HURRYKANECAMTOOLS.moddesc: Provide FlyCam to (almost) every situation and easy game start/stop toggle, show/hide HUD and various levels of slow motion for all three Legendary titles.

DLC_MOD_HUSKS_CONSISTENCY.moddesc: Updates all Collector and Reaper related husks and abominations to use their respective Mass Effect 3 models. Those from the planet Aequitas remain unchanged by default due to their origin being stated to be different in the game, related to an alien device, more akin to the husk depiction in Mass Effect 1.

DLC_MOD_IMMERSIVECITIZENSLE2.moddesc:
Immersive Citizens is a mod that aims to enhance the immersive experience of Mass Effect 2 (LE) by increasing the density of NPCs in the main hubs of Omega, Citadel, and Illium.

With more NPCs around, players can fully immerse themselves in the game's world and feel like they're part of the bustling galaxy.

DLC_MOD_IMPROVEDTARGETING.moddesc: Contains a few quality of life mods in a single download. For use with mod manager.

DLC_MOD_INFINITESPRINT.moddesc: Contains a few quality of life mods in a single download. For use with mod manager.

DLC_MOD_INF_FUEL.moddesc: Infinite fuel for the Normandy while exploring the galaxy in LE2

DLC_MOD_INSTANTBROKER.moddesc: Removes the time/mission gates on various terminals in the Shadow Broker Base.

DLC_MOD_INTERROGATIONSPECTRE.moddesc: Allows Shepard to use the "I'm a Spectre" line during Elias Kelham's interrogation regardless of morality, provided that they were reinstated as a Spectre.

DLC_MOD_ISH.moddesc:
Ish and Sel will now be present on Omega from the beginning of the game; allowing for the quest Packages for Ish to now be available to be started on your first visit to Omega.

Additionally, an alternate version can be installed which will make Ish resemble his look more from Mass Effect Galaxy, instead of looking like a generic salarian

DLC_MOD_IVAP.moddesc: Adds "invisible" versions of all vanilla armour parts so you can wear full body armours as torso pieces and still choose armour bonuses based on your class and playstyle. Unlock requirements remain the same. Optionally declutters other invisible parts from other mods and best of all you can wear JUST your chest piece and NOTHING else.

DLC_MOD_IVAP_LE2.moddesc: Adds "invisible" versions of all vanilla armour parts so you can wear full body armours as torso pieces and still choose armour bonuses based on your class and playstyle. Unlock requirements remain the same. Optionally declutters other invisible parts from other mods and best of all you can wear JUST your chest piece and NOTHING else.

DLC_MOD_JACKSARMORYLE2.moddesc: A fully armed and armored Jack ready for action. Mod includes 3 armors with helmets (1 for each appearance) and a completely customizable weapons loadout.

DLC_MOD_JACK_ARMORS.moddesc: A port of Destiny armors for Jack, because my girl deserves ACTUAL armor.  Additional armor options, not replacements!

DLC_MOD_JACK_FULL_ARMOUR_LE2.moddesc: LE3 armour converted for use as Jack's AAP armour in LE2. Includes full helmet to replace her regular breather.

DLC_MOD_JACK_NOUGHT_ARMOR.moddesc: Customized armors for Jack.  Additions, not replacements!

DLC_MOD_JACOBS_ARMOUR_FOR_SHEPARD.moddesc: This mod gives Shepard Jacob's armour. For all Shepards. As an armour and a casual outfit.

DLC_MOD_JCKME3.moddesc: This mod backports Jack's Mass Effect 3 outfit into LE2. It replaces Jack's AAP set.

DLC_MOD_JCK_PIERCINGS.moddesc: Removes Jack's earpiece and gives her a few piercings.

DLC_MOD_JRT.moddesc: Removes Jacobs hostility toward Thane and mention of EDI to Tali during post-recruitment debrief.

DLC_MOD_JS_ARMORYLE2.moddesc: Adds three new armor appearances for Samara--additions, not replacements!

DLC_MOD_JS_TITANLE2.moddesc: Adds two new armor appearances ported from Destiny 2 for Justicar Samara--additions, not replacements! Also includes an optional Causal Hubs patch.

DLC_MOD_JT_ARMORYLE2.moddesc: Adds three new armor appearances for Jacob Taylor--additions, not replacements!  Includes an optional casual hubs patch.

DLC_MOD_JUMPSUITFORKASUMIPARTY.moddesc: Batch of outfits that contains pants and similar stuff from Sims CC Creators and Original Sims Content as buyable Casual Clothes for FemShep LE2

DLC_MOD_KAIARM_MSHEPLE2.moddesc: Adds a few of Kaidan's LE3 armors as an option for Male Shepard to wear as Torso armors in LE2.  Includes multiple color options.  N7 textures of Kaidan's default blue armor by Eleonora0.

DLC_MOD_KAIDANOVERHAUL.moddesc: Gives Kaidan a new, high definition face mesh and hair. Compatible with all Kaidan face retextures.

DLC_MOD_KASUMIEYE.moddesc: A simple edit to Kasumi's eye material to make them appear visible.

DLC_MOD_KASUMIRESTOREDMEMORIES.moddesc: restores some lines of dialogue from the original release of Mass Effect 2 into the Legendary Edition.

DLC_MOD_KASUMI_STYLE_ARMOUR_FOR_TALI.moddesc: This swaps Tali's default armour for one that is inspired by Kasumi's armour as well as giving an option for use with Casual Hubs for LE2

DLC_MOD_KBLE2.moddesc: Restores Krogan to the feared warriors they were in Mass Effect 1.

DLC_MOD_KELLYFISHLE2.moddesc: Kelly will offer to feed your fish when you buy some fish without having to flirt with her.

DLC_MOD_KELLYHAIRREMASTERED.moddesc: Brings back and remasters the original hair used by Kelly Chambers and Dr. Kenson from Mass Effect 2 to LE2 and LE3.

DLC_MOD_KELLYKENSON.moddesc: Restores the OT hair for Kelly and Kenson, as well as improves Kelly's conversation lighting and restores Kenson's unused armour.

DLC_MOD_KILLZAEEDLE.moddesc: This mod allows you to kill Zaeed during his loyalty mission if Vido gets away, no matter when you play the mission.

DLC_MOD_LASERDEATHSCREAMS.moddesc: This mod restores the death screams for almost every squadmate being hit by the Oculus Laser during the Suicide Mission's Approach Phase.

DLC_MOD_LBDH.moddesc: Allows Zaeed to be a viable fire team leader choice if he's loyal.

DLC_MOD_LE2AIDISTANCEACCURACY.moddesc: Some people complain that accuracy of enemies is too high and it is hard to survive even when running from one to another cover position. ME2 Enemies accuracy is indeed quite pinpoint (more precise than in ME3 and ME1 ) and with this mod you can tweak it. You will have bigger chance to stay alive while under enemy fire.

DLC_MOD_LE2AILEVELSACCURACY.moddesc: Some people complain that accuracy of enemies is too high and it is hard to survive even when running from one to another cover position. ME2 Enemies accuracy is indeed quite pinpoint (more precise than in ME3 and ME1 ) and with this mod you can tweak it. You will have bigger chance to stay alive while under enemy fire.

DLC_MOD_LE2AIMASSISTOFF.moddesc: When using controller, aim assist is enabled. Many players hate that. This mod turn off Aim Assist.

DLC_MOD_LE2AIMOVEACCURACY.moddesc: Some people complain that accuracy of enemies is too high and it is hard to survive even when running from one to another cover position. ME2 Enemies accuracy is indeed quite pinpoint (more precise than in ME3 and ME1 ) and with this mod you can tweak it. You will have bigger chance to stay alive while under enemy fire.

DLC_MOD_LE2ALTERNATIVEBODIES.moddesc: Mesh edits to a number of Femshep (and some crew) outfits.

DLC_MOD_LE2ARIABLACKOUTFIT.moddesc: A black version of Aria's outfit for Femshep.

DLC_MOD_LE2CR.moddesc: Overhaul of gunplay flow and balance for less... sedentary lifestyle - as inspired by ME1:LE combat. Weapons are deadly and dependable, enemies behave more naturally, and initiative and movement on the battlefield is rewarded.

DLC_MOD_LE2CREDITSIMPORT.moddesc: When you start Mass Effect 2, are you happy with max only 100.000 credits transferred from ME1? Do you hate that you have much grind for credits? Before last update in Legendary Edition it was max 1.000.000. This mod allows you to restore that or choose some other options. Also you can change amount of 2nd Playthrough reward.

DLC_MOD_LE2CREDITSIMPORT2NDPLAY.moddesc: When you start Mass Effect 2, are you happy with max only 100.000 credits transferred from ME1? Do you hate that you have much grind for credits? Before last update in Legendary Edition it was max 1.000.000. This mod allows you to restore that or choose some other options. Also you can change amount of 2nd Playthrough reward.

DLC_MOD_LE2CROUCHACCURACY.moddesc: Do you want crouch like in ME1? This mod adds it (choose toggle or hold version and choose key you want for it ).

DLC_MOD_LE2CROUCHING.moddesc: Do you want crouch like in ME1? This mod adds it (choose toggle or hold version and choose key you want for it ).

DLC_MOD_LE2DIFFICULTYLEVELS.moddesc:
Now you can play with any difficulty with customized value of bonuses for enemies (whatever if enemies feel too weak or too strong for you - with this mod you can tweak it ).
You want more interesting and tougher gameplay? You can enable enemies shield regeneration like in ME1/ME3 - this is more lore friendly and enrich gameplay

DLC_MOD_LE2ENEMIESARMORREGEN.moddesc:
Now you can play with any difficulty with customized value of bonuses for enemies (whatever if enemies feel too weak or too strong for you - with this mod you can tweak it ).
You want more interesting and tougher gameplay? You can enable enemies shield regeneration like in ME1/ME3 - this is more lore friendly and enrich gameplay

DLC_MOD_LE2ENEMIESARMOURGATE.moddesc:
These are 2 mods. One is: Enemies have more health at Insanity difficulty level (different versions ).
If you like Shield Gate mechanic in ME3 for enemies you can turn it on for enemies in ME2 to increase difficulty (if you want you can also enable Barrier Gate and/or Armour Gate ).

DLC_MOD_LE2ENEMIESBARRIERGATE.moddesc:
These are 2 mods. One is: Enemies have more health at Insanity difficulty level (different versions ).
If you like Shield Gate mechanic in ME3 for enemies you can turn it on for enemies in ME2 to increase difficulty (if you want you can also enable Barrier Gate and/or Armour Gate ).

Now you can play with any difficulty with customized value of bonuses for enemies (whatever if enemies feel too weak or too strong for you - with this mod you can tweak it ).
You want more interesting and tougher gameplay? You can enable enemies shield regeneration like in ME1/ME3 - this is more lore friendly and enrich gameplay

DLC_MOD_LE2ENEMIESGETHREGENOFF.moddesc:
Now you can play with any difficulty with customized value of bonuses for enemies (whatever if enemies feel too weak or too strong for you - with this mod you can tweak it ).
You want more interesting and tougher gameplay? You can enable enemies shield regeneration like in ME1/ME3 - this is more lore friendly and enrich gameplay

DLC_MOD_LE2ENEMIESSHIELDGATE.moddesc:
These are 2 mods. One is: Enemies have more health at Insanity difficulty level (different versions ).
If you like Shield Gate mechanic in ME3 for enemies you can turn it on for enemies in ME2 to increase difficulty (if you want you can also enable Barrier Gate and/or Armour Gate ).

DLC_MOD_LE2ENEMYHEALTH.modname: LE2 Enemies more health - ver. Insanity2
DLC_MOD_LE2ENEMYHEALTH.moddesc:
These are 2 mods. One is: Enemies have more health at Insanity difficulty level (different versions ).
If you like Shield Gate mechanic in ME3 for enemies you can turn it on for enemies in ME2 to increase difficulty (if you want you can also enable Barrier Gate and/or Armour Gate ).

DLC_MOD_LE2GETHSHIELDGATEOFF.moddesc:
These are 2 mods. One is: Enemies have more health at Insanity difficulty level (different versions ).
If you like Shield Gate mechanic in ME3 for enemies you can turn it on for enemies in ME2 to increase difficulty (if you want you can also enable Barrier Gate and/or Armour Gate ).

DLC_MOD_LE2HEALTHREGENERATION.moddesc: How many time you need to use Medigel? With default health regeneration, medigel wasn't much needed. This mod allows you to increase time of health regeneration (many options ). Now medigel will have more purpose.

DLC_MOD_LE2HEALTHUPGRADE.modname: LE2 Medigel Upgrade for Health Regen
DLC_MOD_LE2HEALTHUPGRADE.moddesc: How many time you need to use Medigel? With default health regeneration, medigel wasn't much needed. This mod allows you to increase time of health regeneration (many options ). Now medigel will have more purpose.

DLC_MOD_LE2IMPROVEDFUNCTIONALITY.moddesc: Improved functions in LE2 necessary for certain mods to function and serving as a resource for other mod devs.

DLC_MOD_LE2JACKET.moddesc: Adds a custom leather jacket outfit for Femshep in LE2.

DLC_MOD_LE2JAHA.moddesc: This mod places hair on Jack's head for LE2.

DLC_MOD_LE2NEWGAMEPLUS.moddesc: ME2 NewGamePlus is known to be unbalanced at beginning of game, this mod fix it. Retain all upgrades for weapons and crew (all upgrades transfer except ship upgrades ).

DLC_MOD_LE2NEWUPGRADES.moddesc: In game there are two upgrades what are hidden and can't be accessed. This mod give you those upgrades. You can choose version with both of them or version with only Cyclonic Array or Bovine Fortitude.

DLC_MOD_LE2PATCH.moddesc: An unofficial bugfix patch for Mass Effect 2 Legendary Edition.

DLC_MOD_LE2QOLLEFTALT.moddesc: There exist great config mods but can’t be used together so I made this mod. Mouse smoothing and acceleration off, Infinite sprint, 10x time speed button, decals stay, corpses physics, Space and ESC skips dialogues without selecting response, walk as toggle, picture button

DLC_MOD_LE2QOLMIDDLEMOUSE.moddesc: There exist great config mods but can’t be used together so I made this mod. Mouse smoothing and acceleration off, Infinite sprint, 10x time speed button, decals stay, corpses physics, Space and ESC skips dialogues without selecting response, walk as toggle, picture button

DLC_MOD_LE2RANDOMIZER.moddesc: This module is generated by the user in LE2Randomizer

DLC_MOD_LE2RESOURCESIMPORT.moddesc: This mod allows in Mass Effect2 to increase bonuses for Resources from importing game from Mass Effect 1. If you feel that bonuses are not enough then this mod is for you (many options to choose ).

DLC_MOD_LE2RESOURCESREMOVEBONUS.moddesc: This mod allows in Mass Effect2 to increase bonuses for Resources from importing game from Mass Effect 1. If you feel that bonuses are not enough then this mod is for you (many options to choose ).

DLC_MOD_LE2_CODEX_FIXES.moddesc: Some small fixes to several Codex entries in LE2. For english (INT) version only.

DLC_MOD_LE2_CUSTOM_HEAD.moddesc: Framework set up for a custom head mesh mod. Works for both MShep and FemShep. This does NOT include any mesh, just DLC set up to make importing your own files as easy as possible.

DLC_MOD_LE2_FUN_GUNS.moddesc: a mod that rebalances the mass effect 2 weapons including dlc and modern and classic weapon mods weapons

DLC_MOD_LE2_GARRUS_NO_VISOR.moddesc: Removes Garrus visor. Optional of just casual or armour or both

DLC_MOD_LEGIONFEMSHEPN7_LE2.moddesc: Femshep N7 shoulder guard for Legion instead of Broshep N7 shoulder guard.

DLC_MOD_LESS_RESTRICTIVE_PAUSEMENU_AND_P.modname: LE2 Less Restrictive Pause Menu & Photo Mode
DLC_MOD_LESS_RESTRICTIVE_PAUSEMENU_AND_P.moddesc: BETA. This mod removes most restrictions on bringing up the Pause Menu during gameplay including when/where you can activate Photo Mode. Due to requests I released this mod in its current Beta state.

DLC_MOD_LETTERBOX.moddesc: Removes the Letterboxing on Ultrawide Resolutions for Mass Effect: Legendary Edition

DLC_MOD_LIARALOTSB.moddesc: Gives Liara her prologue armor for the Lair of the Shadow Broker DLC.

DLC_MOD_LIARASQUAD.moddesc: Mod that adds Liara from Lair of the Shadow Broker as a selectable squad mate to Mass Effect 2 in the Mass Effect Legendary Edition.

DLC_MOD_LIARA_AARMOR.modname: Liara's Alternate LE3 Armor for LotSB (LE2)
DLC_MOD_LIARA_AARMOR.moddesc: Gives Liara her Alternate Appearance Pack armor from Mass Effect 3 for the combat stages of the Lair of the Shadow Broker DLC, by faithfully recreating her armor material with custom edited textures to match the armor looks from the third game. Moreover, her breather is also changed to her asari one from the third entry.

DLC_MOD_LIARA_CONSISTENCY_MOD.moddesc: Makes Liara's facial appearance fully consistent within Mass Effect 2, by either choosing her original basegame look from Mass Effect 1, her Lair of the Shadow Broker look or her Mass Effect 3 appearance. No further changes are included in her. Unofficial LE2 Patch forward compatible.

DLC_MOD_LIARA_CONSISTENCY_MOD_LE1.moddesc: Makes Liara's facial appearance fully consistent within Mass Effect 2, by either choosing her original basegame look from Mass Effect 1, her Lair of the Shadow Broker look or her Mass Effect 3 appearance. No further changes are included in her. Unofficial LE2 Patch forward compatible.

DLC_MOD_LIARA_CONSISTENCY_MOD_LE2.moddesc: Makes Liara's facial appearance fully consistent within Mass Effect 2, by either choosing her original basegame look from Mass Effect 1, her Lair of the Shadow Broker look or her Mass Effect 3 appearance. No further changes are included in her. Unofficial LE2 Patch forward compatible.

DLC_MOD_LIARA_CONSISTENCY_MOD_LE3.moddesc: Makes Liara's facial appearance fully consistent within Mass Effect 2, by either choosing her original basegame look from Mass Effect 1, her Lair of the Shadow Broker look or her Mass Effect 3 appearance. No further changes are included in her. Unofficial LE2 Patch forward compatible.

DLC_MOD_LIARA_WA.moddesc: Collection of NPC mods for LE2

DLC_MOD_LINSDFR2.moddesc: There are many Shepards, but this one is mine. And she could be yours! This is a totally custom default head replacer, which means she works out of the box, no save editing required.

DLC_MOD_LMS.moddesc: Let Me Stay gets rid of the constant and insistent hints suggesting you to leave the Quarian Fleet right after finishing Tali's trial.

DLC_MOD_LNA_LE2.moddesc: An asari inspired armor for Liara to wear in LE2 and LE3.

DLC_MOD_LONG_KASUMI_DRESS.moddesc: This mod replaces the Kasumi Dress with a Longer Version

DLC_MOD_LOYALTYMATTERS.moddesc: This mod allows unusual selectable specialists/team leaders to succeed in their assignments during the Suicide Mission depending on loyalty status.

DLC_MOD_M3_MERGE.moddesc: Auto-generated Merge DLC by ME3Tweaks Mod Manager.

DLC_MOD_M44_TANK.moddesc: M-44 has tougher armor and more powerful missiles.

DLC_MOD_MAGEADEPT.moddesc: Since I did a DA2 Bloodmage Vanguard I decided to make a Force Mage Adept

DLC_MOD_MAGEVANGUARD.moddesc: Missing DA2 magic? Well, now you can have a Bloodmage/ Force Mage build for Shepard! I made this for my Renegade Male Shepard and am sharing if others might like the build too.

DLC_MOD_MALESHEPARDTURTLENECKSLE2.moddesc: Adds turtleneck casual outfits for Male Shepard to the locker.

DLC_MOD_MCOMPANIONFEMSHEP.moddesc: Adds couple of requested companion outfits to the Femshep closet.

DLC_MOD_MCP_LE2.moddesc: Customization for Miranda's Hair and Head. Includes several hairstyles, blonde options, and a slightly re sculpted head model.

DLC_MOD_ME2LE_GAMEPLAY_TWEAKS.moddesc: This Coalesced tweak adjusts ME2LE  for the Normandy and planet scanning in numerous ways along with Mistyvail's Armor Appearances. Now deployment ready with ME3Tweaks Mod Manager!

DLC_MOD_ME2VIXENHAIRTOLE2.moddesc: Modifies the default LE2 and 3 hair to look like how it does in the original 2010 Mass Effect 2. I used the original ME2 hair model as reference when sculpting the hair in Blender.

DLC_MOD_ME2_ARMOREDENGINEER.moddesc: Replaces the Engineers Cryo Blast with Sentinels Tech Armor

DLC_MOD_ME2_GAMEPLAYTWEAKS.moddesc: These are a few "Quality of Life" changes that allow me to better enjoy replaying this outstanding series of games. These were originally Coalesced file edits for personal use but have now been converted to custom DLC and posted publicly.

DLC_MOD_ME2_PARABELLUM.moddesc: More martial versions of character classes. The "Adept Commando" for ME2 and ME3 being the first.

DLC_MOD_ME2_SERAPHINFILTRATOR.moddesc: Want to cloak and sneak up on Geth? Show Cerberus what you think of their smoke grenades?

DLC_MOD_ME2_SPECTRE.moddesc: A Custom Character class for the box-art and trailers Cmdr Shepard. One human, One Omni-Tool, and guns.

DLC_MOD_ME2_UNCOOLED.moddesc: Alternate versions of the Infiltrator, Sentinel, and Soldier classes not using Cryo powers.

DLC_MOD_ME2_WEAPONTWEAKS.moddesc: This modifies several weapons in ways that make them either more effective or sensible, making the game more enjoyable for me so I thought I'd share. These were originally Coalesced file edits for personal use but have now been converted to custom DLC and posted publicly.

DLC_MOD_ME3ARM_HK.moddesc: Adds ME3's Hahne-Kedar Armour Pieces to LE2's Modular Armour System.

DLC_MOD_MEA_ARKII_MSHEPLE2.modname: Andromeda Ark Outfits II for MaleShep (LE2)
DLC_MOD_MEA_ARKII_MSHEPLE2.moddesc: Adds an outfit made up of some of the Pathfinder's casuals from MEA and vanilla ME3 assets for Male Shepard to wear. Comes in two mesh variants (rolled-up sleeves and long sleeves) with four color options: N7, Spectre, Cerberus, and Alliance.

DLC_MOD_MEA_ARK_MSHEPLE2.moddesc: Adds a MEA Ark outfit for Male Shepard to wear. Comes in two mesh variants (one vanilla--long sleeves, one custom-made from vanilla--short sleeves) with four color options: N7, Spectre, Cerberus and Alliance.

DLC_MOD_MEA_JS_MSHEPLE2.moddesc: Adds a MEA jumpsuit for Male Shepard to wear. Comes in two mesh variants with four colors: N7, Spectre, Cerberus and Alliance.

DLC_MOD_MEA_MEDIC_MSHEPLE2.moddesc: Adds the MEA medic/scientist outfit for Male Shepard to wear. Comes in one mesh variant with multiple logo/color variations.

DLC_MOD_MEA_OFFICER_MSHEPLE2.moddesc: Adds the MEA Officer outfit for Male Shepard.  Includes five color choices: Alliance, N7, Spectre, and two Cerberus options.

DLC_MOD_MGRUNTCOMBAT.modname: Morning's Combat Outfits for Grunt LE2
DLC_MOD_MGRUNTCOMBAT.moddesc: 5 new combat outfits and new casual options for Grunt.

DLC_MOD_MIRANDAARMORYLE2.moddesc: A fully armed and armored Miranda ready for action. Mod includes 3 armors with helmets (1 for each appearance) and a completely customizable weapons loadout.

DLC_MOD_MIRANDACHEESEBURGERARMOR.moddesc: Giving combat bun a whole new meaning. But more realistically, showing how to use Squadmate Merge for LE2 with ME3Tweaks Mod Manager.

DLC_MOD_MIRANDADRESS_LE2.moddesc: Miranda wears a sleek mini dress for her romance scene and cabin visits.

DLC_MOD_MIRANDAHAIR.moddesc: Tweaks Miranda's hair to more closely resemble her OT2 hair mesh.

DLC_MOD_MIRANDA_ARMOR.moddesc: Recolors of Miranda's alternate appearance armor for femShep.

DLC_MOD_MIRANDA_IMPROVED.moddesc: Miranda is the ultimate team support and squadmate so i thought well for more support i can add Cryo ammo to up her usefulness!!! More changes are to come in future versions since she is my go to squadmate !!!!

DLC_MOD_MIRANDA_STARTUP.moddesc: This is one in a series of mods to make each henchmen feel unique in combat. Miranda is my favorite character in the game and my go-to romance so she gets VIP treatment.....that means she will be the foundation of all your squad builds. Every other character will synergize with her bonuses one way or the other!!

DLC_MOD_MIRISUITB.modname: New Suit for Miranda LE2 - Bun
DLC_MOD_MIRISUITB.moddesc: Changes Miranda's catsuits to a modified version of Ashley's default outfit from LE3.

DLC_MOD_MIRISUITC.modname: New Suit for Miranda LE2 - Classy
DLC_MOD_MIRISUITC.moddesc: Changes Miranda's catsuits to a modified version of Ashley's default outfit from LE3.

DLC_MOD_MIRISUITV.modname: New Suit for Miranda LE2 - Vanilla
DLC_MOD_MIRISUITV.moddesc: Changes Miranda's catsuits to a modified version of Ashley's default outfit from LE3.

DLC_MOD_MIRI_NEM_LE2.moddesc: Collection of NPC mods for LE2

DLC_MOD_MJACKCOMBAT.modname: Morning's Combat Outfits for Jack LE2

DLC_MOD_MJK_CAA.moddesc: Adds the OT ME3 multiplayer Customizable Asari Adept Armor to FemShep's locker. Choose colors and patterns like you would the N7 armor. Now available in LE2.

DLC_MOD_MJUSTICARSAMA.modname: Morning's Justicar Outfits for Samara LE2

DLC_MOD_MKASUMICOMBAT.modname: Morning's Combat Outfits for Kasumi LE2
DLC_MOD_MKASUMICOMBAT.moddesc: 3 or 4 new combat outfits and 1 casual outfit with multiple color options for Kasumi.

DLC_MOD_MLE_ARMORS_DISABLER.moddesc: Armor lights and tint 3 personalization, some fixes, additional config entries that modders can use and ported armors from LE3 mod My Little Extension.

DLC_MOD_MLJACOB_LE2.moddesc: Adds two new armors for Miranda Lawson refitted from Jacob's vanilla armors--additions, not replacements! Also includes an optional Casual Hubs patch.  Two hair options are available: Vanilla or my custom bun.

DLC_MOD_ML_ARMORYLE2.moddesc: Adds two new armor appearances for Miranda Lawson--additions, not replacements!

DLC_MOD_ML_WARLOCKLE2.moddesc: Adds three new armor appearances ported from Destiny 2 for Miranda Lawson--additions, not replacements! Also includes an optional Causal Hubs patch.

DLC_MOD_MMIRANDACOMBAT.modname: Morning's Combat Outfits for Miranda LE2
DLC_MOD_MMIRANDACOMBAT.moddesc: 3 new combat outfit options for Miranda.

DLC_MOD_MODERNSQUADARMOR_LE2.moddesc: Full LE2/LE3 armor and helmets for squadmates past and present. Casual outfits are worn during Normandy downtime.

DLC_MOD_MODULARANDROMEDA.moddesc: Adds 261 fully tintable outfits ripped from Andromeda to the locker under modular armour parts

DLC_MOD_MOREHAIRS_LE2.moddesc: This mod adds 20 female hairstyles to LE2, originally made by NameIsLooney.

DLC_MOD_MORE_APPEARANCES.moddesc: Adds more Casual Appearances and Armors to LE2

DLC_MOD_MORNCOLORSTINTS.modname: Morning's More Colors for Tints and Patterns LE2

DLC_MOD_MORNGARRUSCOMBA.modname: Morning's Combat Outfits for Garrus LE2

DLC_MOD_MORNINGARMORLIGHTS.moddesc: 57 new light color options for armors, now for LE2.

DLC_MOD_MORNINGDRESSESPT2.moddesc: Bunch of new outfits that contains dresses and similar stuff from Sims CC Creators as buyable Casual Clothes for FemShep LE2.

DLC_MOD_MORNINGFEMSHEPOUTFITSPT2.moddesc: 5 new outfits from Sims CC Creators as Casual Clothes for FemShep LE2.

DLC_MOD_MORNINGGOWNSFEMSHEP.moddesc: Gown outfits for femshep using ccs from Sentate, Slyd, Sifix, Glitterberrysims, Charonlee, Lazyeyelids, Madlen, and Nords for le2.

DLC_MOD_MORNINGHAIRSTYLESFORMALESHEP.moddesc: Bunch of Hairstyles for MaleShep by Anto for LE2.

DLC_MOD_MORNINGHALLOWEEN.moddesc: Couple of outfits from my LE3 halloween store mod ported for LE2.

DLC_MOD_MORNINGMALELE2PT2.moddesc: 6 new outfits from Darte77 as Casual Clothes for Maleshep LE2.

DLC_MOD_MORNINGMALESHEPOUTFITS.moddesc: 5 new outfits from Darte77 as Casual Clothes for Maleshep LE2.

DLC_MOD_MORNINGPT4FEMSHEPOUTFITS.modname: Morning's Outfits for Femshep LE2 PT4
DLC_MOD_MORNINGPT4FEMSHEPOUTFITS.moddesc: 6 New outfits for Femshep using ccs from Darte77, Sifix, Elliesimple, Madlen, Christopher067, and GlitterberrySims.

DLC_MOD_MORNINGSCASUALOUTFITLE2.moddesc: 4 new outfits from Sims CC Creators as Casual Clothes for FemShep LE2.

DLC_MOD_MORNINGSDRESSESLE2.moddesc: Batch of outfits that contains dresses and skirts from Sims CC Creators and Original Sims Content as buyable Casual Clothes for FemShep LE2

DLC_MOD_MORNINGSHAIRSTYLESFEMLE2.moddesc: Bunch of Hairstyles by Anto and SonyaSimsCC for FemShep in LE2

DLC_MOD_MORNINGSHAIRSTYLESFEMSHEPPT3.moddesc: Bunch of new hairstyles by SimsTrouble and Luutzi for femshep LE2.

DLC_MOD_MORNINGSHORTERFEMSHEP.moddesc: Shorter hairstyles for femshep using ccs from JohnnySimmer, DaylifeSims, and Simandy.

DLC_MOD_MORNINGSMALESHEPHAIRSLE2PT3.modname: Morning's Hairstyles for Maleshep LE2 PT3
DLC_MOD_MORNINGSMALESHEPHAIRSLE2PT3.moddesc: New hairstyles for Maleshep by Simstrouble and Luutzi LE2.

DLC_MOD_MORNINGSPANTSOUTFITS.moddesc: Batch of outfits that contains pants and similar stuff from Sims CC Creators and Original Sims Content as buyable Casual Clothes for FemShep LE2

DLC_MOD_MORNINGSPANTSOUTFITSMENLE2.modname: Morning's Pants Outfits for Men LE2
DLC_MOD_MORNINGSPANTSOUTFITSMENLE2.moddesc: Bunch of outfits from Sims CC creators and original sims content as buyable Casual Clothes for MaleShep LE2

DLC_MOD_MORNINGSPANTSPT2.moddesc: Bunch of new outfits that contains pants and similar stuff from Sims CC Creators as buyable Casual Clothes for FemShep LE2.

DLC_MOD_MORNINGSUMMERFEMSHEP.moddesc: 5 new Summer outfits for femshep using ccs from Lazyeyelids, Sentate, EllieSimple, GlitterberrySims, and Charonlee.

DLC_MOD_MORNINGVERSATILEFEMHAIR.modname: Morning's Versatile Hairstyles for Femshep LE2
DLC_MOD_MORNINGVERSATILEFEMHAIR.moddesc: Bunch of hairstyles for femshep using cc from Sonyasims le2.

DLC_MOD_MORNTINTABLEMALE.modname: Morning's Tintable Armors for Maleshep LE2
DLC_MOD_MORNTINTABLEMALE.moddesc: Vanilla armors, companion armors, and new stuff made tintable for maleshep LE2.

DLC_MOD_MOR_UNIQUE.moddesc: Collection of NPC mods for LE2

DLC_MOD_MOVEMENTANIMATIONREPLACER.moddesc: Replaces Shepard's idle, walking, running, and sprinting animations, either by porting their LE1 animations or by swapping their gender-specific animations.

DLC_MOD_MSAMARACOMBAT.modname: Morning's Combat Outfits for Samara LE2
DLC_MOD_MSAMARACOMBAT.moddesc: 3 new combat outfits and 1 casual outfit for Samara.

DLC_MOD_MSHEPHAIR.moddesc:
New Hairstyles for MShep - MELE2 is just a conversion, for the Legendary Edition, of some girlplaysgame hair mods (https://girlplaysgame.com/mods/hair/).
This mod only includes male hairstyles.

DLC_MOD_MTHANECOM.modname: Morning's Combat Outfits for Thane LE2
DLC_MOD_MTHANECOM.moddesc: 3 New combat outfits and 1 new optional casual outfit for Thane.

DLC_MOD_MTINTABLEARMORFEM.modname: Morning's Tintable Armors for Femshep LE2
DLC_MOD_MTINTABLEARMORFEM.moddesc: Vanilla armors, companion armors, and new stuff made tintable for femshep LE2.

DLC_MOD_MULTIROM.moddesc: Allows Bro-/FemShep to romance multiple of their respective love interests with accompanying cullmination scenes shown in order.

DLC_MOD_MYRIADPROBEGONELE2.moddesc: Replaces Myriad Pro font with "Tigensu", the secondary iconic Mass Effect font, for the entire trilogy (including Launcher). This mod also makes UI adjustments such as fixing misaligned text and HUD elements and overhauling the dialogue wheel.

DLC_MOD_N7OP_LE2.moddesc: New jumpsuit style outfits for male and female Shepards. Six variants including Cerberus, N7, and Spectre themes.

DLC_MOD_N7_ANGL.moddesc: A port of horography's N7 ANGL hoodie from the OT.

DLC_MOD_N8_WEAPONS_REMIX.moddesc: Weapons balanced around Locust SMG. Higher accuracy. More reserve ammo. Weapon types added to non-soldier.

DLC_MOD_NAP.moddesc: Prevents your squad from automatically using ammo and/or defensive powers!

DLC_MOD_NDRESSUNIFORM.moddesc: Changes the gold chain on Shepard's and Anderson's dress blues for a black chain.

DLC_MOD_NEWADEPT.moddesc: Class abilities makeover that I made for my game and decided to share

DLC_MOD_NEWENGINEER.moddesc: Class abilities makeover that I made for my game and decided to share

DLC_MOD_NEWINFILTRATOR.moddesc: Class abilities makeover that I made for my game and decided to share

DLC_MOD_NEWSENTINEL.moddesc: Class abilities makeover that I made for my game and decided to share

DLC_MOD_NEWSOLDIER.moddesc: Class abilities makeover that I made for my game and decided to share

DLC_MOD_NEWVANGUARD.moddesc: Class abilities makeover that I made for my game and decided to share

DLC_MOD_NEW_CLUB_MUSIC.moddesc: Music replacer for afterlife and dark star

DLC_MOD_NIHLUS_AS_GARRUS.moddesc: This mod swaps Garrus to Nihlus. Visual Change only. The voice and story is still completely Garrus.

DLC_MOD_NILIN_DRIP.moddesc: Adds the Nilin outfit from Remember Me to FemShep's wardrobe.

DLC_MOD_NOESP.moddesc: Removes HUD elements that reveal enemies' locations.

DLC_MOD_NOFLASH.moddesc: Removes flashbang screen overlay effects from exploding enemy flashbangs.

DLC_MOD_NOHARASSMENT.moddesc: Removes several instances of sexual harassment from the games.

DLC_MOD_NOHEADGEARSQUAD.moddesc: Removes (or alters) the headgear on squadmates' Alternate Appearance Pack armors.

DLC_MOD_NOHEALTH.moddesc: Removes the low health screen overlay effect(s) that you get when you are at low health.

DLC_MOD_NOLOYALTYREQ.moddesc: Removes loyalty requirements from Advanced Training bonus powers and squadmate outfits so that you can have them from the start.

DLC_MOD_NOVAME2.moddesc: This is a coalesced edit for ME2 LE, which improves accuracy and responsiveness of all guns, smooths out the difficulty curve, and integrates More Appearances for ME2LE. Separated inis for merging changes available.

DLC_MOD_NOVAME2CLASSES.moddesc:
This is a coalesced edit for ME2 LE, which improves accuracy and responsiveness of all guns, smooths out the difficulty curve, and integrates More Appearances for ME2LE. Separated inis for merging changes available.
New class rebalance available.

DLC_MOD_NO_N7ARMOR_FOR_LIARA.modname: No N7 Armor in Liara's Apartment
DLC_MOD_NO_N7ARMOR_FOR_LIARA.moddesc: Ever find it creepy that Liara keeps the Armor that Shepard died in, in her living room and you can't even mention it to her? Worry no more! This mod removes the mesh and interaction point of the N7 Armor in Liara's apartment and places one of the Prothean rocks from another case in its place.

DLC_MOD_NO_SAVING_LOADING_TEXT.moddesc: Mod to remove the unnecessarily long saving and loading messages from your user interface. There is also an option included to remove the spinning disk icon as well, for those who prefer an even clearer UI.

DLC_MOD_NPB.moddesc: Removes party barks and other sounds during combat.

DLC_MOD_NPCHR.moddesc: This is a replacer for Miranda's hair.

DLC_MOD_NSC_LE2.moddesc: An expanded pack of unique casual outfits for Mass Effect 2 squadmates designed to be used in conjunction with Casual Hubs for LE2. These have been ported and enhanced from the original Project Variety module for ME2.

DLC_MOD_ODLE2.moddesc: Your squad will wear their off duty clothes while on the Normandy and in certain scenes.

DLC_MOD_OFFICERCHAMBERS.moddesc: Modifies Kelly's appearance by assigning her the Cerberus Officer casual outfit, a Cerberus themed earpiece, a new haircut and earrings.

DLC_MOD_OFMLE2.moddesc: Attempts to make which options pursue a romance clearer and open up platonic options to Shepard regardless of gender.

DLC_MOD_OMEGAAPARTMENT.moddesc: Adds a new apartment on Omega for Shepard to go to.

DLC_MOD_OMNIKEY.moddesc: Adds Use, Cover/Roll and Sprint as separate entries in the Key Bindings Menu for Legendary Edition.

DLC_MOD_OMNIKEY_KEYBIND.moddesc: LE2-LE3: This DLC separates the Omnikey Keybind into three commands. Maps the Use=Spacebar; Cover=LeftAlt; Sprint=LeftControl, Disable the Walk but you can still resign it in the Keybind menu, Install with ME3Tweaks Mod Manager.

DLC_MOD_OPAQUEVISORS_LE2.moddesc: This mod makes Shepard default and Eligible squadmates' helmet visors non seethrough.

DLC_MOD_OPENANDSLIMFITFORPARTY.modname: Open Suit and Slimfit Suit for Kasumi Party
DLC_MOD_OPENANDSLIMFITFORPARTY.moddesc: Bunch of outfits from Sims CC creators and original sims content as buyable Casual Clothes for MaleShep LE2

DLC_MOD_ORIANA.moddesc: Small lore-friendly mod that changes Oriana's face into Miranda's, so they actually look like twins.

DLC_MOD_OUTFITDANCER.moddesc: Dancer dress as a casual outfit for FemShep

DLC_MOD_OUTFITEDITS_MSHEP_LE2.moddesc: Adds a few edits of casual outfits already available in vanilla for Male Shepard. Currently includes edits to the N7 Leather Jacket and the N7 Hoodie. All will be unlocked in the locker right from the start.

DLC_MOD_OUTFITSFORSHEPLE2.moddesc: Bunch of outfits from Sims 4 imported as store buyable Casual Clothes for femShepard for LE2

DLC_MOD_OVERLORDMORALITY.moddesc: Overlord DLC in vanilla does not grant a single morality point through its entirety. With this mod, choosing the fate of David Archer on Overlord now grants 30 morality points. Paragon or Renegade depends on the appropriate option chosen.

DLC_MOD_PADME_AMIDALA.modname: [Star Wars] Padme Amidala as Shepard LE2
DLC_MOD_PADME_AMIDALA.moddesc: This mod changes the LE2 default femshep headmorph's with stepanovsculpts new model of Padmé Amidala and her iconic Attack of the Clones hairstyle (from hantzgruber).

DLC_MOD_PALLIN.moddesc: Enables a normally inaccessible conversation in the game regarding the fate of Executor Pallin before it was retconned in Mass Effect 3 & Mass Effect: Inquisition. Requires a savegame played with LE1 Diversification Project. Meant for players of Diversification Project or Project Variety for ME3, which both follow the pre-retcon canon.

DLC_MOD_PARAGADEPERSUASION.moddesc: Changes the way Charm and Intimidate options are unlocked by using Shepard's total combined amount of Charm and Intimidate points (ME1) or Paragon and Renegade points (ME2) for all persuasion checks.

DLC_MOD_PEARASLE2.moddesc: Equips your squad in full armor and helmets.

DLC_MOD_PEPPER_STEP.moddesc: This mod adds some pep to Shep's step. Ever felt maddeningly frustrated by how slow Shepard jogs and walks? Well now you can add just a tiny bit of pep to your step, just a bit of effort to hasten on your way.

DLC_MOD_PERSISTENTSETTINGS.moddesc: LE2 - Allows you to change settings in-game that persist across saves. Currently only for adjusting the FOV of the camera.

DLC_MOD_PHA.moddesc: Ports the M-5 Phalanx's holster animation that's only present in ME3 to ME2.

DLC_MOD_PHOTOMODEEDITS.moddesc: Increases the distance you can go in photo mode

DLC_MOD_PILOT.moddesc: This small mod repurposes Joker's dialogue lines from Mass Effect 1 and 3 to make him be the Normandy crewman speaking on Arrival DLC instead of some random person we never see and who might not even exist.

DLC_MOD_PISTOLS_REMADE_LE2.moddesc: Pistols resized to be smaller and SMGs altered to look like and be held like a rifle.

DLC_MOD_PLANETPROBINGPACK.moddesc: Contains a few quality of life mods in a single download. For use with mod manager.

DLC_MOD_PLATONIC_POST_HORIZON_EMAILS.moddesc: Adds a platonic email from the Virmire survivor after Horizon if you didn't romance them in ME1

DLC_MOD_POWERS_REMASTERED.moddesc: Add an additional themed power to each of your squad mates, and remove power unlock requirements from all  powers in the game (Shepard included).

DLC_MOD_PRACTICALBODIESSHEPARDLE2.moddesc: Mesh changes to BOTH Femshep's casual outfits AND armors to be "practical" and buffer. The new edits now allow outfits to reflect Shepard's Special Forces background.

DLC_MOD_PROFRAMEWORK.moddesc: Streaming framework to move NPCs to their own files during the prologue in order to make compatibility between mods easier.

DLC_MOD_QUA_CONSISTENCY.moddesc: Makes the Quarian Admiralty Board (Shala'Raan, Daro'Xen, Zaal'Koris & Han'Gerrel) use their outfits from Mass Effect 3. Installation is modular, allowing to choose which Admirals to change.

DLC_MOD_RANAKORLUS.moddesc: Allows you to kill Rana Thanoptis on Korlus provided she survives the mission on Virmire.

DLC_MOD_RANDOMAPPROACHDEATHS.moddesc: This mod randomizes the chosen casualties during the Suicide Mission's Approach Phase instead of following a strict order.

DLC_MOD_REAPERFIGHTTIMERLE2.moddesc:
Bring a thrilling sense of urgency to the epic Human Reaper battle in LE2.

Based on Shepard's warning that the bomb on the Collector base will detonate in 10 minutes, this mod adds a challenging 8-minute countdown timer to the second half of the Reaper fight.

Emerge victorious, or let the Reaper's reign of terror continue.

DLC_MOD_RECRUIT.moddesc: Early recruitment of Thane, Samara and Tali. Early access to Illium. Early access to Tuchanka if Wrex is the clan leader.

DLC_MOD_REFORMATTEDEMAILS.moddesc: A simple mod for LE2 that adds sender names to email titles.

DLC_MOD_REFUND.moddesc: Refund Guy Consistency Mod restores the appearance of the most annoying customer ever on the Citadel, which for some reason became a random cloned white dude from Zakera Wards on Mass Effect 2. Unfortunately, he will still be complaining about his refund and lack of purchase receipt.

DLC_MOD_RENEGADENOTABLEIST.moddesc: Edits a renegade line in the LE2 prologue to be less ableist.

DLC_MOD_RENEGADESCARSFORALL.moddesc: Alters the way Renegade scarring progresses in LE2 and LE3. Can allow Paragon Shepards to use scar progression or turn scars on all the time regardless of alignment.

DLC_MOD_RIGHT_ON_YOUR_ASS.moddesc: This mod overhauls Grunts power loadout !!!

DLC_MOD_RISKYSUICIDE.moddesc: Raise the stakes of the emblematic Mass Effect 2 finale.

DLC_MOD_ROMANCEPHOTOSHD.moddesc: Replaces the romanced photos in Shepard's cabin of Kaidan, Ashley, and Liara with new HD photos

DLC_MOD_SAMARASHOTS.moddesc: Restores camera shots present in the 2010 release to Samara's first conversation with Shepard aboard the Normandy.

DLC_MOD_SAMARASNEWARMORLE2.moddesc: A brand new armor for Samara in Mass Effect 2 for the Legendary Edition. Concept by PSDO, mesh and textures by Zeb.

DLC_MOD_SAMEGENDER.moddesc: This mod allows Tali and Thane to be romanced by both male and female Shepard, utilizing unused dialogue in the game files and repurposed dialogue from other parts of the trilogy. It also fixes issues with imported FemShep/Ashley and MaleShep/Kaidan romances, and allows and restores other same-gender content when possible.

DLC_MOD_SAM_AC.moddesc: Replaces Samara's outfit with the Asari Commando (from LE3 MP).

DLC_MOD_SAM_RC_LOTSB.modname: Samara Cut Shadow Broker Dossiers Restored
DLC_MOD_SAM_RC_LOTSB.moddesc: This mod restores 2 cut/lost/bugged/retconned dossiers about Samara from the Shadow Broker terminal.

DLC_MOD_SAREN_AS_GARRUS.moddesc: This mod swaps Garrus for Saren. Visual Change only. The voice and story is still completely Garrus.

DLC_MOD_SELECTCLASSWEAPONS.moddesc: Choose a full set of weapon types to apply to every class.

DLC_MOD_SEM2.moddesc: The purpose of Spectre Expansion Mod is to improve the under used mail terminals, to expand the galaxy map and improve immersion where possible.

DLC_MOD_SENTINEL_REDONE.moddesc: Changes the base class powers of Sentinel.

DLC_MOD_SENTPOWERS.moddesc: Replaces Cryo Freeze with Pull so you can combo with sentine.l

DLC_MOD_SET1711COURTNEYKASUMI.modname: Set1711 and Courtney outfit for Kasumi Party
DLC_MOD_SET1711COURTNEYKASUMI.moddesc: Bunch of new outfits that contains pants and similar stuff from Sims CC Creators as buyable Casual Clothes for FemShep LE2.

DLC_MOD_SHIRTLESS_JACOB.moddesc: Makes Jacob Shirtless for the Casual Hubs option and/or instead of his armour. Does not replace his starting scene.

DLC_MOD_SHIRTLESS_THANE.moddesc: Option to replace his default outfit meaning also when you first meet him, his loyalty outfit or his alt outfit. Or if you want to, all 3 options

DLC_MOD_SHORTHAIRSTYLESFEMSHEPI.moddesc: A variety of shorter hairstyles by MoooD converted from the Sims for Femshep.

DLC_MOD_SHORTNOTIFICATIONS.moddesc: Reduces the duration of popup notifications.

DLC_MOD_SHPTANKSLE2.moddesc: Adds new tank top outfits to casual appearance for both Female & Male Shepard. Includes optional additional casual outfits for FemShep. For MELE2 and MELE3.

DLC_MOD_SILENTKELLY.moddesc: Removes Kelly's reminders about unread messages.

DLC_MOD_SKIPPRONOR.moddesc: Skips right to the character creator when starting a new game.

DLC_MOD_SMALLERGAMEPADDEADZONE.moddesc: This mod reduces the gamepad "look" stick's deadzone size, greatly improving sniper rifle fine aim control.

DLC_MOD_SMALLNOTIF.moddesc: Reduces the size of ME2's notifications and moves them closer to the bottom right corner.

DLC_MOD_SMELLTHEROSES_SLOW_DOWN_WALK_LE2.moddesc: Have you ever wished Shepard would slow down, take a breath, and just smell the roses instead of rushing headlong through every hub and mission? Well now they can! Take in the sights and sounds, and when you are ready, you can even resume running at a quicker pace than before!

DLC_MOD_SMOOTHERGUI_LE2.moddesc: This mod increases the fps in the menus and other GUI animations from LE2.

DLC_MOD_SOLDIERLOADOUT.moddesc: Makes all classes have same weapons loadout as Soldier.

DLC_MOD_SPECIAL_WEAPONS.modname: WiredTexan's Special Weapons for All for LE2
DLC_MOD_SPECIAL_WEAPONS.moddesc: Ever wish you could access the Claymore, Revenant or Widow before the mission on the Collector Ship? How about from the beginning of the game? Wished squadmates could use these weapons? This mod may be for you. Unlocks the Claymore, Revenant and Widow for Shepard and squadmates with access to these weapons' classes.

DLC_MOD_SPECTRE_HOODIE.moddesc: Gives Shepard a Spectre version of the N7 hoodie as a casual.  Works for both male and fem Sheps.

DLC_MOD_SPEEDUN.moddesc: Contains tweaks used by runners in the Mass Effect 2 Speedrun.

DLC_MOD_SRV.moddesc: A mod that adds new powers to the squadmates in ME2 Legendary Edition.

DLC_MOD_STARCRAFT_STYLE_GHOST_INFILTRATO.moddesc:
To all but a few top Alliance officials, Ghosts do not exist, even unofficially. . .
-o-o-o-o-o-
This mod changes the Infiltrator class to resemble Ghosts from the StarCraft franchise.

DLC_MOD_STEAM_CONTROLLER.moddesc: This mod improves the game experience when using xinput and kbm inputs at the same time, such as with the Steam Controller.

DLC_MOD_STOCKMARKET.moddesc: The Nos Astra Mineral Exchange offers the opportunity to trade commodities such as palladium, iridium, platinum, element zero and galactic standard currency on competitive terms, for only a modest financial commitment! Sign up for an account today! Public trading terminals are available near the entrance to the Illium docks.

DLC_MOD_STORM_IMPROVEMENTS.moddesc: This allows for sprinting by tapping a button rather than holding for LE2 and LE3, and decreases the delay after sprinting before you can do other things.

DLC_MOD_SUBTLE_FACES_LE2.modname: Subtle Faces for Quarians (and Tali) - LE2
DLC_MOD_SUBTLE_FACES_LE2.moddesc:
More visible and detailed face for Tali'Zorah and ((some)) other Quarians.
New textures and fully animated face meshes.

DLC_MOD_SURVIVE.moddesc: Survive the suicide mission after killing your entire squad. Keep playing, and import your tragedy into Mass Effect 3!

DLC_MOD_SUSELNORA.moddesc: Don't even give her a chance to make excuses, just open fire!

DLC_MOD_TACCAM.moddesc: Ever get tired of the pause menu being so.... useless? Ever felt like the Dragon Age camera would be way cooler? Well here you go, this mod allows you to enter tactical camera mode and move it freely around your characters to cast your powers on ennemies, see exactly where they are, and prepare your attack plan accordingly.

DLC_MOD_TALIFACE.moddesc: Overhaul of Tali's LE2 appearance with a completely new, fully animated face.

DLC_MOD_TALIMASTERLE2.moddesc: This DLC add Creative Machinima's 3D model of Tali Zorah to LE2

DLC_MOD_TALI_CSTCY_LE1_OTFT.moddesc: Ever preferred Talis Mass Effect 1 Outfit over her sequel ones? No more waiting, here comes the Tali Consistency Mod!
