DLC_MOD_ME3KEYTUNBIND.moddesc: In ME3 to walk you need hold button. With this mod walking is toggle like in ME1 - click once to enable walking (disable jog ), click again to disable walking (enable jog ).

DLC_MOD_ME3NOTSKIPANSWERS.modname: ME3 Skip conversation not select answers
DLC_MOD_ME3NOTSKIPANSWERS.moddesc: Skip dialogues without accidentally selecting response. For skipping dialogues now you can use not only Spacebar but also Escape button.

DLC_MOD_ME3PATCH.moddesc: The Unofficial Mass Effect 3 Patch (UME3P) introduces a large amount of bug fixes, polish and visual corrections for the entire game.

DLC_MOD_ME3POWERSPENETRATESHIELD.moddesc: Biotic and tech powers penetrate shields

DLC_MOD_ME3RE.moddesc: ME3Recalibrated (ME3Re) is a series of bug fixes, content restorations, and lore corrections for Mass Effect 3. Edits are in the spirit of the "unofficial patches" for TES games, and efforts will be made to retain compatibility with other mods. For this reason, ME3Re will never modify LI-specific dialogue (BackOff), content related to Thane (ThaneMOD), the galaxy map (GMM), and late end game/epilogue files (edited by various ending mods).

DLC_MOD_ME3SEPARATEOMNI.moddesc: ME3 Separate Use Cover Sprint - choose whatever keys you want. In menu Next_weapon = cover, Previous_weapon = sprint, Use/Sprint/Cover = solely Use.

DLC_MOD_ME3SEPARATEOMNIMP.modname: ME3 Separate Use Cover Sprint - MP
DLC_MOD_ME3SEPARATEOMNIMP.moddesc: ME3 Separate Use Cover Sprint - choose whatever keys you want. In menu Next_weapon = cover, Previous_weapon = sprint, Use/Sprint/Cover = solely Use.

DLC_MOD_ME3SHIELDGATE.moddesc: Now you can tweak Shield Gate mechanic to your liking. You can turn it off or change percentage of it to 25/50/75/100%

DLC_MOD_ME3TIMESPEEDBUTTON.moddesc: 10x Time Speed Button ( useful for skipping things ). Choose version with LeftAlt or MiddleMouseButton (hold button to 10x speed up time )

DLC_MOD_ME3TOGGLEWALK.moddesc: In ME3 to walk you need hold button. With this mod walking is toggle like in ME1 - click once to enable walking (disable jog ), click again to disable walking (enable jog ).

DLC_MOD_MEM.moddesc: Change powers of Miranda to be more in line with her ME2 counterpart and the regular Squadmates to fit perfectly the awesome Miranda Mod.

DLC_MOD_MEU3.moddesc: The original Mass Effect trilogy UI does not work well with 21:9 ultrawide resolutions. Flawless Widescreen improves support but does not properly scale the UI. The goal of my mod is to fix the problems and properly scale the game's GUI to 21:9 ultrawide resolutions.

DLC_MOD_MIRI.moddesc: If I was running from a pan-galactic terrorist organization or wanted by the government of most of humanity, the first thing I would do is change my look. I would not wear the same outfit minus the logo of the organization I'm running from. Unfortunately, Bioware didn't implement this way of thinking when designing Miranda in Mass Effect 3. This mod was made to allieviate this immersion breaking flaw. Miranda now wears a different outfit everytime you see her in a casual setting. Citadel DLC is included and she gets a more unique dress for the casino date as well. She can also change her hair and dye it depending on which version you are using. In addition, this mod also removes the unsuitable butt shots from the second conversation in game. Finally, Miranda's second email has been edited to make more sense with the game's story. Currently, there are 3 versions. The first version uses Miranda's vanilla haircut. The second version gives Miranda new haircuts everytime you see her, but her hair color remains the same. The third version changes Miranda's hair and hair color everytime you see her.

DLC_MOD_MIRIARMOR.moddesc: This mod modifies Miranda's combat attire during the Horizon mission, Earth Holo conversation and the Citadel DLC Arena.

DLC_MOD_MPMAPPACK.moddesc: Mass Effect 3: Redemption adds 8 new maps to Mass Effect 3: Multiplayer.

DLC_MOD_MPMAPPACK2.modname: Proof of Concept: Co-Op Campaign Missions
DLC_MOD_MPMAPPACK2.moddesc:
THIS IS A PROOF OF CONCEPT. I HAVE NO INTENTIONS OF EVER FINISHING OR EVEN FIXING UP THIS MOD.

Co-Op Campaign Proof of Concept. Ensure all players stay within tight proximity to avoid unloading the area under the host player, or everyone will encounter heavy glitches. All players should be knowledgable of how to use the console to get around stage-specific issues. Not compatible with Redemption or Rejection DLC. See level walkthrough videos on the mod page for guidance on how to play each level.

DLC_MOD_MP_EXTRAS.moddesc: Mass Effect 3: Rejection brings a new faction of rejected enemies to Mass Effect 3 Multiplayer, the Rejects!

DLC_MOD_MP_POWER_DESCRIPTIONS.moddesc: Corrects false, misleading or incomplete descriptions of powers and equipment.

DLC_MOD_NBC.moddesc: Removes a romanced Kaidan's pointed accusation of "cheating" towards a female Shepard who had a relationship in Mass Effect 2. Allows a female Shepard who had a relationship in ME2 to rekindle with Kaidan in peace.

DLC_MOD_OPREMASTER.moddesc: ME3 Opening Remaster aims to improve the opening cinematic of Mass Effect 3, by bringing back barely known extended cinematic from a glitched ME3 Xbox demo.

DLC_MOD_OPTIONALFLIRTINGMOD.moddesc: Adds extra options on the dialogue wheel in ME3 so that Shepard has an actual choice between being friendly or flirty to potential love interests.

DLC_MOD_PEOM_BO_PATCH.moddesc: Compatibilty patch for Priority Earth Overhaul Mod/BackOff.

DLC_MOD_PEOM_EGM.moddesc: Compatibility patch between Expanded Galaxy Mod and Priority Earth Overhaul Mod

DLC_MOD_PIM.moddesc: This mod replaces the Kai Leng shuttle scene during the Cerberus Coup with an introduction scene for the Phantom.

DLC_MOD_PLATINUMDIFFICULTY.moddesc: Simple mod that change Insanity difficulty into Platinum difficulty from multi-player (which is harder)

DLC_MOD_PROJECTVARIETY.moddesc:
Project Variety is a significant overhaul of Mass Effect 3. It is aimed to fix everything that I found annoying about the game. Everything from the Citadelâ€™s population, to the weapons the Shepard and company uses during the cutscenes, and much much more have been modified.

The goal is to make Mass Effect 3 feel more unique than it was before. With the amount of pccs the mod modifies sitting around 291, it is the biggest DLC mod for Mass Effect 3 in terms of file size.

DLC_MOD_PROJECTVARIETYE.moddesc: Anything that has (Optional) next to it has been moved here. For a complete list please read the Project Variety 2.0: A New Chapter Article on NexusMods.

DLC_MOD_PROJECTVARIETYP.moddesc:
This mod contains the DLC mod patch and all the other patch files you need to make Project Variety compatible with other mods. The compatibility section is in the articles tab.

NOTE: YOU MUST MANUALLY CONFIGURE THIS PATCH. DO NOT JUST BLINDLY INSTALL THIS MOD.

DLC_MOD_RELAYBG.moddesc:
This mod removes the 9 second long animation that plays whenever you travel to a different system by using a Mass Relay, saving you valuable time and nerves. Travel between systems will be instant.
This mod will be installed as a custom DLC, allowing for easy installation and removal without altering any of your files.


This mod is incompatible with the Expanded Galaxy Mod and any mod that builds upon it, or any other mod that modifies BioD_Nor_203CIC.pcc.

Exception to this is the SP Controller Mod, which can be made compatible via Mod Manager's GUI compatibility patch generation tool.

DLC_MOD_RESCULPTED.moddesc: This mod brings all new hand sculpted meshes to the ME3 to replace the existing femshep casual outfits. This will not only affect all of femsheps base game casual outfits but it will replace some outfits used by the female NPCs.

DLC_MOD_RESCULPTED_BUFF.moddesc:
This mod brings all new hand sculpted meshes to the ME3 to replace the existing femshep casual outfits. This will not only affect all of femsheps base game casual outfits but it will replace some outfits used by the female NPCs.


This is the same as the main mod except select outfits have more defined muscles (especially the arms).

DLC_MOD_RESPAWN.moddesc: In light of mods such as Expanded Galaxy Mod and the Bonus Power Packs, the aim of this module is to make Mass Effect 3 a more difficult game to play through and to attempt to make each of the three enemy factions feel a little different. These changes end up forcing a player to be more tactical in battle as your resources are more limited and your enemies more numerous and  dangerous. This is a single module of my edits listed under the name "Mass Horizons", the next should be a story expansion for the Spectre Terminal. All of these will be released under a single banner eventually.

DLC_MOD_RESPAWNN7.moddesc: This is a separate submod for those users that do not have EGM ArkMod installed. This contains Respawn edits for a number of the N7 missions.

DLC_MOD_RESTORATION_MIRANDA.moddesc: Replaces Miranda's hair with her original Mass Effect 2 version.

DLC_MOD_RESTORATION_MIRANDAP.moddesc: Compatibility patches for Restoration Project: Miranda

DLC_MOD_RF.moddesc: Revamped Biotic Flare power with 2 options, balanced and godly. Gives new attributes and stats to flare bonus power.

DLC_MOD_RPRENG.moddesc: This mod replaces all Reaper Capital ships with the Thomas the Reaper Engines. Install this mod and behold as they assume control and lay destruction throughout the galaxy.

DLC_MOD_SAMARAARMOR.moddesc: Samara's outfit has always been a problem for me. What type of warrior monk wears that "armor". The cleavage makes her look so skimpy. That is where this mods comes in. Samara will now be wearing armor in places where it makes sense. These places are the monastery, Earth, and the Citadel Arena. That's not all however. She also gets a new casual outfit in places that suit it. These places are the apartment in Citadel DLC and the Citadel Embassy.

DLC_MOD_SAMEGENDER.moddesc: This mod fixes various issues with imported same-gender romances with Ashley, Kaidan, Tali, and Thane, focusing on immersion and restoring unused content.

DLC_MOD_SAMESEX.moddesc: This mod fixes various issues with imported same-sex romances with Ashley, Kaidan, Tali, and Thane, focusing on immersion and restoring unused content.

DLC_MOD_SAREN_AS_GARRUS.moddesc: This mod swaps Saren's head mesh to Garrus. Option to also swap his armour to others This is for those who like the character Saren and want to see it happen in game. The voice and story is still completely Garrus. This is just a visual change.

DLC_MOD_SAVE.moddesc: This mod raises the limit from 50 individual saves to 5000.

DLC_MOD_SEMWEAPON.moddesc: This is a submod for Spectre Expansion Mod for those users who do not use the Project Variety mod.

DLC_MOD_SHEPCUTOFF.moddesc:
This is a recreation of just-jasper's cutoff hoodie, requested by qaskew24.

This mod is for Shepard.

DLC_MOD_SILENTTRAYNOR.moddesc: Removes Traynor's reminders about unread messages.

DLC_MOD_SLIMN7TYPHOON.moddesc: The Slim N7 Typhoon mod removes the ridiculous, unpractical and form-destroying 'faceshield' that sullies the N7 Typhoon.

DLC_MOD_SPECTRE.moddesc: The purpose of Mass Horizons - Spectre is to improve the under used Shadow Broker and Spectre terminals, to give the player new difficult choices to consider via Spectre authorisations, to improve the presence of background races in ME3, to expand the galaxy map and provide clues to the battles happening beyond the scope of Shepardâ€™s missions.

DLC_MOD_SRV.moddesc: Changes the ME3 squadmates (and Citadel companions) powers

DLC_MOD_SSC.moddesc: Shepard Saves Christmas is a fun intermission in the midst of the Reaper War. Help Specialist Samantha Traynor to save Christmas by finding all the gifts spread around the Normandy! Only Commander Shepard can save the Holidays spirit!

DLC_MOD_SSCC.moddesc: Shepard Saves Christmas is a fun intermission in the midst of the Reaper War. Help Specialist Samantha Traynor to save Christmas by finding all the gifts spread around the Normandy! Only Commander Shepard can save the Holidays spirit!

DLC_MOD_STEAM_CONTROLLER.moddesc: Allows for gamepad and mouse/keyboard controls at the same time. Useful for Steam Controller, Steam Deck, or other unusual control schemes.

DLC_MOD_STORM_IMPROVEMENTS.moddesc: Adds a tap (rather than hold) to sprint button. Works with mouse/keyboard and controller, and in both single player and multiplayer. Also optionally improves camera/character control while sprinting while using a controller.

DLC_MOD_SWAT.moddesc:
SWAT makes changes to your squad's weaponry behavior and other AI tweaks to enhance your game play.

FEATURES:
01. Squadmates will use an entire thermal clip while in cover instead of the default that limits them to 2-4 shot bursts and slower rate of fire (includes custom DLCs). Includes some bug fixes for guns.
02. Maximized planet-scanning radius.
03. Increased combat drone base shield.
04. Increased protection drone duration.
05. Increased sentry turret base shield.
06. Virtual gun ammo capacity increased to 500 (Geth Server mission).
07. Config file for adding powers to your squeadmates (see ReadMe).
08. Increased AF duration.

DLC_MOD_TALI.moddesc: Tali gets a new casual outfit and this applies to the whole game, not just Citadel DLC.

DLC_MOD_TALI_REFLECTIONS.moddesc:
Tali's visor will now have real-time reflections. It's pretty cool. This will hurt your framerate a bit when Tali is around, but it's not a huge hit. As long as your computer isn't really old you should be fine, and if not, just delete the mod.

This only applies to Tali's normal appearance and her alternate appearance, in both combat and non-combat. It does not apply to the alternate appearance added by From Ashes, but that one has very little visor showing so it wouldn't really be noticeable anyway. If you have a DLC mod that adds another Tali appearance, it will not apply to that appearance.

DLC_MOD_TOC.moddesc: The Unofficial Mass Effect 3 Patch (UME3P) fixes bugs, backports changes from the Legendary Edition, introduces soft DLC integration, and restores large amounts of cut content in a careful and selective manner. It also polishes existing content when necessary, in order to provide a smoother game experience and correct minor design flukes.

DLC_MOD_TOURNEY.moddesc: Replaces one of the Armax Arena challenges to create a mini-tournament against other teams of combatants.

DLC_MOD_TRAYNORCIT.moddesc: Traynor gets a new hoodie during parts of Citadel DLC. Those parts would be during the arcade date and the Citadel apartment. It does not effect the Normandy scene or the hot tub scene.

DLC_MOD_TTSREAPERS.moddesc: Replaces the reaper destroyer's dialogue with the text-to-speech voice "WillFromAfar"

DLC_MOD_URZ.moddesc:
Urz on the Normandy (UOTN) is a small, simple mod for Mass Effect 3 that replaces KEI-9 with Urz from ME2 in a lore-friendly way. The original idea for UOTN came from ELE08/UserDomainError's Varren on the Normandy, which despite it's obvious awesomeness, has some drawbacks with technical implementation and immersion.

UOTN should not require the ME3 Collector's Edition, though this is untested. What it does depend on is feeding Urz in ME2, as this is the only way the mod makes sense.

DLC_MOD_USERCHOSENNAME.moddesc: Any mod at priority 31050 is generated by Mod Manager for compatibility between a UI mod and other mods that have been installed. Users generate these mods on their own so that the UI mods can cede their top priority files to the next highest priority one.

DLC_MOD_VCKL.moddesc: The Virmire Casualty Mod replaces Kai Leng with Ashley or Kaidan, depending which one was left on Virmire in Mass Effect 1.

DLC_MOD_WARDROBE.moddesc: The full package version of Tank top and THE jacket mod.

DLC_MOD_WONG.moddesc: Learn Emily Wongâ€™s fate by an email from Diana Allers. Regardless if you allow her on board or reject her immediately. Diana would still send you an email with Emilyâ€™s last messages from the ANN Twitter feed.

DLC_MOD_WORKOUTCLOTHES.modname: Workout clothes as starting clothes for femshep
DLC_MOD_WORKOUTCLOTHES.moddesc: New DLC version of a Model and texture replacement that has femshep wearing workout clothes when they come to get her at the start of ME3. Has normal and dirty version for after the attack.

DLC_MOD_ZAEEDC.moddesc: This mod replaces Zaeed's attire during the Citadel DLC. It also changes his attire during his stay in the refugee camp.

DLC_NKD_LIARA.moddesc: DLC mod for Liara to appear naked as her original NKD body, during all her casual appearances, including Citadel Apt., with pink lipstick & nails.

DLC_NKD_LIARAX.moddesc:
DLC mod for Liara appearing naked as her original NKD body, but wearing modded shoes from her armour,
during all her casual appearances, including Citadel Apt., with pink lipstick & nails.

DLC_ONLINEPASSHIDCE.moddesc: Unlocks the collector's edition content for Mass Effect 3.

DLC_ROM_BLANKET.modname: Ashley Liara and Kaidan Romance Wakeup
DLC_ROM_BLANKET.moddesc: Ashley, Kaidan and Liara when waking up will no longer be covered with the blanket.

DLC_SFX_SELECTOR.moddesc: A small texture mod to remove the interact pointer by making it invisible. Can be used to make cleaner ingame movies.

DLC_TESTPATCH.moddesc: This DLC cannot be unpacked (the game will only use the .sfar version), which is located in the Biogame/Patches/PCConsole folder as Patch_001.sfar. This DLC is loaded immediately at game boot, objects are always persisted in memory, and all items are special patch packages along with a coalesced file.

DLC_TLN_GAR.moddesc: A gift from Shep. Garrus can now wear the armour of the Talons and as a casual too.

DLC_UPD_PATCH01.moddesc: Contains a coalesced that is a subset of the ME3 MP balance changes file. This file's contents are fully contained in the DLC_UPD_Patch02 version. This DLC is automatically downloaded by Origin for all installations.

DLC_UPD_PATCH02.moddesc: Contains a coalesced that is a subset of the ME3 MP balance changes file. This DLC is automatically downloaded by Origin for all installations.

DLC_WPN_CPR.moddesc:
Finally a dream has come true... ...Alliance can now afford to supply Shep with Carnifex sidearm for permanent use. Thus Shep chooses Carnifex!
This mod will overwrite all .pcc files that I know of, so the appearance of Predator Pistol is replaced by the one of the Carnifex.

DLC_CER_02.moddesc: Whatâ€™s better than the latest in high-tech armor? High-tech armor and a sniper rifle, of course! The Aegis Pack adds the M-29 Incisor sniper rifle and the Kestrel armor to Shepardâ€™s armor locker. The Incisor sniper rifle is a burst-fire weapon that excels in destroying enemy shields. The Kestrel armor comes in five pieces: The Kestrel Helmet adds weapon damage, shield strength, and headshot damage. The Kestrel Torso Sheath adds melee and weapon damage and shield strength. Kestrel Arm Sheathing adds melee and weapon damage and shield strength. Kestrel Shoulder Pieces adds shields and melee damage. The Kestrel hip-mounted Power Pack ups shields and heavy weapon ammo capacity. The Aegis Pack â€“ for those times when overkill doesnâ€™t seem like enough.

DLC_CER_ARC.moddesc: Cerberus Arc Projector - Cerberus Network Free DLC

DLC_CON_PACK01.moddesc: Jack straps on a black biker vest, low-slung jeans, and steel-toe boots made for starting riots. Garrus suits up in new military-grade, blue-lit armor equipped with a dual-input communication headset. Thane slips into blood-red reflective shades and a new uniform for blending into the urban shadows.

DLC_CON_PACK02.moddesc: Grunt draws attention (and incoming fire) in his high-tech armor with a dual visor array. Taliâ€™s envirosuit features a reinforced chest-plate, and an interior heads-up-display. And for battle-heavy missions, Miranda steps out in Cerberus armor.

DLC_CON_TALIMASTERME2.moddesc:
This mod is a model replacer for Tali Zorah for ME2.

Due to the timeline of Mass Effect 2, you will notice that the pressurization of Tali's mask is more important in this version than in the last chapter of the trilogy (because of her immune sensitivity).
Following Shepard during the second chapter of the game will be essential to change her quarian's life and strengthens her immune system before getting her new appearance in ME3.

In this way:
- Tali's visor is more opaque, (most of the time you will not see her face as clearly as in the ME3 version of my mod).
- The luminous jewelry (memory of her father) is removed from her headgear in this version.
(Otherwise, if you want to keep the Tali's appearance of ME2 in ME3, I built a new "ME2-like" version, available in my ME3 download section.)

DLC_DHME1.moddesc: This digital comic back-story was created by BioWare and Dark Horse comics. The 15 minute interactive experience allows you to make the key choices of Mass Effect 1. This retelling will also let you have those choices reflected during Mass Effect 2.

DLC_EXP_ADVANCEDENEMIES.moddesc: This mod provides additional abilities and weapons to most of the hostile factions throughout the whole game.

DLC_EXP_LSR.moddesc: This is a remaster of old loading screens to a new modern look + remade load GUI.

DLC_EXP_MDRNWPN.moddesc: Modern Weapon Pack adds 12 new, ready to use weapons, available in the Weapons Locker on the Normandy.

DLC_EXP_PART01.moddesc: Liara Tâ€™Soni is tracking down the mysterious Shadow Broker, and no one is safe. Sheâ€™ll do anything to recover the man the Broker kidnappedâ€¦ and the Shadow Brokerâ€™s agents will do anything to stop her. Team up with Liara and chase clues from the luxurious heights of Illium to the Shadow Brokerâ€™s own secret lair. Adds the Shadow Broker intel center, new research, and five new achievements â€“ and the chance to continue a relationship with Liara.

DLC_EXP_PART02.moddesc: A deep cover operative has gone missing in Batarian space, days after reporting conclusive evidence of an imminent Reaper invasion. Shepard must travel to the edge of the galaxy, rescue the Alliance agent, and discover the truth behind the Arrival. Uncover new research and three new achievements in this spectacular new mission for Mass Effect 2!

DLC_EXP_POWERS.moddesc: Recovered Powers add 4 new bonus power available to Shepard.

DLC_HEN_MT.moddesc: Cerberus has procured the service of Kasumi Goto, the galaxy's most enigmatic master thief. In return for her help, Kasumi has asked Shepard's help on a dangerous heist to infiltrate the vault of a deadly master criminal named Donovan Hock. Gain Kasumi's loyalty on the planet Bekenstein, where Hock is throwing a party for some of the galaxy's richest and most deranged criminal minds to recover data of great importance to Kasumi... and to the galaxy at large. Includes a new squad member, mission, weapon, research upgrade, casual outfit, and achievement.

DLC_HEN_VT.moddesc: Zaeed served in the Alliance military before building a reputation as one of the deadliest guns-for-hire in the Terminus Systems. For 20 years he waged war for profit, but now he wishes to retire from his life of bloodshed and mercenary work. Download Zaeed and his mission on planet Zorya and then utilize his lethal skills to eliminate the Collector threat.

DLC_MCR_01.moddesc: The name says it all! The Firepower Pack adds three spectacular and unique weapons: a laser-sighted hand cannon, a precise and powerful heavy rifle, and the geth's dreaded plasma shotgun!

DLC_MCR_03.moddesc: Cerberus doesnâ€™t just need a hero â€“ they need a one-man army. Thatâ€™s why The Equalizer Pack adds the Capacitor Helmet, Archon Visor, and Inferno Armor to Shepardâ€™s armor locker. The Capacitor Helmet stores power for kinetic barriers, allowing Shepardâ€™s shields to recharge faster. The Archon Visor manages omni-tools and biotic amps, reducing the recharge time of Shepardâ€™s powers. The powered Inferno Armor speeds up Shepardâ€™s movements and increases his tech and biotic power damage. Stress analysis software even gives him an edge in negotiations outside of combat. The Equalizer -- when the armor goes on, the gloves come off.

DLC_MOD_ADVANCEDENEMIES.moddesc: Overhauls many enemies with more powers, new faction classes, improved power usage, shields/barriers/armor regardless of difficulty and more.

DLC_MOD_ALOVRELAYJUMP.moddesc: A completely new relay jump video for ME2, combining a new shot from the incredible PlasmaFLOW with ME3 footage.

DLC_MOD_ARIAMEUITM2MESHFIXES.moddesc: Mesh fixes for Arias neck where the collar would clip into the chest, and small fixes on her leather vest where the leather straps would poke through slightly.

DLC_MOD_ASARIDASH.moddesc: Quickly move between your foes with well-known ME3-style evade, personalized for your character - an Asari Dash for biotics, and a Soldier Roll for the others.

DLC_MOD_BDH.moddesc: Makes loyal Zaeed a successful choice for team leader.

DLC_MOD_BETTERCREWABDUCTIONS.moddesc: "Crew Abductions - Plot Hole Fixed" implements a shockingly simple fix to a decade-old case of poor writing, during which Shepard undertakes an unknown and unnamed mission that is never established or elaborated upon, all for the purpose of getting the crew abducted.

DLC_MOD_BUTT.moddesc: Removes the gratuitous butt shots from Miranda's loyalty conversation.

DLC_MOD_BUTTONS.moddesc: Trigger "ambush" events with a button press. Allows players to delay Horizon, the Collector Ship, Arrival message and the Crew Abduction until a time of their choosing.

DLC_MOD_CASUALHUBS.moddesc: Allows Shepard and squadmates to wear casual clothes on the Citadel, Omega, and Illium, and gives certain squadmates casual appearances on the Normandy.

DLC_MOD_CBL.moddesc:
Finally brings power combos into Mass Effect 2 !!!

Experience the combat system through a whole new dimension,
for hours and hours of the most exciting and carefully balanced fun this side of the remaster.

DLC_MOD_COLORS.modname: New Armor Colors and Casual Outfits
DLC_MOD_COLORS.moddesc: This mod adds 595 new colors to Tint 1, Tint 2, and Pattern Colors in the Armor Customization screen, as well as 36 new casual outfits.

DLC_MOD_COVID85.moddesc: This simple mod changes text references of "the plague" on Omega to COVID-85.

DLC_MOD_CROUCH.moddesc: This mod adds the unused Crouch command to the Left Alt button.

DLC_MOD_CUSTOMTECHBALL.moddesc: Changes the color of Shepard's Combat Drone. Includes 12 color presets and a few custom combinations, as well as instructions on how to make your own custom colors and combos!

DLC_MOD_DEATH.moddesc: This mod changes the "Critical Mission Failure" death message.

DLC_MOD_DMGNUMS.moddesc: Damage Numbers adds dynamic damage indicators to every hit - telling you exactly how much damage each attack dealt.

DLC_MOD_EAS.moddesc: Moves the Statistics of Armor Sets and Pieces to the top of their Descriptions and adds stats to all weapons.

DLC_MOD_ECC.moddesc: New options for Mass Effect2 Character Creator. Plus reworked lighting in Character creation and Squad screens.

DLC_MOD_ECLIPSE.moddesc: This mod adds the full Human Eclipse Mercenary armour to be wearable in Mass Effect 2!

DLC_MOD_EGM_FIXWEAPONSCUTSCENES.modname: EGM Fix Weapons in Cutscenes ME2
DLC_MOD_EGM_FIXWEAPONSCUTSCENES.moddesc: A code fix to ensure that in cutscenes Shepard and the Squad use their own carried rifle or pistol instead of the default Avenger or Predator respectively.

DLC_MOD_ESA.moddesc: Expanded Shepard Armory mod unlocks helmetless versions of the official DLC armors to players who wish to use them and see their Shepard's faces.

DLC_MOD_ESA_SRE.moddesc: Expanded Shepard Armory mod Speedrunning Edition adds new additional casual outfits to speedrunners, free of ingame purchase. No armors are included.

DLC_MOD_FEMSHEP_APPEARANCE.moddesc: Port of ME3's Default Femshep headmorph into ME2.

DLC_MOD_FJRM.modname: FemShep & Jack Romance Mod for ME2
DLC_MOD_FJRM.moddesc: FemShep & Jack Romance Mod for ME2 adds the ability for FemShep players to romance Jack in ME2. This mod unlocks unused romance audio and re-purposes dialogue from other areas of the game to replace all romance dialogue that was never recorded for FemShep.

DLC_MOD_FMRM.modname: FemShep & Miranda Romance Mod for ME2
DLC_MOD_FMRM.moddesc: FemShep & Miranda Romance Mod for ME2 adds the ability for FemShep players to romance Miranda in ME2. This mod unlocks unused romance audio and re-purposes dialogue from other areas of the game to replace all romance dialogue that was never recorded for FemShep.

DLC_MOD_FPMCOMBAT.moddesc: This mod makes Exploration Mode First Person, instead of Third.

DLC_MOD_GIDUM.moddesc: Genesis Intro Dialogue Undo Mod undoes the changes BioWare made to ME2's opening cutscene with Illusive Man and Miranda that Genesis 1 changed by lifting random lines from other files.

DLC_MOD_GRUNT_MEUITM_BLUR.moddesc: Mesh Mod Which makes tweaks to Grunt to make his proportions better match the Blur Studio version of Grunt. Designed to be used in conjunction with Blur studios tribute textures in MEUITM2.

DLC_MOD_HMX_ARM_ME3.moddesc: Adds ME3's exclusive armour parts to ME2.

DLC_MOD_INTEROP.moddesc: This 'mod' is only used by ME3Explorer, to allow the toolset to interact with the game. It should only be installed by ME3Explorer and does nothing on it's own.

DLC_MOD_JACKHAIR.moddesc: Makes Jack's ponytail fro Mass Effect 3 available for FemShep, but as a DLC this time! And with THE HAIR TIE!! PLUS CHARACTER CREATION!!!!!!!!

DLC_MOD_JACK_MEUITM2_BLUR_TRIBUTE.moddesc: Blur Studio style mesh mod designed to used with MEUITM2 textures to reproduce the look of Jack from the Blur promo material.

DLC_MOD_JOKER_CERBERUS_FATIGUES.moddesc: Fixes a vanilla bug which had Joker wearing Alliance fatigues during the cutscene arriving to the Flotilla. He will be wearing Cerberus fatigues now as intended.

DLC_MOD_KAA.moddesc: Adjusts angles of Kasumi's car ride to show less of Shep's boobs, BioWare Style.

DLC_MOD_LIARAARMORS.modname: Liara's Mass Effect 1 Armors for LotSB
DLC_MOD_LIARAARMORS.moddesc: Replaces Liara's vanilla outfit in LotSB with a collection of Mass Effect 1 armors.

DLC_MOD_LIARALOTSB_EYES.modname: Liara's DLC eyes for Vanilla (Eyes Only)
DLC_MOD_LIARALOTSB_EYES.moddesc: This mod changes Liara's vanilla eyes with the version presented in the DLC "Lair of the Shadow Broker".

DLC_MOD_LIARALOTSB_EYESFACE.modname: Liara's DLC eyes for Vanilla (Eyes and Face)
DLC_MOD_LIARALOTSB_EYESFACE.moddesc: This mod changes Liara's vanilla eyes and face with the version presented in the DLC "Lair of the Shadow Broker".

DLC_MOD_ME2AIDISTANCEACCURACY.moddesc: Some people complain that accuracy of enemies is too high and it is hard to survive even when running from one to another cover position. ME2 Enemies accuracy is indeed quite pinpoint (more precise than in ME3 and ME1 ) and with this mod you can tweak it. You will have bigger chance to stay alive while under enemy fire.

DLC_MOD_ME2AILEVELSACCURACY.moddesc: Some people complain that accuracy of enemies is too high and it is hard to survive even when running from one to another cover position. ME2 Enemies accuracy is indeed quite pinpoint (more precise than in ME3 and ME1 ) and with this mod you can tweak it. You will have bigger chance to stay alive while under enemy fire.

DLC_MOD_ME2AIMOVEACCURACY.moddesc: Some people complain that accuracy of enemies is too high and it is hard to survive even when running from one to another cover position. ME2 Enemies accuracy is indeed quite pinpoint (more precise than in ME3 and ME1 ) and with this mod you can tweak it. You will have bigger chance to stay alive while under enemy fire.

DLC_MOD_ME2ALMOSTUNLIMITEDGUNS.moddesc: Do you want use all weapons for any class? Now you can with this mod. Only limitation is that at once you can equip only 5 any guns (you can change it before starting missions or in weapons locker in Normandy and in other lockers what can be found on many missions ).

DLC_MOD_ME2AUTOCOVEROFF.moddesc: Are you sick of getting in cover when you don't want to? Install this mod and to get cover you would need click button.

DLC_MOD_ME2CREDITSIMPORT.moddesc: When you start Mass Effect 2, are you happy with max only 100.000 credits transferred from ME1? Do you hate that you have much grind for credits? This mod allows you to choose different values. Also you can change amount of 2nd Playthrough reward.

DLC_MOD_ME2CREDITSIMPORT2NDPLAY.moddesc: When you start Mass Effect 2, are you happy with max only 100.000 credits transferred from ME1? Do you hate that you have much grind for credits? This mod allows you to choose different values. Also you can change amount of 2nd Playthrough reward.

DLC_MOD_ME2CROUCHACCURACY.moddesc: Do you want crouch like in ME1? This mod adds it (choose toggle or hold version and choose key you want for it ).

DLC_MOD_ME2CROUCHING.moddesc: Do you want crouch like in ME1? This mod adds it (choose toggle or hold version and choose key you want for it ).

DLC_MOD_ME2DECALSSTAY.moddesc: Decals staying for increased time (at default disappear after 10seconds ). Works for example for bullet holes in glass.

DLC_MOD_ME2DIFFICULTYLEVELS.moddesc:
Now you can play with any difficulty with customized value of bonuses for enemies (whatever if enemies feel too weak or too strong for you - with this mod you can tweak it ).
You want more interesting and tougher gameplay? You can enable enemies shield regeneration like in ME1/ME3 - this is more lore friendly and enrich gameplay

DLC_MOD_ME2ENEMIESARMORREGEN.moddesc:
Now you can play with any difficulty with customized value of bonuses for enemies (whatever if enemies feel too weak or too strong for you - with this mod you can tweak it ).
You want more interesting and tougher gameplay? You can enable enemies shield regeneration like in ME1/ME3 - this is more lore friendly and enrich gameplay

DLC_MOD_ME2ENEMIESARMOURGATE.moddesc:
These are 2 mods. One is: Enemies have more health at Insanity difficulty level (different versions ).
If you like Shield Gate mechanic in ME3 for enemies you can turn it on for enemies in ME2 to increase difficulty (if you want you can also enable Barrier Gate and/or Armour Gate ).

DLC_MOD_ME2ENEMIESBARRIERGATE.moddesc:
These are 2 mods. One is: Enemies have more health at Insanity difficulty level (different versions ).
If you like Shield Gate mechanic in ME3 for enemies you can turn it on for enemies in ME2 to increase difficulty (if you want you can also enable Barrier Gate and/or Armour Gate ).

Now you can play with any difficulty with customized value of bonuses for enemies (whatever if enemies feel too weak or too strong for you - with this mod you can tweak it ).
You want more interesting and tougher gameplay? You can enable enemies shield regeneration like in ME1/ME3 - this is more lore friendly and enrich gameplay

DLC_MOD_ME2ENEMIESGETHREGENOFF.moddesc:
Now you can play with any difficulty with customized value of bonuses for enemies (whatever if enemies feel too weak or too strong for you - with this mod you can tweak it ).
You want more interesting and tougher gameplay? You can enable enemies shield regeneration like in ME1/ME3 - this is more lore friendly and enrich gameplay

DLC_MOD_ME2ENEMIESSHIELDGATE.moddesc:
These are 2 mods. One is: Enemies have more health at Insanity difficulty level (different versions ).
If you like Shield Gate mechanic in ME3 for enemies you can turn it on for enemies in ME2 to increase difficulty (if you want you can also enable Barrier Gate and/or Armour Gate ).

Now you can play with any difficulty with customized value of bonuses for enemies (whatever if enemies feel too weak or too strong for you - with this mod you can tweak it ).
You want more interesting and tougher gameplay? You can enable enemies shield regeneration like in ME1/ME3 - this is more lore friendly and enrich gameplay

DLC_MOD_ME2ENEMYHEALTH.modname: ME2 Enemies more health - ver. Insanity2
DLC_MOD_ME2ENEMYHEALTH.moddesc:
These are 2 mods. One is: Enemies have more health at Insanity difficulty level (different versions ).
If you like Shield Gate mechanic in ME3 for enemies you can turn it on for enemies in ME2 to increase difficulty (if you want you can also enable Barrier Gate and/or Armour Gate ).

DLC_MOD_ME2GETHSHIELDGATEOFF.moddesc:
These are 2 mods. One is: Enemies have more health at Insanity difficulty level (different versions ).
If you like Shield Gate mechanic in ME3 for enemies you can turn it on for enemies in ME2 to increase difficulty (if you want you can also enable Barrier Gate and/or Armour Gate ).

DLC_MOD_ME2HEALTHREGENERATION.moddesc: How many time you need to use Medigel? With default health regeneration, medigel wasn't much needed. This mod allows you to increase time of health regeneration (many options ). Now medigel will have more purpose.

DLC_MOD_ME2HEALTHUPGRADE.modname: ME2 Medigel Upgrade for Health Regen
DLC_MOD_ME2HEALTHUPGRADE.moddesc: How many time you need to use Medigel? With default health regeneration, medigel wasn't much needed. This mod allows you to increase time of health regeneration (many options ). Now medigel will have more purpose.

DLC_MOD_ME2INFINITESPRINT.moddesc: Unlimited sprint in and out of combat. At default Shepard could run about 25meters or something like this so it is definitely not much for heavy trained/enhanced military person. Values of sprinting are changed to those from default Mass Effect 3. So you will never get tired when sprinting.

DLC_MOD_ME2NEWUPGRADES.moddesc: In game there are two upgrades what are hidden and can't be accessed. This mod gives you those upgrades. You can choose version with both of them or version with only Cyclonic Array or Bovine Fortitude.

DLC_MOD_ME2NOTSKIPANSWERS.modname: ME2 Skip dialogues without choose answer
DLC_MOD_ME2NOTSKIPANSWERS.moddesc: Skip dialogues without accidentally selecting response. For skipping dialogues now you can use not only Spacebar but also Escape button.

DLC_MOD_ME2NOWEAPONAUTOSWAP.modname: ME2 No auto weapon swap when gun empty
DLC_MOD_ME2NOWEAPONAUTOSWAP.moddesc: This mod change that when you run out of ammo the weapon will not be changed automatically to another one (the same like is default in ME3 ).

DLC_MOD_ME2POWERSPENETRATESHIELD.modname: Tech and Biotic Powers Penetrate Shields
DLC_MOD_ME2POWERSPENETRATESHIELD.moddesc: Tech and Biotic Powers Penetrate Shields like in Mass Effect 1. Shields no more blocking powers so you can use powers more easily.

DLC_MOD_ME2RANDOMIZER.moddesc: Mass Effect 2 Randomizer is a randomizer for... Mass Effect 2.

DLC_MOD_ME2RE.moddesc: ME2Recalibrated (ME2Re) is an overhaul for Mass Effect 2 that fixes bugs and broken lore, rectifies poorly implemented content, restores cut material, and in a few small cases, adds new content to the game.

DLC_MOD_ME2RESOURCESIMPORT.moddesc: This mod allows in Mass Effect2 to increase bonuses for Resources from importing game from Mass Effect 1. If you feel that bonuses are not enough then this mod is for you (many options to choose ).

DLC_MOD_ME2RESOURCESREMOVEBONUS.moddesc: This mod allows in Mass Effect2 to increase bonuses for Resources from importing game from Mass Effect 1. If you feel that bonuses are not enough then this mod is for you (many options to choose ).

DLC_MOD_ME2SEPARATEOMNI.moddesc: ME2 Separate Use Cover Sprint - choose whatever keys you want. In menu Next_weapon = cover, Previous_weapon = sprint, Use/Cover/Storm = solely Use.

DLC_MOD_ME2TIMESPEEDBUTTON.modname: ME2 10x Time Speed Up Button LeftAlt
DLC_MOD_ME2TIMESPEEDBUTTON.moddesc: 10x Time Speed Button ( useful for skipping things ). Choose version with LeftAlt or MiddleMouseButton (hold button to 10x speed up time )

DLC_MOD_ME2TOGGLEWALK.moddesc: In ME2 to walk you need hold button. With this mod walking is toggle like in ME1 - click once to enable walking (disable jog ), click again to disable walking (enable jog ).

DLC_MOD_MIRANDAMEUITM2MESHFIXES.moddesc: Illusive man mesh changes to try and reproduce the look of the illusive man Blur Studio version seen in the trailers and promo video for Mass Effect 2.

DLC_MOD_MORDINBSMM.modname: Mordin Blur Studio Tribute Mesh Mod
DLC_MOD_MORDINBSMM.moddesc: Mesh changes to be used in conjunction (though not necessary) with MEUITM2 designed to replicate the Blur Studio version of Mordin from the Game trailers and commercials.

DLC_MOD_NAC.moddesc: This mod adds 595 new colors to Tint 1, Tint 2, and Pattern Colors in the Armor Customization screen.

DLC_MOD_NACCO.modname: New Armor Colors and Casual Outfits
DLC_MOD_NACCO.moddesc: This mod adds 595 new colors to Tint 1, Tint 2, and Pattern Colors in the Armor Customization screen, as well as 36 new casual outfits.

DLC_MOD_NEWARMOURSAMARA.moddesc:
Does Samaraâ€™s armour scare the living piss out of you? Do you fear for her safety, exposing her heart like that?

How about a Commando aesthetic instead?

DLC_MOD_NOGUNS.modname: No Guns - A Challenge Run Mod
DLC_MOD_NOGUNS.moddesc: Adds a Melee ability to your character. Adds an Empty Weapon Slots. Press "F1" to throw your weapon away.

DLC_MOD_NOSNIPERSLOMO.moddesc: Removes the time dilation caused by the Infiltrator's Operative power.

DLC_MOD_OFFICERCHAMBERS.moddesc: Swaps Kelly Chambers's casual outfit with a Cerberus Officer outfit

DLC_MOD_OFMME2.moddesc: Attempts to make which options pursue a romance clearer and open up platonic options to Shepard regardless of gender.

DLC_MOD_ORIANA.moddesc: Small lore-friendly mod that changes Oriana's face into Miranda's, so they actually look like twins.

DLC_MOD_OWO.modname: Mass Ewwect 2 - An OwO Conversion Mod
DLC_MOD_OWO.moddesc: This mod converts every string of text in the game into Furry OwO Speak.

DLC_MOD_PV_ME2.moddesc: Project Variety for ME2 is a major bug fix and overhaul mod for the original Mass Effect 2. Compatibility and lore accuracy is its foundations as well as transparency.

DLC_MOD_RECRUIT.moddesc: Allows early recruitment of Thane, Samara and Tali. Thane, Samara and the Illium Hub are available immediately after Freedom's Progress. Tali is available before Horizon.

DLC_MOD_RELAYJUMP.moddesc: A completely new relay jump video for ME2, combining a new shot from the incredible PlasmaFLOW with ME3 footage.

DLC_MOD_RISKYSUICIDE.moddesc: Overhaul of the survival mechanics during the suicide mission.

DLC_MOD_SAMEGENDER.moddesc: This mod allows Tali and Thane to be romanced by both male and female Shepard, utilizing unused dialogue in the game files. It also fixes issues with imported same-gender Ashley and Kaidan romances and allows and restores other same-gender content whenever possible.

DLC_MOD_SAMESEX.moddesc: This mod allows Tali and Thane to be romanced by both male and female Shepard, utilizing unused dialogue in the game files. It also fixes issues with imported same-gender Ashley and Kaidan romances and allows and restores other same-gender content whenever possible.

DLC_MOD_SILENTKELLY.moddesc: Removes Kelly's reminders about unread messages.

DLC_MOD_SONIC.moddesc: Adds a new Sonic and Shadow Helmets to the game that increases storm speed by 10% and weapon or power damage depending on the helmet.

DLC_MOD_SPEEDRUN.moddesc: Contains all the modifications we use in the speedrun.

DLC_MOD_SRV.moddesc: Changes the Mass Effect 2 squadmates powers to make them much more efficient on an insanity playthrough.

DLC_MOD_THANEMEUITMEYEFIX.moddesc: This mod add HD textures and meshes to restore Bioware's intended vision for Thane by fixing 2 vanilla bugs

DLC_MOD_TIM.moddesc: This mod simply replaces Dancing Kelly as TIM. It's not a serious mod, but more of a crazy request someone had and which I said why not?

DLC_MOD_TIMBLUR.modname: T.I.M. Blur Studios Tribute Mesh Mod
DLC_MOD_TIMBLUR.moddesc: Illusive man mesh changes to try and reproduce the look of the illusive man Blur Studio version seen in the trailers and promo video for Mass Effect 2.

DLC_MOD_WPNICONFIX.modname: ME2 DLC Weapons - HUD Icon Fix
DLC_MOD_WPNICONFIX.moddesc: Annoyed that your weapon icons for the M-29 Incisor, M-22 Eviscerator, and Collector Assault Rifle are positioned low and out of place on your HUD? Well worry no more, because this simple mod will fix those icons right up. Literally.

DLC_PRE_CERBERUS.moddesc: Cerberus Weapon and Armor - Cerberus Network Free DLC

DLC_PRE_COLLECTORS.moddesc: Collector's Weapon and Armor - Preorder bonus

DLC_PRE_DA.moddesc: Blood Dragon Armor for Mass Effect 2 - Preorder bonus

DLC_PRE_GAMESTOP.moddesc: Includes the Terminus Assault Armor and the M-490 Blackstorm weapon.

DLC_PRE_INCISOR.moddesc: Incisor sniper rifle DLC - Preorder bonus

DLC_PRO_GULP01.moddesc:
This visor works with the Sentry system, a software application that optimizes an armor suit's microframe computer. When the Sentry system is running, more power can be devoted to shield management.

Increases shield strength by 5%

DLC_PRO_PEPPER01.moddesc:
A next-generation night-vision device that assists targeting. By detecting the focal point of the wearer's eyes and enhancing the image at that location, the visor helps direct a biotic power or a shot from an omni-tool exactly where the wearer is looking.

Increases power damage by 5%

DLC_PRO_PEPPER02.moddesc:
A hood issued to covert action teams, this model's optic display interfaces with most small arms' auto-targeting software, linking hand and eye for improved accuracy and increased weapon damage. Ballistic-mesh fabric and composite ceramic plating provide necessary armor, and the integral air filter helps in hostile environments.

Increases weapon damage by 5%

DLC_UNC_HAMMER01.moddesc: Adds 5 new missions featuring the Hammerhead. The Hammerhead is a heavy assault vehicle that hovers over the battlefield at up to 120 kilometers per hour and features a guided missile system ensuring accuracy even during aggressive maneuvering.

DLC_UNC_MOMENT01.moddesc: Explore the crash site of the SSV Normandy as Commander Shepard is asked by Alliance Command to explore the site and recover the remains of missing crew members and place a monument on the site. Alliance Command wants Shepard to be the first to walk on the site as Shepard was the vessel's last commanding officer.

DLC_UNC_PACK01.moddesc: When sent to investigate a Cerberus research base that's mysteriously gone silent, Shepard arrives to find Geth overrunning the base. The sole survivor, Chief Scientist Archer, paints a dire picture: an experiment to fuse a human volunteer with a virtual intelligence created a dangerous hybrid "VI overlord". The rampaging VI has already attacked three other Cerberus bases, controlling any technology it finds in an attempt to break freeâ€“and unleashing Geth across the planet. Unless Shepard can infiltrate the VI's fortress and shut it down, this homicidal intelligence will beam itself-off planet and wreak havoc on other systems. The action unfolds over five new level areas, with two new achievements.
