DLC_MOD_AACAT6.moddesc: This mod edits Armax Arena so that instead of fighting against Cerberus, you are fighting against the CAT6 Mercenaries from Citadel DLC.

DLC_MOD_ABM.moddesc: Adds 6 Breather Mask options for the default N7 Helmet.

DLC_MOD_ABS.moddesc: Over 100+ bed sheets for your cabin! Change them on the fly!

DLC_MOD_ADEPTREDONE.moddesc: Replaces shockwave and cluster grenade with Nova and Biotic Charge from vanguard respectively

DLC_MOD_AEM.moddesc: This mod expands the Armax Arena simulator to include two new enemy factions - the vicious CAT6 Mercenaries and an endless tide of Thorian Creepers when facing the Thorian.

DLC_MOD_AFSHIR.moddesc: Adds several hairstyle conversions for custom Female Shepard in Mass Effect 3 Legendary Edition

DLC_MOD_AHEM.moddesc: AHEM is a rework of the ending to LE3, and a spiritual successor to the Happy Ending Mod. The primary focus of the mod is to allow Commander Shepard to survive the final mission, as well as provide satisfying closure to this incredible trilogy through tweaked cutscenes, edited videos, new ending slides, and an overhauled memorial scene.

DLC_MOD_AHEM_LSVA.modname: Audemus' Happy Ending Mod - Low Spec Video Addon
DLC_MOD_AHEM_LSVA.moddesc: AHEM is a rework of the ending to LE3, and a spiritual successor to the Happy Ending Mod. The primary focus of the mod is to allow Commander Shepard to survive the final mission, as well as provide satisfying closure to this incredible trilogy through tweaked cutscenes, edited videos, new ending slides, and an overhauled memorial scene.

DLC_MOD_AJAX_ARMOR.moddesc: Remove all traces of Cerberus Branding from your Ajax Armor! This is a DLC mod repackaging of the mods by Praseve. See the credits section for more information.

DLC_MOD_ALEXISFORCASINO.moddesc: New batch of outfits that contains dresses and skirts from Sims CC Creators and Original Sims Content as buyable Casual Clothes for FemShep LE3

DLC_MOD_ALLBONUSPOWERS.moddesc: Makes all bonus powers available in medbay. Removes credit cost for bonus powers and power respec.

DLC_MOD_ALLERSG.moddesc: Restores the Allers Goodbye scene during Priority: Earth from the Mass Effect 3 beta script

DLC_MOD_ALLERSOVERHAUL.moddesc: Visual overhaul of Diana Allers's appearance with a sculpted head mesh, new face textures, and optional outfit replacers.

DLC_MOD_ALLIANCEDRESSBLUES.moddesc: A redesign and expansion of the Alliance Dress Blues and the representation of its military ranks.

DLC_MOD_ALLIANCE_SPIRIT.moddesc: Are you a fan of Shaundi452's Alliance Spirit 2.0 retextures of Cerberus Spirit, Nightmare and Shade armor sets? This mod adds three armor sets: Alliance Spirit, Nightmare and Shade using Shaundi's textures. It also provides one torso and one helmet for players who prefer to use armor pieces.

DLC_MOD_ALOVLE3.modname: A Lot of Videos for LE3
DLC_MOD_ALOVLE3.moddesc: ALOV is an exhaustive and comprehensive 4K 60fps video overhaul project powered by AI and augmented with faithful in-game remakes, error corrections and other misc improvements.

DLC_MOD_ALOVUWLE3.moddesc:
This mod optimises ALOV for ultrawide monitors by scaling, reframing and in some instances recreating in-game footage in 21:9.

ALOV (A Lot of Videos) is an exhaustive and comprehensive 4K 60fps video overhaul project for Mass Effect LE, powered by AI and augmented with faithful in-game remakes, error corrections and other misc. improvem

DLC_MOD_ALTARIA.moddesc: Gives Aria a resculpted headmesh and a beefier version of her outfit in LE3.

DLC_MOD_ALTERNATIVEARMORBODIES.moddesc: Various mesh edits to FemShep's armors.

DLC_MOD_ALTERNATIVESQUADMATEBODIES.moddesc: Mesh edits to Liara, Ashley, and Edi's body and armor meshes.

DLC_MOD_ALT_NUDE_F.moddesc: replaces shep’s pathetic noodle body with a flat chested and more muscular version. avinas will have a somewhat more masculine appearance as they use the fully nude model. works with all skin tones.

DLC_MOD_AMMOPOWERICON.moddesc: Removes ammo power icons on weapons and optionally the holograms encasing them in ME2 and ME3.

DLC_MOD_AMOGUS.moddesc: This mod turns all Sovereign-class reapers in Mass Effect 3 into Among Us imposters.

DLC_MOD_ANDERSONCONVERSATION.moddesc: Restoration of cut content during Anderson's final scene.

DLC_MOD_AOFJ.moddesc: Jack's alternate outfit from LE2 ported to LE3.

DLC_MOD_APARTMENTADDITIONS.moddesc: Extra activities for Shepard's apartment on the Citadel. Invite your love interest and hang out with them for a while! Use the hot tub!

DLC_MOD_APPEARANCEMODMENU.moddesc:
Don't you hate not being able to change your appearance after you get past the character creation screen? Not even makeup or hair styles? Don't you hate needing to edit your save file to use custom hair mods?
Well no longer. You can now manage your appearance in game, with a live preview, from inside the armor locker interface.

DLC_MOD_ARCADE.moddesc: Easy Arcade Games makes the games in Castle Arcade in the Legendary Edition of Mass Effect 3 super easy to save time on your next playthrough.

DLC_MOD_ARGUINGCOUPLEFIX.moddesc: Fixes the bug of the Arguing Couple asset having a value of 0. This bug is present in both OT3 and LE3.

DLC_MOD_ARIABLACKOUTFIT.moddesc: A black version of Aria's outfit for Femshep.

DLC_MOD_ARIAOUTFITLIARA.moddesc: A DLC mod that replaces Liara's default armour with a custom version of Aria T'Loak's outfit.

DLC_MOD_ARIA_LIKES_PARAGONS.moddesc: Ever wanted to earn Aria's favor regardless of walking the Paragon or Renegade Path? Well this mod is for you!

DLC_MOD_ARIA_MORDIN_OMEGA_FIX.modname: Aria Mentions Mordin On Omega Fix (LE3)
DLC_MOD_ARIA_MORDIN_OMEGA_FIX.moddesc: Small DLC mod that makes sure one short banter will play during Omega DLC part of the LE3 game.

DLC_MOD_ARIA_OMEGA.moddesc: Ports Aria's outfit, eyes & head from the Omega DLC.

DLC_MOD_ARKHAMKNIGHTARMORFORMALESHEPARDL.modname: Arkham Knight Armor For Male Shepard LE3
DLC_MOD_ARKHAMKNIGHTARMORFORMALESHEPARDL.moddesc:
Report In All of You! This is Militia Commander Shepard

Ports the Arkham Knight Armor from Batman Arkham Knight For Male Shepard

DLC_MOD_ARMAX_ARMORY.moddesc: Remove Cerberus branding from the Spirit/Nightmare/Shade Armor you get as a reward for beating 9999 score on the Armax Arsenal Arena. This is a DLC repacking of the mods originally by MoonkissedAgara.

DLC_MOD_ARMOREDENGINEER.moddesc: Replaces the Engineers Cryo Blast with Sentinels Tech Armor

DLC_MOD_ARMOR_PHONG_VARIATION.moddesc: Add new armor phong colors (metallic colors)

DLC_MOD_ASHARM.moddesc: Adds Ashley's Battle armor and Casual outfit

DLC_MOD_ASHFIX.moddesc: Replaces Ashley's hair with the bun she used in ME1 and ME2. Option to replace casual outfit with Alliance fatigues, replace default armor with better armor.

DLC_MOD_ASHHAIR.moddesc: Gives Default and custom Shepard Ashley's hairstyle.

DLC_MOD_ASHLEY_ARMORY.moddesc: Adds more armors for Ashley Williams using squadmate merge.

DLC_MOD_ASHLEY_HOSPITAL.moddesc: A DLC retexture of Ashley's face while she's in the hospital, as well as an alternative shirt.

DLC_MOD_ASH_CONCISTENCY_PROJECT.moddesc: This mod will bring Ash's LE1 appearance to LE3.

DLC_MOD_ASH_GUARDIAN_LE3.moddesc: Adds a variety of Warlock, Hunter, and Titan Armors from Destiny 2 for Ashley Williams to wear in combat--additions, not replacements!

DLC_MOD_ASH_MEA_ARM_LE3.moddesc: Adds a few armors from Mass Effect: Andromeda for Ashley Williams to wear.  Additions, not replacements!

DLC_MOD_ASH_MSHEP_LE3.moddesc: Adds and refits Ashley's "Officer Outfit" for Male Shepard as both a casual and armor.  Includes a few color options.

DLC_MOD_ASLE3.moddesc: Some options to replace the default Femshep with!

DLC_MOD_BAKARA.moddesc: Reinterpretation of everybody's favorite Momma Krogan.

DLC_MOD_BAKARAFACE.moddesc: Remeshes Bakara to give her a visible, fully-animated custom face and body, and 4k textures.

DLC_MOD_BAK_GIFT.moddesc: Places a crystal trophy in the cabin after accepting the gift from Bakara.

DLC_MOD_BARASHIRTSLE3.moddesc: Adds new T-shirt casual outfits for male Shepard with a brand new, custom sculpted and high-poly dog tag mesh

DLC_MOD_BATMANV804ARMORFORMSLE3.modname: Batman V8.04 Armor For Male Shepard LE3
DLC_MOD_BATMANV804ARMORFORMSLE3.moddesc: Time to put this suit to the test...

DLC_MOD_BATTLINGSARENLE3.moddesc: Makes Saren's official battle theme play during his 2nd final face off

DLC_MOD_BELTEDDRESSFORCASINO.modname: Outfits for FemShep BeltedDress for Casino
DLC_MOD_BELTEDDRESSFORCASINO.moddesc: This makes Belted Dress replace the casino scene dress. You need the main file for it to work. Color is choosable during installation process.

DLC_MOD_BETTERBODIES.moddesc: Mesh edits to a number of FemShep's casual outfits.

DLC_MOD_BETTERSQUADMATEBODIES.moddesc: Mesh edits to Liara, Ashley, and Edi's body and armor meshes.

DLC_MOD_BIOF.moddesc: Enter description. If you are an end user and see this, Mgamerz messed up. Please notify me of this and note the mod name.

DLC_MOD_BIOTICBASTION.moddesc: Rework of the Adept class in LE3 to include Reave, Overload and Defense Matrix.

DLC_MOD_BLONDEMIRANDA.moddesc:
Changes Miranda to be a blonde!

Just as nature always intended her to be!

DLC_MOD_BLUE_HANAR_LE3.moddesc: Makes Hanar blue across the trilogy

DLC_MOD_BODY_DIVERSITY_FOR_MSHEP.moddesc: If you like idea of your MShep having a slightly smaller frame this mod gives Mshep the LE1 body shape. All meshes available to Mshep in the locker have been edited to fit this body shape, and/or changed the showing skin parts to the parts from the LE1 body.

DLC_MOD_BONUS_BONUS_POWERS.moddesc:
All powers are bonus powers, and you can have all of them, all without touching mod dev tools or a save editor.

Want to play as a Soldier who can Biotic Charge into the fray and then Tactical Cloak out? Do it.
Want to switch up your powers for the next mission? Do it.

Welcome to Bonus Bonus Powers.

DLC_MOD_BOT_LE3.moddesc: A random collection of mods (and ports) I made for myself and decided to share.

DLC_MOD_BOT_LE3_CONFIG.moddesc: A collection of small personal mods that don't warrant their own packages, all rolled into one. For LE3.

DLC_MOD_BOT_LE3_IND.moddesc: A collection of small personal mods that don't warrant their own packages, all rolled into one. For LE3.

DLC_MOD_BREATHER_MSHEPLE3.moddesc: Adds, ports, and refits a variety of breathers for Male Shepard to wear.

DLC_MOD_BROOKHAIR.moddesc: Give Brook hair to default femshep and custom femshep

DLC_MOD_BROOKSHR.moddesc: Adds Brooks' hair as a hairstyle option to Mass Effect 3 Legendary Edition.

DLC_MOD_BRRAPMODLE3.moddesc: Restores the original camera data from the original trilogy and nothing else.

DLC_MOD_BRWEAPON.moddesc: Significant stability buff to the LE3 Valkyrie

DLC_MOD_BUFFED_ARMORY_LE3.moddesc: This mod adds one or more copies of LE3's default armor pieces: helmets, torso, shoulders, arms and legs with standard sets of stats for all pieces.

DLC_MOD_BUTT.moddesc: Restores Miranda's various butt shots, from OT, in LE3.

DLC_MOD_C5_ABG.moddesc: Removes Diana Allers from the Citadel docking bay, reallocating her war asset value to the paragon interrupt with Khalisah bint Sinan al-Jilani. For those players uninterested in her recruitment who'd rather not miss out on war asset points and prefer she not be constantly calling for Shepard every time you stop by the Citadel.

DLC_MOD_C5_ADR.moddesc: ADR restores the Admiral Daro'Xen war asset that was (mistakenly?) removed from the ME3 Legendary Edition. Claudia Black stans, rejoice!

DLC_MOD_C5_KMG.moddesc: Speaking to Major Kirrahe during Priority: Sur'kesh awards the Salarian Special Tasks Group war asset at the end of the mission, to better match his dialogue and... common sense?

DLC_MOD_C5_LBG.moddesc: Removes the Leviathan questline from ME3, leaving all other features added by the DLC intact.

DLC_MOD_C5_SBG.moddesc: A straightforward alternative to the dream sequences and ending of LE3, with a focus on removing the Starchild and all the narrative problems that come with him.

DLC_MOD_C5_UWU.moddesc: Allows for upgrading all weapons to rank 10, without the need to start a New Game Plus.

DLC_MOD_C5_VPO.moddesc: A comprehensive adjustment to item prices in LE3 to better reflect the number of credits acquired in a single playthrough. Also allows you to purchase all weapons and armor from the start of the game.

DLC_MOD_C5_VPOPBBP.moddesc: A comprehensive adjustment to item prices in LE3 to better reflect the number of credits acquired in a single playthrough. Also allows you to purchase all weapons and armor from the start of the game.

DLC_MOD_CABIN.moddesc:
Kolyat has left Shepard a small gift on the Normandy. Edi has had it placed in the Starboard Observation Deck, for when Shepard has the time to sit.
Read the Datapad to see the Prayer, Examine the book for Immersion.

DLC_MOD_CAM_LE3.moddesc: CAM is the successor to Classic Heatsinks and Universal Thermal Clips. Incorporating both mods and new features such as Omni Ammo. The Omni Ammo setting generates new Thermal Clips/Ammo from your Omni-Tool over time during a mission.

DLC_MOD_CATSUITS.moddesc: Adds several new cat suits for female Shepard for use as casual outfits or as armors.

DLC_MOD_CERBERUS_SLAYER.moddesc: This one gives you what I call the Cerberus Slayer armour. For males it is an edited version of Cerberus Spirit with no flap and upperbackpiece. For females it is a combination of the male parts with the female arms. Sculpted to fit Femshep.

DLC_MOD_CHAKWAS_ALLIANCE.moddesc: Retexture and Recolor of Dr. Chakwas' uniform to match Alliance colors

DLC_MOD_CHM.moddesc: Ever found Mass Effect 3 to be too boring? Want some excitement in your gaming? Some content for your stream? Presenting, Chaos Mod for Mass Effect 3: Legendary Edition!

DLC_MOD_CICHOLO.moddesc: Forces Normandy, Galaxy Map and Private Terminal Holos in CIC to always be on in ME2 and ME3, regardless of your position.

DLC_MOD_CITADELKASUMIDRESS.moddesc: Replaces the "trash bag" dress from the Citadel DLC in MELE3 with the dress from Kasumi's loyalty mission in MELE2.

DLC_MOD_CITPROJECT.moddev: Tydeous & the Elcor Hamlet Appreciation Socie
DLC_MOD_CITPROJECT.moddesc: A project designed to diversify LE3 through better species' population balancing, outfit/appearance diversification and overall breathing more life into the world. This project is currently in ALPHA and is only partially complete.

DLC_MOD_CLASSICARMORS.moddesc: Ports classic Light, Medium and Heavy Armors from LE1 to LE2 and LE3.

DLC_MOD_CLASSICCUSTOMARMORS.moddesc: Ports the Light, Medium and Heavy Armors from LE1 to LE2 and LE3.

DLC_MOD_CLASSICHEATSINKS_LE3.moddesc: Restores LE1 style heatsink systems to all regular weapons.

DLC_MOD_CLASSICWEAPONS.moddesc: Adds 44 Weapons from Mass Effect 1 to Mass Effect 2 and 3.

DLC_MOD_CLEAR_MNEMONIC_VISOR_LE3.moddesc: [LE3] Gives Shepard back the ability to see what's in front of them while wearing the Mnemonic Visor.

DLC_MOD_CLERICHOODIE_MSHEPLE3.moddesc: Adds a new hoodie outfit for Male Shepard to wear using a variety of Destiny 2, vanilla, and Sims 4 CC assets. Comes in three mesh variants (Fatigue Pants, Techwear Pants - Sims 4 CC by Darte77, Spacer Pants) with three logos/colors each: N7, Alliance, and Spectre.

DLC_MOD_CLERICJACKETS_MSHEPLE3.moddesc: Adds outfits with a Jacket theme for Male Shepard to purchase using Sims 4 CC from: Darte77.

DLC_MOD_CLERIC_BOMBER_MSHEPLE3.moddesc: Adds a bomber jacket outfit for Male Shepard using a mixture of FFXV and Vanilla ME3 assets.  Two mesh variants (Jeans or Fatigues) with three jackets each are provided (N7, Spectre, and Alliance).

DLC_MOD_CLERIC_TSHIRTSLE3.modname: Cleric's T-Shirt Outfits for Male Shepard (LE3)
DLC_MOD_CLERIC_TSHIRTSLE3.moddesc: Adds a few T-Shirts to Male Shepard's locker using a mixture of vanilla and Fortnite Assets.

DLC_MOD_COATSJACKETSMALESHEPLE3.moddesc: Adds outfits with long coats & jackets to the locker for Male Shepard with content from Sims 4 CC Creators: Darte77 & Lazyeyelids

DLC_MOD_COLLECTIONUNCS.moddesc: This mod removes the check for the amount of asari writings during Conrad's introduction to maintain consistency if Collection Assignment Tweaks was installed for LE1.

DLC_MOD_COLLECTORCABIN.moddesc: Have you also been feeling that your cabin is boring? Maybe it's just a little too empty?

DLC_MOD_COLLECTORSSTORE.moddesc:
Have you also been feeling that your cabin is boring? Maybe it's just a little too empty?

----- Well no more! -----

Witness your cabin fill after each mission, as you amass a collection of trinkets from across the galaxy.
Now includes store purchases!
(Not cozy enough, head over to Spectre Requisitions and get yourself a brand new rug!)

DLC_MOD_COMBATFACE.moddesc: This mod removes the bug-eyed, open-mouthed expression every Shepard has when holding their rifle.

DLC_MOD_COMICSANSLE3.moddesc: Makes all fonts in LE3 Comic Sans. Only takes effect after starting a game or loading a save.

DLC_MOD_CONRADLE3.moddesc: Conrad Verner no longer apologizes for wrongly accusing you of pointing at gun at him. Meant to be used with conjunction of my Conrad Verner Remembers mod for Mass Effect 2 Legendary Edition.

DLC_MOD_CONSISTENCY.moddesc: Some characters, primarily aliens, in Mass Effect 3 do not look like they did in the two previous games. This mod sets out to provide consistency so that these characters are instantly recognisable.

DLC_MOD_COURTNEYSET1711CASINO.modname: Courtney and Set1711 for Casino Party
DLC_MOD_COURTNEYSET1711CASINO.moddesc: Bunch of new outfits that contains pants and similar stuff from Sims CC Creators as buyable Casual Clothes for FemShep LE3.

DLC_MOD_CPOWERS.moddesc: Personal edits of vanilla powers but as standalone powers. Meaning they don't overwrite any of the vanilla powers.

DLC_MOD_CRBRETRO.moddesc: This overhauls most of the game so that Cerberus Assault Troopers, Centurions and Guardians use more lore-accurate armour from Mass Effect 2, and it gives Cerberus more of an aesthetic that matches the rest of the trilogy.

DLC_MOD_CRNOVPATCH.moddesc: This overhauls most of the game so that Cerberus Assault Troopers, Centurions and Guardians use more lore-accurate armour from Mass Effect 2, and it gives Cerberus more of an aesthetic that matches the rest of the trilogy. It also adds Dragoons, Rampart Mechs, Adjutants and some named enemy agents to fight.

DLC_MOD_CROUCHMOD.moddesc: Crouch Mod for LE3 adds the ability to crouch, well-known from ME1 and ME2, to Mass Effect 3.

DLC_MOD_CSNO.moddesc: This small Coalesced edit makes it so that you can use the regular N7 dress during the Casino heist in the Citadel DLC. This way, you can use any retextures you want and not have it affect Brooks and/or Ashley.

DLC_MOD_CSNO_AFU.moddesc: This small Coalesced edit makes it so that you can use the regular N7 dress during the Casino heist in the Citadel DLC. This way, you can use any retextures you want and not have it affect Brooks and/or Ashley. This is the Alliance Formal Uniform version.

DLC_MOD_CUSTOMFEMSHEP.moddesc: My custom female Shepard. Not a save game or sliders, but a fully custom head mesh.

DLC_MOD_CUSTOMIZABLEEDIARMOR.moddesc:
EDI's catsuit with Jill Valentine's accessories, plus your own colors to boot.

Based on nameislooney's work on deviantArt. Ported from ME3 to LE3 by ME3Tweaks.

DLC_MOD_CWCLASSICLIARA.moddesc: Replaces Liara's default armor with her classic look from Mass Effect 1 while mantaining her new body proportions.

DLC_MOD_CYA.moddesc: Let's you choose your outfit for the Citadel DLC casino mission.

DLC_MOD_DATAPAD_APP_EMAILS_REBORN.moddesc: Adds the messages from the now-defunct ME3 datapad app to your terminal in the Normandy.

DLC_MOD_DEADLYCOMBAT_LE3.moddesc: Deadly Combat enhances gunplay for a fun but terrifying experience. Combat is fast and furious with far more rounds being shot at you. This is not a balance mod, this mod emphasizes fun, hectic firefights, and more difficult combat in lieu of balance.

DLC_MOD_DEADPEOPLE.moddesc: Expands the conversation between Shepard and Liara that occurs after the attempted Cerberus Coup. This conversation will now trigger for all players. Liara will discuss Kaidan, Ashley and/or Thane, depending on who died during the Coup and on Virmire.

DLC_MOD_DEATHSTROKEARMORFORMALESHEPARDLE.modname: Deathstroke Armor For Male Shepard LE3
DLC_MOD_DEATHSTROKEARMORFORMALESHEPARDLE.moddesc:
These things should never be personal.I'm a trained killer.

Ports the Deathstroke's Armor from Batman Arkham Knight For Male Shepard

DLC_MOD_DEFENDER_ARMOR.moddesc: Ever wanted to use the N7 Defender Armor but were not enthusiastic with the stats? This mod may be for you!

DLC_MOD_DEFENDER_ARMOR_PARTS.moddesc: Ever wanted to use the N7 Defender armor but were not enthusiastic with the stats? Wanted the lights on the helmet to match the armor? Want to change to a different helmet or visor? This mod may be for you!

DLC_MOD_DISABLE_CODEX_VOICEOVER.moddesc: This simple DLC mod disables the codex voiceover narration in LE3.

DLC_MOD_DISAVOWED.moddesc: Complete texture overhaul for Miranda's appearance in LE3, includes hexagon-less white catsuit, Alliance themed catsuit/AAP armor and face complexion created by Heleuss.

DLC_MOD_DKAGE.moddesc: This mod adds the Dark Age and Braytech Titan Armors from Destiny 2 for James.

DLC_MOD_DLC_MOD_ALLIANCE_SPIRIT_PARTS.moddesc: Are you a fan of Shaundi452's Alliance Spirit 2.0 textures for Cerberus Spirit, Nightmare and Shade armor sets? This mod may be for you.

DLC_MOD_DLC_MOD_ME2VIXENHAIRTOLE3.moddesc: Modifies the default LE2 and 3 hair to look like how it does in the original 2010 Mass Effect 2. I used the original ME2 hair model as reference when sculpting the hair in Blender.

DLC_MOD_DMGNUMS.moddesc: Damage Numbers adds dynamic damage indicators to every hit -  telling you exactly how much damage each attack dealt. (LE2 and LE3)

DLC_MOD_DMV.moddesc:
"Druu's Modding Varieties" is where I will be uploading the majority of my mass effect mods. With guaranteed short waiting times and a shared enthusiasm for getting things done on time, the DMV is fun for all mod users. Or not.
The DMV currently offers several new clothing options ranging from business casual, formal wear to party outfits.

DLC_MOD_DOMZIPPED.moddesc: A ported version of my favorite armor mod "DOM Zipped Retexture" by GirlPlaysGame.

DLC_MOD_DOTR_TSO_LE3.modname: Daughter of the Rayya - Tali Suit Overhaul (LE3)
DLC_MOD_DOTR_TSO_LE3.moddesc: Replaces Tali's vanilla suit with one representing her more like her quarian brothers and sisters.

DLC_MOD_DRESSESPT2.moddesc: Bunch of new outfits that contains dresses and similar stuff from Sims CC Creators as buyable Casual Clothes for FemShep LE3.

DLC_MOD_DRESSESPT2CASINO.moddesc: Bunch of new outfits that contains dresses and similar stuff from Sims CC Creators as buyable Casual Clothes for FemShep LE3.

DLC_MOD_DYNAUDIORANGE.moddesc: A ME3Tweaks compatible version of jpagner's Audio Dynamic Range option fix for ME3LE.

DLC_MOD_EASIERPULLUPS.moddesc: A mod that lets you avoid the ordeal of doing 183 interrupts in a row in order to beat James at pull-ups.

DLC_MOD_EDIBV.moddesc: Changes EDI's visor on all outfits to Blue and edits the Character Selection GUI images to match the visor's new color. As a bonus, it also swaps the blue visor in Priority: Mars to the Orange one. Compatible with LE3 Community Patch, as it uses it's file as a base. Does not affect EGM EDI appearances.

DLC_MOD_EDIUNIFORM.moddesc: This mod replaces EDI's default appearance to wear an Alliance crew uniform, a hat to match Joker's, and relaxed (rather than condensed into a helmet) hair strands.

DLC_MOD_EDI_ARMORY.moddesc: Adds more armors for EDI using squadmate merge.

DLC_MOD_EDI_FA_DECOY.moddesc: A random collection of mods (and ports) I made for myself and decided to share.

DLC_MOD_EDI_GITS.moddesc: Kusanagi Motoko's outfit from Ghost In The Shell SAC: First Assault.

DLC_MOD_EDI_HUNT_LE3.moddesc: Adds a few hunter armors from Destiny 2 for EDI using squadmate merge--additions, not replacements!

DLC_MOD_EFO.moddesc: Adds the unused formal outfit for EDI as a standalone. Optional Blue Visor.

DLC_MOD_EGM.moddesc: A few quality of life features from Expanded Galaxy Mod (ME3) ported to LE3. As EGM will take a long time to be ported, a few behind the scenes features that improve the gameplay are being added earlier. Over time this mod will gradually become more like the full EGM experience, as more content is added.

DLC_MOD_EGM_ARMORS.moddesc: The Initiative Armors from Ark Mod and MP Armors from EGM all set up as a brand new DLC Mod for LE3. Includes T5-V Battlesuit, N7 Pathfinder, Initiative Spearpoint, N7 Slayer and many more.

DLC_MOD_EGM_EXTRA.moddesc: Extras pack for Expanded Galaxy Mod

DLC_MOD_EGM_MIRANDA.moddev: Kinkojiro with Exkywor, Sil, Scottina, Audemu
DLC_MOD_EGM_MIRANDA.moddesc: Put Miranda back on the Normandy where she belongs. Post Horizon this allows Miranda to return to the Normandy as part of the crew. Features fully voiced conversations, romance and many more features. Requires Expanded Galaxy Mod (Normandy Module).

DLC_MOD_EGM_SHIPWRECK.moddesc: Enjoy the legacy of the Andromeda Initiative with a beautiful model of an Ark for your cabin.

DLC_MOD_EGM_SQUAD.moddesc: A few quality of life features from Expanded Galaxy Mod (ME3) ported to LE3.  As EGM will take a long time to be ported, a few behind the scenes features that improve the gameplay are being added earlier.  Over time this mod will gradually become more like the full EGM experience, as more content is added.

DLC_MOD_ELITE_MALESHEPLE3.moddesc: Adds 10 outfits, with three colors each, to make a total of 30 new outfits to purchase for Male Shepard.  All have a formal theme and have been ported from The Outer Worlds.

DLC_MOD_EMILYRETURNS.moddesc:
Emily Wong joins the Normandy! Recruit your favorite reporter to join you in your quest to save the galaxy, receive a new mail from her, and choose between three outfits and two hairstyles.
This mod does not replace Allers's voice, but replaces all references to her throughout the game.

DLC_MOD_EMILYRETURNSP.moddesc:
Emily Wong joins the Normandy! Recruit your favorite reporter to join you in your quest to save the galaxy, receive a new mail from her, and choose between three outfits and two hairstyles.
This mod does not replace Allers's voice, but replaces all references to her throughout the game.

DLC_MOD_EUMM.moddesc: Allows a user to set what books, comics, games and films they have read/played in a mod menu. This will allow other mods to check what you've seen and tailor content specifically for those who have seen certain parts of the expanded universe.

DLC_MOD_EVIESHEP_LE3.moddesc: My custom Evelyn Shepard, replaces the custom FemShep for all three games.

DLC_MOD_EXTRAKEYBINDS.moddesc:
Separates the keybinds for Use / Sprint / Cover into three separate keys. (Mass Effect 1 only separates Use / Sprint)
Space Bar will Skip Conversation without selecting a Dialogue Option. (Mass Effect 1 cannot be fixed, new keybinding "Escape" added instead)
Optional for Mass Effect 2: Prevent Sprint/Storm from entering Cover.

DLC_MOD_EXTRA_BASIC_OUTFITS_HATS.moddesc: Mod adds different gameplay tweaks and cheats; unlocks basic outfits, armor, hats, weapon mods.  You can use casual outfits instead of armor.

DLC_MOD_FANCIFULEDI.moddesc: Port of Fanciful EDI mod from ME3, adding dozens of new fun (and some risque) outfits for FemShep.

DLC_MOD_FA_PADME_LE3.moddesc: This mod replaces default femshep's headmorph with PadmÃ© Amidala's from Force Arena game.

DLC_MOD_FEMME_WRAITH.moddesc: A random collection of mods (and ports) I made for myself and decided to share.

DLC_MOD_FEMSHEPHAIR3.moddesc: More Hair for Femshep brings to the Legendary Edition Sims 4 Hairs created by Anto and originally ported by Kittentails to the original Mass Effect 3. Players who want to use them will need to use the Trilogy Savegame Editor to change their Shepard's hair as for the moment it is not possible to include them on the Character Creator.

DLC_MOD_FEMSHEPHAIRLE3.moddesc: More hairstyles for Femshep, for MELE3.

DLC_MOD_FEMSHEPUNDERWEAR.modname: Femshep Underwear Addition to the Closet
DLC_MOD_FEMSHEPUNDERWEAR.moddesc: Unlocks underwear for the femshep's closet. 20 new texture options for underwear.

DLC_MOD_FN_BOBA.moddesc: This mod provides you with custom outfit options to play as Boba Fett.

DLC_MOD_FORMALWEARBEGONE.moddesc: This mod removes forced formalwear in the Citadel DLC (casino and debrief after casino, date with Miranda) and forced dress blues during Priority: Sur'Kesh diplomatic summit.

DLC_MOD_FRAMEWORK.moddesc: Extensive Bugfix / Correction mod for Mass Effect 3 Legendary Edition

DLC_MOD_FREE_RESPEC.moddesc: By default, the cost of resetting powers is free the first time, then ramps up by 5000 credits each additional time you reset them, up to 25000. This mod makes it always free, regardless of how many times you reset powers.

DLC_MOD_FRIENDPICKER.moddesc: Pick who shows up to help Shepard in the first part of the Citadel DLC.

DLC_MOD_FSHEPARM.moddesc: Adds a selection of modded armors for femshep to use in LE3.

DLC_MOD_FSHEPCLOTHESLE3.moddesc: Some clothes for Femshep to wear (LE3),

DLC_MOD_FSHEPCSNO.moddesc: A few options to replace the Casino mission dress.

DLC_MOD_FSVBSLE.modname: FemShep v BroShep: Duel of the Shepards LE
DLC_MOD_FSVBSLE.moddesc: Battle the other you! Faceoff against FemShep if you are playing as BroShep, or against BroShep if you are playing as FemShep.

DLC_MOD_FSVBSLE_V.modname: FemShep v BroShep: Duel of the Shepards LE - Vanilla vs
DLC_MOD_FSVBSLE_V.moddesc: Faceoff against a Citadel clone that looks whatever way you want. Use custom head morphs, scars, or modded looks. Fight against Broshep as Femshep, or against Femshep as Broshep, or against Femshep as Femshep, or against Broshep as Broshep. Your choices, your battle.

DLC_MOD_GARAAP.moddesc: Ports Garrus' LE2 AAP armor as a standalone one. Optional No Visor included.

DLC_MOD_GARCASFIX.moddesc: Fixes mismatched textures on Garrus' casual outfit in LE3 by replacing the updated LE model with the model from original ME3.

DLC_MOD_GARCH.moddesc: A collection of new outfits for squadmates.

DLC_MOD_GARRUS_NO_VISOR.moddesc: This mod removes Garrus' visor. If you love seeing both his eyes clearly, then this mod is for you <3

DLC_MOD_GAY.moddesc: More Gay Romances is a mod for Mass Effect: Legendary Edition that adds more same-gender romance options to the game. As of this version, Miranda and Jack have been added as romance options for FemShep in LE2. Future releases will add Miranda and Jack as romance options for FemShep in LE3.

DLC_MOD_GDLGLE3.moddesc:
Corrección de erratas e introducción de nuevas reglas de la RAE y modificaciones/unificación de formato para los textos en español de los tres juegos de la saga Mass Effect (LE).
-Versión para LE3-

DLC_MOD_GODDESS_OF_WAR.modname: WarzKnight's Goddess of War for ME3 LE
DLC_MOD_GODDESS_OF_WAR.moddesc: This is my custom soldier class for ME3 LE. I see this more as a stand your ground or push to advance with weapons rather than powers as that is my personal preference.

DLC_MOD_GOD_OF_WAR.modname: WarzKnight's God of War for ME3 LE
DLC_MOD_GOD_OF_WAR.moddesc: This is my custom soldier class for ME3 LE. I see this more as a stand your ground or push to advance with weapons rather than powers as that is my personal preference.

DLC_MOD_GOWNVTWISTCASINO.modname: Outfits for FemShep GownVTwist for Casino
DLC_MOD_GOWNVTWISTCASINO.moddesc: This makes Gown V Twist replace the casino scene dress. You need the main file for it to work. Color is choosable during installation process.

DLC_MOD_GRUNT.moddesc: Lets Grunt (and Wreav, and Dagg!) show some Urdnot pride with Wrex's iconic red in LE2 and 3.

DLC_MOD_GT500_MORE_CASUAL_APPEARANCES.modname: LE3 More Casual Appearances and Casual Armors
DLC_MOD_GT500_MORE_CASUAL_APPEARANCES.moddesc: Adds additional casual outfits for Shepard (male and female), with 3 also available as armor. The armors should appear under both Armor Sets and Chest armor, and when used as Chest armor they should have all (or at least most) of the armor bonuses. This includes Ashley's armor from ME1 as a casual outfit and armor.

DLC_MOD_GTHRETRO.moddesc: This mod overhauls the Geth faction so that it makes use of the Geth Bomber enemy from ME3 Multiplayer and the Armax Arsenal Arena. The intention is to maintain combat balance, and perhaps someday add a little more enemy variety.

DLC_MOD_GUARDIANSENTINEL.moddesc: Rework of the Sentinel class to focus more on high-output power-based combat in LE3.

DLC_MOD_GUARDIAN_ARM_LE3.moddesc: Ports the Destiny 2 x Mass Effect collab to ME:LE3 for both Shepards.  Includes the N7 Titan, Vakarian Hunter, and Shadow Broker Warlock armors and helmets.

DLC_MOD_HACKETT.moddesc: Fleet Admiral Steven Hackett Restored Mod restores Hackett's missing gold 4th bar from his uniform on his Legendary Edition appearance on Mass Effect 3. It also features an improved model and edited textures by Padme4000.

DLC_MOD_HACKETTNOCYBEREYE.moddesc: New cybernetics and (non-cybernetic) scars for Shepard in LE2 and LE3. Replaces renegade eyes and face scars. Quick tutorials on installing MEM mods and changing eye emissive colours.

DLC_MOD_HAIRMIX.moddesc:
Another bunch of hair mixtures for LE1, LE2, and LE3.
Two new hairstyles now available.

DLC_MOD_HALCYONHAIRPACKLE3.moddesc: A dozen new hairs (5 male, 3 female, 3 crossgender) used by NPCs in LE3 Diversification Project and based on hairstyles from The Outer Worlds.

DLC_MOD_HALLOWEEN_NIGHTMARE.moddesc: Inspired by halloween colours, so a much darker look to the nightmares. I also want to add in the future more things into the scenes, so thus far its only recolour of the scenes.

DLC_MOD_HANDKERCHIEFFORCASINO.modname: Outfits for FemShep HandkerchiefDress for Casino
DLC_MOD_HANDKERCHIEFFORCASINO.moddesc: This makes Handkerchief dress replace the casino scene dress. You need the main file for it to work. Color is choosable during installation process.

DLC_MOD_HARBINGER.moddesc: Restores Harbinger's Mass Effect 2 design and makes Harby the first and last Reaper you see on Earth.

DLC_MOD_HCNCS.moddesc: A random collection of mods (and ports) I made for myself and decided to share.

DLC_MOD_HETEROCHROMIA.moddesc: Customize your Shepard in ways that were previously impossible. You can now give each eye a different iris color individually, right in the Appearance Mod Menu (required for this mod). It will update instantly and persist across saves.

DLC_MOD_HIR_MORE.moddesc: Adds 20 female hairstyles to Mass Effect 3 Legendary Edition.

DLC_MOD_HIR_TRN.moddesc: This mod will change Traynor's hair to Brooks' long hair.

DLC_MOD_HK47_ENGINEERRELOADED.moddesc: Engineer class rebalance to make Engineer suck less on Insanity

DLC_MOD_HOODEDCASUALS.moddesc: Kasumi's Armor with remodeled hood and updated/custom textures for LE2 and LE3

DLC_MOD_HOTTUB.moddesc: A mod that makes the hot tub in Anderson's apartment interactable.

DLC_MOD_HUDENHANCE.moddesc:
Various Enhancements to the HUD of Mass Effect 3 (Legendary Edition).
Fixes mixed input issues, allows you to lock the HUD to controller or PC layout and prompts, and adds quality of life features.

DLC_MOD_HURRYKANECAMTOOLS.moddesc: Provide FlyCam to (almost) every situation and easy game start/stop toggle, show/hide HUD and various levels of slow motion for all three Legendary titles.

DLC_MOD_HVYN7.modname: ME2 Heavy N7 Armor Parts for LE3
DLC_MOD_HVYN7.moddesc: Ports the asymmetric armour pieces from Mass Effect 2 to LE3. Work as modular armour parts.

DLC_MOD_IAGC.moddesc: Small QoL tweak that removes the recharge time for the disinfection weapon in the Geth Consensus during Rannoch: Geth Fighter Squadrons.

DLC_MOD_IFFTWEAK.moddesc: Small dialogue tweak to make a plot-relevant ambient conversation between EDI and Engineer Adams about the IFF upgrade easier to trigger.

DLC_MOD_IMPROVED_INFILTRATOR.moddesc: Modifies the Infiltrator class for LE3 to be more combat/tech based.

DLC_MOD_INCONICFEMSHEPHAIRFIXLE3.modname: Iconic Femshep Hair Fix For LE3
DLC_MOD_INCONICFEMSHEPHAIRFIXLE3.moddesc: Simple mod that ports the proper default "iconic" Femshep hair model from LE1 and 2 to LE3 that was present in the original ME3, but was modified only for LE3 for some reason.

DLC_MOD_INGAMELANGUAGECHANGER.moddesc: ]Allows you to change voice and text options between any of the supported options without restarting the game. You can have spanish text with french voiceover, for example. This mod depends on features natively in LE3, so it won't work in LE1 or LE2.

DLC_MOD_INTERFACE.moddesc: Reduces size of Keyboard and Mouse Gameplay UI

DLC_MOD_ITM.moddesc: Immersive Thessia Mod realizes the full potential of one of Mass Effect 3's most iconic missions, by introducing what the original tried but failed to portray: The visuals and sound design of a city under siege, as well as a tense and action-packed tone. All of this is accomplished while remaining strictly faithful to Bioware's vision.

DLC_MOD_IVAP.moddesc: Adds "invisible" versions of all vanilla armour parts so you can wear full body armours as torso pieces and still choose armour bonuses based on your class and playstyle. Unlock requirements remain the same. Optionally declutters other invisible parts from other mods and best of all you can wear JUST your chest piece and NOTHING else.

DLC_MOD_JACKC.moddesc: Allows Jack to participate  in the four Citadel DLC missions, complete with brand new voice lines.

DLC_MOD_JACOBS_ARMOUR.moddesc: This one gives you Jacob's armour for BroShep and Femshep. Made the Jacobs armour fit Femshep.

DLC_MOD_JANEAC.moddesc: Adds an Alliance-themed casual outfit for Femshep to the closet. Default color is a gray shirt with N7 stripe on the pants, and recolors can be installed via texture mods. Credits to horography for the ME3 mod 'Buff Female Shepard Body', which was used as a base for the body shape.

DLC_MOD_JANEPJ.moddesc: Changes Femshep's underwear model to something more practical. Default tanktop color is red, recolors can be installed via texture mods. Credits to horography for the ME3 mod 'Buff Female Shepard Body', which was used as a base for the body shape.

DLC_MOD_JANETD.moddesc: Adds a turtleneck dress for Femshep to the closet. Default color is red, recolors can be installed via texture mods. Credits to horography for the ME3 mod 'Buff Female Shepard Body', which was used as a base for the body shape.

DLC_MOD_JAVIK_SHIRT.moddesc: adds a shirt for javik to wear on the normandy/citadel. requires egm + egm squadmate pack.

DLC_MOD_JBH.moddesc: Simple attempt at giving Jack back here brown hair (like she had in the Original Trilogy). (LE3 Community Framework Required)

DLC_MOD_JCK_PIERCING.moddesc: Removes Jack's earpiece and gives her some piercings.

DLC_MOD_JDGA.moddesc: Standalone dark green variant of Javik's armor. Hastily made so it isn't the best thing in the world.

DLC_MOD_JNA.moddesc: Ports the N7 Defender & Battlefield armors for James.

DLC_MOD_JNA_LE3.moddesc: Adds an additional armor in LE3 for Javik based on a concept from the Art of the Mass Effect Universe book. Does not replace any existing armors.

DLC_MOD_JOKER_LE1_BODYFRAME_OUTFITS.moddesc: Gives Joker the bodyframe from LE1 and my body diversity mod, as well as other outfit options.

DLC_MOD_JOURNALENHANCED.moddesc: Various enhancements to make the Journal more serviceable. Happy N7 day!

DLC_MOD_JS_RWWP.moddesc: Removes the equipped weapon weight penalty behaviour

DLC_MOD_JUMPSUITFORCASINO.modname: Morning's Pants Outfits Jumpsuit for Casino
DLC_MOD_JUMPSUITFORCASINO.moddesc: New batch of outfits that contains pants and similar stuff from Sims CC Creators and Original Sims Content as buyable Casual Clothes for FemShep LE3

DLC_MOD_KAHLEE_SANDERS.moddesc: Unique Kahlee Sanders mod offers a new original and different head/face shape to the character of Kahlee Sanders, as well as a new hairstyle. Although her appearance in Mass Effect 3 is brief, she is a recurring main character in the original Mass Effect novels and I felt that her design by Bioware was sort of lazy.

DLC_MOD_KAIDANARMORY.moddesc: Adds new armors for Kaidan Alenko using squadmate merge.

DLC_MOD_KAIDANOVERHAULFRAMEWORK.moddesc: Gives Kaidan a new, high definition face mesh, romance body, hair, and several outfit options, selectable in-game through the mod settings menu.

DLC_MOD_KAIDAN_HOSPITAL.moddesc: A DLC retexture of Kaidan's face while he's in the hospital, as well as the optional addition of a shirt.

DLC_MOD_KAIDAN_LE1_BODYFRAME.moddesc: My own take own take of a Kaidan Overhaul. This mod gives Kaidan hair I made from scratch, new outfits, two new armours, and yes an option for being shirtless using the LE1 bodyframe in LE3 from my Body Diversity mod for MShep.

DLC_MOD_KAIDAN_WARLOCKARMLE3.moddesc: Adds a few warlock armors from Destiny 2 for Kaidan Alenko using squadmate merge--additions, not replacements!

DLC_MOD_KAI_CAT6.moddesc: A collection of new outfits for squadmates.

DLC_MOD_KAI_CATSUITSLE3.moddesc: Refits and adds Ashley's catsuit as an outfit for Kaidan Alenko to wear in combat.  Includes two colors: Blue and Red & White, as well as an optional default fatigues replacer.

DLC_MOD_KAI_GUARDIAN_LE3.moddesc: Adds a variety of Hunter and Titan armors from Destiny 2 for Kaidan Alenko to wear in combat--additions, not replacements!  A companion to Kaidan Alenko's Warlock Armory.

DLC_MOD_KAI_MEA_ARMLE3.moddesc: Adds a few armors from Mass Effect Andromeda for Kaidan Alenko to wear.  Additions, not replacements!

DLC_MOD_KASUMIDRESS.moddesc: Adds LE2 Alternative Bodies' version of Kasumi's loyalty mission dress to the closet and replaces the N7 Dress during the Casino mission.

DLC_MOD_KASUMIEYE.moddesc: A simple edit to Kasumi's eye material to make them appear visible.

DLC_MOD_KASUMI_STYLE_ARMOUR_FOR_TALI.moddesc: This mod adds a new outfit for Tali that is a mix of her outfit + Kasumi's as a new armour but also an option for it to be her non combat outfit

DLC_MOD_KELLY.moddesc: Kelly Returns is a mod  that allows Kelly Chambers to return to the Normandy as a full time crew member during the events of Mass Effect 3.

DLC_MOD_KELLYFISH.moddesc: Kelly will now show up and give your fish back as long as she survived the suicide mission. No more flirty dinner required.

DLC_MOD_KELLYHAIRREMASTEREDLE3.moddesc: Brings back and remasters the original hair used by Kelly Chambers and Dr. Kenson from Mass Effect 2 to LE2 and LE3.

DLC_MOD_KHA_LE3BLU.modname: BLU's Closet: Alliance Dress Blues (KH Ports)
DLC_MOD_KHA_LE3BLU.moddesc: Brings KH/heleuss' clothes mods to LE. Currently includes the dresses (one dress, four recolors), and two Alliance dress uniforms with skirt (which will replace the vanilla Alliance uniform).

DLC_MOD_KHGPG_LE3BLU.moddesc: Brings KH/heleuss' clothes mods to LE. Currently includes the dresses (one dress, four recolors), and two Alliance dress uniforms with skirt (which will replace the vanilla Alliance uniform).

DLC_MOD_KHH_LE3BLU.moddesc: Brings KH/heleuss' clothes mods to LE. Currently includes the dresses (one dress, four recolors), and two Alliance dress uniforms with skirt (which will replace the vanilla Alliance uniform).

DLC_MOD_KITSUMITANKTOP.modname: Kitsumi's Modded Casual Outfit Top Tank Short and Larger
DLC_MOD_KITSUMITANKTOP.moddesc: My Modded Casual Outfit with a Top Tank for FemShep ported to MELE3.

DLC_MOD_LAAS.moddesc: Ports the Asari Adept armor (from the OT Multiplayer for Liara). Optional outfit and armor for Shepard.

DLC_MOD_LAYEREDOUTFITS_MSHEPLE3.moddesc: Adds outfits with a layered theme for Male Shepard to purchase using Sims 4 CC from: Darte77, Elliesimple, and Amelylinaa.

DLC_MOD_LE3AIMASSISTOFF.moddesc: When using controller, aim assist is enabled. Many players hate that. This mod turn off Aim Assist.

DLC_MOD_LE3AUTOCOVEROFF.moddesc: Are you sick of getting in cover when you don't want to? Install this mod and to get cover you would need click button.

DLC_MOD_LE3BETTERARMORBODIES.moddesc: Various mesh edits to FemShep's armors.

DLC_MOD_LE3BINDER.moddesc: An underwear replacer for maleShep that has a binder

DLC_MOD_LE3CACMUSICSWAP.moddesc: Swaps LE1 and LE3's character creation synth themes during Reconstruction.

DLC_MOD_LE3CASUALS_AS_ARMOURS.moddesc: This mod adds casual outfits for both BroShep and Femshep to the armour section of the locker. So you can go on Illium in a hoodie for example.

DLC_MOD_LE3DIALOGUETWEAKS.moddesc: Various options for tweaks made to dialogue and cutscenes (ex: Garrus's bottle shooting contest).

DLC_MOD_LE3DPENGLISH.moddev: Tydeous & the Elcor Hamlet Appreciation Socie
DLC_MOD_LE3DPENGLISH.moddesc: A project designed to diversify LE3 through better species' population balancing, outfit/appearance diversification and overall breathing more life into the world.

DLC_MOD_LE3INSERT.moddesc: This is pack of separate mods - so you can install only what you want. Realistic sprinting, Mouse smoothing and acceleration off, Space and ESC skips dialogues without selecting response, Enhanced interactable objects highlight distance, Additional buttons (fast any console command use with button )

Realistic sprinting, Mouse smoothing and acceleration off, Space and ESC skips dialogues without selecting response, Enhanced interactable objects highlight distance, Additional buttons (fast any console command use with button )

DLC_MOD_LE3PATCH.moddesc: Extensive Bugfix / Correction mod for Mass Effect 3 Legendary Edition

DLC_MOD_LE3PATCH_LOC.moddesc: Extensive Bugfix / Correction mod for Mass Effect 3 Legendary Edition

DLC_MOD_LE3PHOTOEDITS.moddesc: Increases the distance you can go in photo mode.

DLC_MOD_LE3SHIELDGATE.moddesc: Now you can tweak Shield Gate mechanic to your liking. You can turn it off or change percentage of it to 25/50/75/100%

DLC_MOD_LE3SKIPDIALOGUES.moddesc: This is pack of separate mods - so you can install only what you want. Realistic sprinting, Mouse smoothing and acceleration off, Space and ESC skips dialogues without selecting response, Enhanced interactable objects highlight distance, Additional buttons (fast any console command use with button )

DLC_MOD_LE3SPRINTREALISM.moddesc: This is pack of separate mods - so you can install only what you want. Realistic sprinting, Mouse smoothing and acceleration off, Space and ESC skips dialogues without selecting response, Enhanced interactable objects highlight distance, Additional buttons (fast any console command use with button )

DLC_MOD_LE3UWDLC.moddesc:
This mod is a total conversion of ALOV to a 21:9 aspect ratio - rescaling and reframing over 550 videos for a fully immersive, full-screen experience on ultra-wide monitors.

The ALOV (a lot of videos) mod is an exhaustive and comprehensive 4K 60fps video overhaul and upscale of all Mass Effect cutscenes, and misc improvements.

DLC_MOD_LE3WALKDECALS.moddesc: 10x Time Speed Button (LeftAlt or MiddleMouseButton ). Walk as toggle instead of hold. Decals not disappear after 15seconds but stay infinite. You can install only part of that mod if you don't want all of it functions. Additionally you can bind button T and B to any function you want (at default this is blocked in game).

DLC_MOD_LE3_MEDIGEL_XP.moddesc: Reduces XP awarded to players for picked-up medi-gel that excess their maximum capacity.

DLC_MOD_LECEMF.moddesc:
LE port of Citadel Epilogue Mod by Deager.

Play the Citadel DLC post-credits and experience the ultimate "Shepard Survives" feeling. No Cerberus. No war. No Reapers. Just fun.

DLC_MOD_LECEML.moddesc:
LE port of Citadel Epilogue Mod by Deager.

Play the Citadel DLC post-credits and experience the ultimate "Shepard Survives" feeling. No Cerberus. No war. No Reapers. Just fun.

DLC_MOD_LEGIONFEMSHEPN7_LE3.moddesc: Femshep N7 shoulder guard for Legion instead of Broshep N7 shoulder guard.

DLC_MOD_LENG.moddesc: Removes as much Kai Leng as possible from LE3.

DLC_MOD_LENGUNMASKED.moddesc: This mod removes Kai Leng's visor to show his face more.

DLC_MOD_LESS_RESTRICTIVE_PAUSEMENU_AND_P.modname: LE3 Less Restrictive Pause Menu & Photo Mode
DLC_MOD_LESS_RESTRICTIVE_PAUSEMENU_AND_P.moddesc: BETA. This mod removes most restrictions on bringing up the Pause Menu during gameplay including when/where you can activate Photo Mode. Due to requests I released this mod in its current Beta state.

DLC_MOD_LETTERBOX.moddesc: Removes the Letterboxing on Ultrawide Resolutions for Mass Effect: Legendary Edition

DLC_MOD_LEVEL_REWARDS.moddesc: Does your eye twitch looking at the empty power ranks left after reaching level 60? This mod may be for you!

DLC_MOD_LIARACA.moddesc:
James and Garrus have camoflaged armours, so why not Liara too?

v1.1 includes the missing .tfc file.

DLC_MOD_LIARACASUALLE3.moddesc: A port of the ME3 mod, Liara Casual. This gives Liara casual clothing on the Normandy and on the Citadel when off-duty (including in the Citadel DLC).

DLC_MOD_LIARAHELMET.moddesc: Replaces Liara's breathing mask with a helmet in her silver armoured suit.

DLC_MOD_LIA_BRTHR.moddesc: This Adds Liara's Breather replacing the N7 helmet as the default so missions requiring breather use this.

DLC_MOD_LIA_SBA.moddesc: A collection of new outfits for squadmates.

DLC_MOD_LINSDFR3.moddesc: There are many Shepards, but this one is mine. And she could be yours! This is a totally custom default head replacer, which means she works out of the box, no save editing required.

DLC_MOD_LITTLE_EXTENSION.moddesc: This is My Little Extension for LE3. Weapons, armors, outfits, Phantom Armor store rework and some fixes.

DLC_MOD_LJACKET.moddesc: Adds a custom leather jacket outfit to femshep's locker.

DLC_MOD_LNA_LE3.moddesc: An asari inspired armor for Liara to wear in LE2 and LE3.

DLC_MOD_LOADING.moddesc: Removes the save/load icon and text from LE3. Also removes the red selector UI.

DLC_MOD_LYSFORCASINO.moddesc: New batch of outfits that contains dresses and skirts from Sims CC Creators and Original Sims Content as buyable Casual Clothes for FemShep LE3

DLC_MOD_M3_MERGE.moddesc: Automatically generated merge DLC for compatibility patching.

DLC_MOD_MALESHEPARDTURTLENECKSLE3.moddesc: Adds turtleneck casual outfits for Male Shepard to the locker.

DLC_MOD_MALESHEPUNDERWEAR.modname: Maleshep Underwear Addition to the Closet
DLC_MOD_MALESHEPUNDERWEAR.moddesc: Unlocks underwear for the maleshep's closet. 15 new texture options for underwear.

DLC_MOD_MALE_FRECKLES3.moddesc: A DLC mod with various freckled complexions for maleShep. This is NOT a texture mod!

DLC_MOD_MATCHFATI.moddesc: Gives EDI, James, and Liara custom Alliance fatigues and recolors the N7 hoodie pants to match.

DLC_MOD_MCOMPANIONFEMSHEP.moddesc: Adds couple of requested companion outfits to the Femshep closet.

DLC_MOD_ME2VIXENHAIRTOLE3.moddesc: Modifies the default LE2 and 3 hair to look like how it does in the original 2010 Mass Effect 2. I used the original ME2 hair model as reference when sculpting the hair in Blender.

DLC_MOD_ME3LE_GAMEPLAY_TWEAKS.moddesc: This Coalesced tweak adjusts multiple aspects of gameplay for ME3LE and integrated Mistyvail's More appearances for ME3LE.

DLC_MOD_ME3RESCULPTED.moddesc:
This mod brings all new hand sculpted meshes to the ME3 to replace the existing femshep casual outfits. This will not only affect all of femsheps base game casual outfits but it will replace some outfits used by the female NPCs when playing as a female Shepard.

- Please help me by upload in game screenshots! I need lots! -

DLC_MOD_ME3RESCULPTEDBUFF.modname: Mass Effct 3 LE Re-Sculpted Buff Version
DLC_MOD_ME3RESCULPTEDBUFF.moddesc:
This mod brings all new hand sculpted meshes to the ME3 to replace the existing femshep casual outfits. This will not only affect all of femsheps base game casual outfits but it will replace some outfits used by the female NPCs when playing as a female Shepard.

- Please help me by upload in game screenshots! I need lots! -

DLC_MOD_ME3_GAMEPLAYTWEAKS.moddesc: These are a few "Quality of Life" changes that allow me to better enjoy replaying this outstanding series of games. These were originally Coalesced file edits for personal use but have now been converted to custom DLC and posted publicly.

DLC_MOD_ME3_MULTIPLAYER_INSPIRED_CLASSES.moddesc: Reworked versions of Adept, Sentinel, Engineer, and Vanguard for ME3 LE inspired by ME3 Multiplayer classes. These classes tend to play more offensively than defensive, so have fun.

DLC_MOD_ME3_PARABELLUM.moddesc: More martial versions of character classes Adept, Engineer, and Vanguard.

DLC_MOD_ME3_RELAXEDENCUMBERANCE.moddesc: Allows additional weapon weight to be carried with less encumbrance.

DLC_MOD_ME3_SERAPHINFILTRATOR.moddesc: Want to cloak and sneak up on Geth? Show Cerberus what you think of their smoke grenades?

DLC_MOD_ME3_SPECTRE.moddesc: A Custom Character class for the box-art and trailers Cmdr Shepard. One human, One Omni-Tool, and guns.

DLC_MOD_ME3_UNCOOLED.moddesc: Alternate versions of the Infiltrator and Soldier classes not using Cryo Ammo.

DLC_MOD_ME3_WEAPONTWEAKS.moddesc: This modifies several weapons in ways that make them either more effective or sensible, making the game more enjoyable for me so I thought I'd share. These were originally Coalesced file edits for personal use but have now been converted to custom DLC and posted publicly.

DLC_MOD_MEA_ARKII_MSHEPLE3.modname: Andromeda Ark Outfits II for MaleShep (LE3)
DLC_MOD_MEA_ARKII_MSHEPLE3.moddesc: Adds an outfit made up of some of the Pathfinder's casuals from MEA and vanilla ME3 assets for Male Shepard to wear. Comes in two mesh variants (rolled-up sleeves and long sleeves) with three color options: N7, Spectre, and Alliance.

DLC_MOD_MEA_ARK_MSHEPLE3.moddesc: Adds a MEA Ark outfit for Male Shepard to wear. Comes in two mesh variants (one vanilla--long sleeves, one custom-made from vanilla--short sleeves) with three color options: N7, Spectre, and Alliance.

DLC_MOD_MEA_JS_MSHEPLE3.moddesc: Adds a MEA jumpsuit for Male Shepard to wear.  Comes in two mesh variants with three colors: N7, Spectre, and Alliance.

DLC_MOD_MEA_MEDIC_MSHEPLE3.moddesc: Adds the MEA medic/scientist outfit for Male Shepard to wear. Comes in one mesh variant with multiple logo/color variations.

DLC_MOD_MENAEFIX.moddesc: This Mod fixes the visual glitch on Palavan's moon Menae. (LE3)

DLC_MOD_MILEENATHEME.modname: Mileena Themed Reskin for Liara LE3
DLC_MOD_MILEENATHEME.moddesc: Adds a Mortal Kombat 1 Mileena themed reskin for Liara's From Ashes outfit. REQUIRES LE3 COMMUNITY AND FRAMEWORK PATCH. Version 1.1 adds the proper textures for the Mileena Reskin

DLC_MOD_MILESAWAY.moddesc: GPG's Miles Away hair mod for Femshep, ported to LE3 and neatly packaged in a DLC.

DLC_MOD_MIRHAIRFRAME.moddesc: This is a replacer for Miranda's hair. This is currently for LE2 and LE3. LE3 is in ALPHA stage.

DLC_MOD_MJK_CAA.moddesc: Adds the multiplayer Customizable Asari Adept Armor to FemShep's locker. Choose colours and patterns like you would the N7 armor.

DLC_MOD_MOM.moddesc: This mod allows Spacer Shepards to call their mother with the Normandy QEC after Priority: Rannoch.

DLC_MOD_MORNINGVERSATILEFEMHAIR.moddesc: Bunch of hairstyles for femshep using cc from Sonyasims le3.
