DLC_MOD_MOVE_FASTER_IN_THE_DREAMS.modname: Dreams - Wear Casuals and or Move Faster
DLC_MOD_MOVE_FASTER_IN_THE_DREAMS.moddesc: Move Faster in the Dreams and option to wear Casuals instead of Armour

DLC_MOD_MSHEPHAIR.moddesc:
New Hairstyles for MShep - MELE3 is just a conversion, for the Legendary Edition, of some girlplaysgame hair mods (https://girlplaysgame.com/mods/hair/).
This mod only includes male hairstyles.

DLC_MOD_MTINTABLEMALESHEP.modname: Morning's Tintable Armors for Maleshep LE3
DLC_MOD_MTINTABLEMALESHEP.moddesc: Vanilla armors and new stuff made tintable for maleshep LE3.

DLC_MOD_MTR_LEV.moddesc: A random collection of mods (and ports) I made for myself and decided to share.

DLC_MOD_MWM.moddesc: Expands the amount of weapon mods with previously restricted and new weapon mods.

DLC_MOD_MYRIADPROBEGONELE3.moddesc: Replaces Myriad Pro font with "Tigensu", the secondary iconic Mass Effect font, for the entire trilogy (including Launcher). This mod also makes UI adjustments such as fixing misaligned text and HUD elements and overhauling the dialogue wheel.

DLC_MOD_N7ASHARM.modname: N7 Ashley & Kaidan Armor for Shepard LE3
DLC_MOD_N7ASHARM.moddesc: 4 variations of N7 Ashley & Kaidan armor for Shepard. For ME3 Legendary edition.

DLC_MOD_N7NILLIN.moddesc: Leather Jacket based on Nilin's outfit in Remember Me. LE3 Port.

DLC_MOD_N7OP_LE3.moddesc:
New casual jumpsuit for female Shepards in LE3.
Three variants (N7, Alliance, Spectre).

DLC_MOD_N7WARLE3.moddesc: Combat mod with multiple gameplay options.

DLC_MOD_N7_ANGL.moddesc: A port of horography's N7 ANGL hoodie from the OT.

DLC_MOD_N7_GHOST.moddesc: Are you a fan of Shaundi452's N7 Ghost retextures of Cerberus Spirit, Nightmare and Shade armor sets? This mod adds three armor sets: N7 Spirit, Nightmare and Shade using Shaundi's textures. It also provides one torso and one helmet for players who prefer to use armor pieces.

DLC_MOD_N7_GHOST_PARTS.moddesc: Are you a fan of Shaundi452's N7 Ghost textures for Cerberus Spirit, Nightmare and Shade armor sets? This mod may be for you.

DLC_MOD_N7_HARRIER.moddesc: A little N7 retexure for the Cerberus Harrier weapon.

DLC_MOD_N8_SP_WEAPONS.moddesc: Better accuracy and slower bloom. Less recoil. Less weight. Other adjustments. No nonsense. Done by an ME3 multiplayer veteran.

DLC_MOD_NASA.moddesc: This mod rotates characters in squad screen in LE3 to resemble squad screens from ME2, ME3 E3 2011 footages and ME3 multiplayer.

DLC_MOD_NDRESSUNIFORM.moddesc: Changes the gold chain on Shepard's and Anderson's dress blues for a black chain.

DLC_MOD_NEWCASUALSFEMSHEP.moddesc: Six new casual outfit options for Femshep: three t-shirts and three crop tops.

DLC_MOD_NEWCASUALSIIISHEPLE3.moddesc: Outfitted from the original male Shepard's jacket, this mod introduces twenty-seven brand-new casual leather jacket outfits for Femshep, available for purchase on the Normandy.

DLC_MOD_NEWCASUALSIISHEPLE3.moddesc: Six new casual outfit options for Femshep: three tanktops and three corresponding croptops.

DLC_MOD_NEWOUTFITSFEMSHEPLE3.moddesc: Thirty-three new casual outfits for Femshep converted from the Sims for LE3.

DLC_MOD_NEW_STORE_EXAMPLE.moddesc: For users this adds 4 outfits for Mshep and Femshep to a new store found on the Normandy in the shuttle bay. For modders you can use this as a template alongside the tutorial linked in the description to make your own custom stores.

DLC_MOD_NILIN_CASUAL_OUTFIT.moddesc: Adds the Nilin outfit to FemShep's wardrobe. Optionally replaces the intro military dress blues.

DLC_MOD_NILIN_DRIP.moddesc: Adds the Nilin outfit to FemShep's wardrobe. Optionally replaces the intro military dress blues.

DLC_MOD_NOHELMETSET.modname: LE3 Full set armors without helmets
DLC_MOD_NOHELMETSET.moddesc: This is a simple edit to remove helmets from full set armors.

DLC_MOD_NOSNIPERZOOM_LE3.modname: No Sniper Zoom for SMGs HPs and ARs (LE3)
DLC_MOD_NOSNIPERZOOM_LE3.moddesc: No more sniper zoom for SMGs, HPs, or ARs. Scope bonuses still apply.

DLC_MOD_NOTIFICATION_TIME.moddesc: Tired of waiting for the 'deck' of notifications to clear up after starting the game or purchasing several weapon upgrades? This mod may be for you.

DLC_MOD_NOVA4ME3.moddesc: This is a rebalance package for LE3, intended to mostly tune down OP weapons, and tune up weak ones.

DLC_MOD_NOWEAPONWEIGHT.moddesc: Removes the weapon weight cooldown mechanic in LE3.

DLC_MOD_NO_AIR_SUPPORT_LE3.moddesc: This mod removes one line of banter, Liara's "Next time we go to war, maybe the Alliance can spring for air support?" during mission on Thessia. Works with all four language versions (INT, DEU, FRA and ITA).

DLC_MOD_NPCHAIR.moddesc: This is a replacer for Miranda's hair. This is currently for LE2 and LE3. LE3 is in ALPHA stage.

DLC_MOD_NRM.moddesc: Removes 10% markup at Alliance Requisition Terminals in Normandy's Shuttle Bay and Citadel's Armax Arsenal Arena.

DLC_MOD_NYR_VSR.moddesc: Gives Nyreen Vetra's visor (from Mass Effect: Andromeda).

DLC_MOD_OMEGAALL.modname: Omega Interrupt for All Tech Classes
DLC_MOD_OMEGAALL.moddesc: Changes the Omega interrupt from being exclusive to engineer to being available to all tech classes. Also has optional all classes version.

DLC_MOD_OMEGAINTERRUPT.modname: Omega Interrupt for All Tech Classes
DLC_MOD_OMEGAINTERRUPT.moddesc: Changes the Omega interrupt from being exclusive to engineer to being available to all tech classes. Also has optional all classes version.

DLC_MOD_OMGHUB.moddesc: A new hub area for players to explore

DLC_MOD_OMGHUBENGLISH.moddesc: A new hub area for players to explore

DLC_MOD_OMNIKEY.moddesc: Adds Use, Cover/Roll and Sprint as separate entries in the Key Bindings Menu for Legendary Edition.

DLC_MOD_OPAQUEVISORS_LE3.moddesc: This mod makes Shepard default and Eligible squadmates' helmet visors non seethrough.

DLC_MOD_OPENANDSLIMSUITFORCASINO.modname: Open Suit and Slimfit Suit for Casino Party
DLC_MOD_OPENANDSLIMSUITFORCASINO.moddesc: Bunch of outfits from Sims CC creators and original sims content as buyable Casual Clothes for MaleShep LE3

DLC_MOD_OPREMASTER.moddesc: LE3 Opening Remaster improves/extends the opening cinematic of Mass Effect 3: Legendary Edition.

DLC_MOD_OPTIONALFLIRTINGMOD.moddesc: Adds extra options on the dialogue wheel in LE3 so that Shepard has an actual choice between being friendly or flirty to potential love interests (and therefore doesn't get surprised by love confessions from people they were just trying to be friendly to).

DLC_MOD_ORIANA.moddesc: Small lore-friendly mod that changes Oriana's face into Miranda's, so they actually look like twins. ME3LE version.

DLC_MOD_ORIGINALEND.moddesc: Restores the original 2012 release ending. That's right, get your RGB endings RIGHT HERE! Changes can be restored on a modular basis, along with options to restore cut content (Anderson conversation, alternate beam evacuation) and optional tweaks (improved release ending slides, adjusted war assets).

DLC_MOD_OUTFITEDITS_MSHEP_LE3.moddesc: Adds a few edits of casual outfits already available in vanilla for Male Shepard.  Currently includes edits to the N7 Leather Jacket and the N7 Hoodie.  All will be unlocked in the locker right from the start.

DLC_MOD_OUTFITS_FOR_SHEPARD_LE3.moddesc: This is the main file that makes the store work.

DLC_MOD_P4_DRESS_BLUES.moddesc: Gives all Shepards a choice of new Dress Blues that include 2, 3 or 4 stripes and give you 3 colour options. Standard Hackett look, Red/Black Hackett look and Standard Hackett look but with Black Pants

DLC_MOD_P4_ZAEED_ARMOUR.moddesc: Gives Shepard Zaeed's armour as an armour and casual option

DLC_MOD_PADMES_DRESSES.moddesc: This adds some dresses to LE3 for Femshep. Kasumi dress mashups and n7 dress mashups so far. As per the votes since I have added a new outfit, the dresses are now separate from the rest of the casuals.

DLC_MOD_PADMES_NORMANDY_ADDITIONS.moddesc: A mod page for all my additions to the Normandy Cabin and later maybe Shepard's Apartment. Such as Legion's Chest Piece in Shepard's Cabin

DLC_MOD_PADME_AMIDALA.modname: [Star Wars] Padme Amidala as Shepard LE3
DLC_MOD_PADME_AMIDALA.moddesc: This mod changes the LE3 default femshep headmorph's with stepanovsculpts new model of Padmé Amidala and her iconic Attack of the Clones hairstyle (from hantzgruber).

DLC_MOD_PARTYTIME.moddesc: Play through all phases of the Citadel Party in a single playthrough. Choose whether the first phase is relaxed or rowdy, then play through two relaxed phases followed by two rowdy phases. Wake up phase will match your first phase choice by default, but can be set via the Mod Setting menu if using the LE3 Community Patch.

DLC_MOD_PARTYUPS.moddesc: Mod that allows you to have multiple serious romances (not only flirt or cheating) going at the same time. Also adds a bunch of other functions, connected to romance part of the game and improves party.

DLC_MOD_PAWS_CASUAL_ATTIRE.moddesc: This mod will include all casual outfits I make for Shepard both BroShep and Femshep

DLC_MOD_PAWS_SUE.moddesc: This page is for all my science uniform edits where the main focus is the science uniform. So it may include parts of other outfits but the main focus is the science uniform. For Shepard.

DLC_MOD_PEPPER_STEP_LE3.moddesc: This mod adds some pep to Shep's step. Ever felt maddeningly frustrated by how slow Shepard jogs and walks? Well now you can add just a tiny bit of pep to your step, just a bit of effort to hasten on your way.

DLC_MOD_PERSISTENTSETTINGS.moddesc: LE3 - Allows you to change settings in-game that persist across saves. Currently only for adjusting the FOV of the camera.

DLC_MOD_PHH_LE3.moddesc: Halloween season is upon us!!! Two helmets for LE3, one with customizable tints and lights, and one with only customizable lights.

DLC_MOD_PIM.moddesc: This mod replaces the Kai Leng shuttle scene during the Cerberus Coup with an introduction scene for the Phantom. As such, this restores Bioware's original intended introduction to the Phantom enemy class.

DLC_MOD_PINNACLE_INTAISEI_INFO_FIX.moddesc: Only for Spanish and Italian localizations, other languages don't need it. Pinnacle Station and planet Intai'sei have interchanged their names and descriptions. This mod will fix it.

DLC_MOD_PISTOLS_REMADE_LE3.moddesc: Pistols resized to be smaller and SMGs altered to look like and be held like a rifle.

DLC_MOD_PLUMBOB.moddesc: Adds the iconic The Sims Plumbobs as accessories in LE3

DLC_MOD_POLYROM.moddesc: Mod that allows you to have multiple serious romances (not only flirt or cheating) going at the same time. Also adds a bunch of other functions, connected to romance part of the game.

DLC_MOD_POWERGRID.moddesc: This edits Purgatory club so that there is a difference in how the club looks before and after you complete the sidequest "Citadel: Improved Power Grid".

DLC_MOD_POWERPEN.moddesc: Can once again use powers on shielded enemies like LE1

DLC_MOD_PRACTICALBODIES_ARMOREDSHEPARD.moddesc: Mesh changes to Femshep's vanilla armors to be more practical. The new edits now allow the various armors to reflect Shepard's Special Forces background/training.

DLC_MOD_PRACTICALBODIES_CASUALSHEPARD.moddesc: Mesh changes to Femshep's vanilla casual outfits to be more practical. The new edits now allow outfits to reflect Shepard's Special Forces background/training.

DLC_MOD_PRACTICAL_BODIES_SQUADMATES.moddesc: Changes to the bodies and armors for Ashley, Edi, and Liara to be more practical for fighting while also being unique to each of their backgrounds.

DLC_MOD_PRIORITYRANNOCHMEDCRATE_LE3.moddesc: Removes Medcrates from all Rannoch missions.

DLC_MOD_PROJECTVARIETY.moddesc: Project Variety is a major, extremely customizable, overhaul of Mass Effect 3.

DLC_MOD_PROJECTVARIETY2.moddesc: Project Variety requires more than 2GB of textures - this DLC adds an additional 2GB of texture space.

DLC_MOD_PROJECTVARIETY3.moddesc: Project Variety is a major, extremely customizable, overhaul of Mass Effect 3.

DLC_MOD_PROJECTVARIETYP.moddesc: Project Variety is a major, extremely customizable, overhaul of Mass Effect 3.

DLC_MOD_PROLOGUEOUTFITCUSTOM.moddesc: Customize your outfit for the prologue!

DLC_MOD_PROPERPHALANXLE3.moddesc: Phalanx restored to LE2 version. Includes restored stats and laser sight.

DLC_MOD_RD.moddesc: Changes Gameplay and cutscenes of the dream sequences of ME3 to give more representation of player choices and reduce the presence of the child.

DLC_MOD_REAPERNOPENALTY.modname: No Movement Penalty During Rannoch Boss Fight
DLC_MOD_REAPERNOPENALTY.moddesc: Removes targeting speed penalty when moving during boss fight on Rannoch.

DLC_MOD_REDUCEDPLOTARMOR.moddesc: Adds a chance that Shepard's plot armor may fail in LE3. Includes a chance for a new ending in hard mode!

DLC_MOD_REEGAR.moddesc: Reegar Returns is a mod that allows for Kal Reegar to participate in and survive the events of Mass Effect 3

DLC_MOD_REEGARLIVES.moddesc: This mod replaces the email that Shepard receives about Kal'Reegar's death with one that confirms his survival.  It also adds three brand-new emails from Kal'Reegar, one for each outcome of the Geth-Quarian conflict.

DLC_MOD_REMNANT_MSHEPLE3.moddesc: Ports a selection of armors from Mass Effect: Andromeda for Male Shepard to wear.  Currently includes the "Heavy" versions of Heleus, Remnant, and Angaran.

DLC_MOD_RENEGADESCARSFORALLLE3.moddesc: Alters the way Renegade scarring progresses in LE2 and LE3. Can allow Paragon Shepards to use scar progression or turn scars on all the time regardless of alignment.

DLC_MOD_REPORTER.moddesc: Emily Lives is a mod that allows Emily to survive the events of ME3 and allows her to join the Normandy as its fully voiced reporter. She completely replaces Diana Allers.

DLC_MOD_REPOSITORY.moddesc: Contained within this download is a selection of assets to use by modders to help them with their projects. This will be upgraded over time with additional files covering a wide range of objects such as gestures, animations, clothing and headmorphs. Downloading this will not affect your game.

DLC_MOD_RESERVED3.moddesc: This mod mount is reserved for an upcoming unreleased mod.

DLC_MOD_RESPEC_JAVIK.moddesc: BioWare forgot to add the ability to reset Javik's powers on the Normandy MedBay. They didn't fix it for LE either. This mod fixes that.

DLC_MOD_RKL.moddesc:
This mod makes Kai Leng mute and gives him a mask with the intent of making him a silent rival to Shepard.
It includes changes to his fight on Thessia.

DLC_MOD_RPRENGLE.moddesc: This mod replaces all Reaper Capital ships with Thomas the Reaper Engines. Install this mod and behold as they assume control and lay destruction throughout the galaxy.

DLC_MOD_RPRRETRO.moddesc: This intends to overhaul the Reaper faction to use more of the husk monsters they have used through the rest of the trilogy, starting with the Abominations and eventually adding both the Scions and Praetorians that were first featured in Mass Effect 2.

DLC_MOD_RTH.moddesc: A mod that changes the powers of the Mass Effect 3 - Legendary Edition squadmates to be more useful on an Insanity playthrough.

DLC_MOD_SAFELYSKIP.modname: Safely skip the conversation for LE3
DLC_MOD_SAFELYSKIP.moddesc: Safely skip conversations without missing selections.

DLC_MOD_SAMARASNEWARMORFWLE3.moddesc: A brand new armor for Samara in Mass Effect 3 for the Legendary Edition. Concept by PSDO, mesh and textures by Zeb.

DLC_MOD_SAMARASNEWARMORLE3.moddesc: A brand new armor for Samara in Mass Effect 3 for the Legendary Edition. Concept by PSDO, mesh and textures by Zeb.

DLC_MOD_SAMARA_ARMOR.moddesc: Adds Samara's armor as both a casual option and an armor option to Shepard's locker.

DLC_MOD_SAP.moddesc: Changes the Shepard hologram in the Citadel Archives depending on class.

DLC_MOD_SCARPRIORITY.moddesc: Edits dialogue so a Shepard with severe renegade scars will always comment about them in the beginning of the Citadel DLC casino mission.

DLC_MOD_SCAWA.moddesc: Adds a new dialog wheel during the prologue that allow Shepard to agree with Anderson's decision to leave Earth.

DLC_MOD_SCS_NO_REAPERS.modname: No Reapers and Max Scan Range
DLC_MOD_SCS_NO_REAPERS.moddesc: Reapers don't respond to alert on galaxy map and scan range increased to entire system at once.

DLC_MOD_SECURITY.moddesc: Removes the annoying securiy scan animation on Deck 2 of the Normandy.

DLC_MOD_SEMENGLISH.moddesc: The purpose of Spectre Expansion Mod is to improve the under used Shadow Broker and Spectre terminals, to give the player new difficult choices to consider via Spectre authorisations, to improve the presence of background races in ME3, to expand the galaxy map and provide clues to the battles happening beyond the scope of Shepard’s missions.

DLC_MOD_SENSIBLESTORE.moddesc: All weapons can be purchased early, including the Collector Rifle. Greatly reduced prices so you can experience everything without NG+

DLC_MOD_SENTINEL_INCINERATE_CRYOAMMO.moddesc: Modifies the Sentinel class to become a master of all four power combo detonations. Replaces Lift Grenade and Cryo Blast with Incinerate and Cryo Ammo. Let the splosions commence!

DLC_MOD_SHEPARDHEAVYONYXUPGRADE3.modname: Shepard Heavy Onyx Stats Upgrade and Representation Consistency L
DLC_MOD_SHEPARDHEAVYONYXUPGRADE3.moddesc: Well what about Shepard?...It only made sense that The Commander got some love too. This mod basically gives Shepard's Heavy Onyx armor the respect it deserves.Perfect for Heavy Onyx enjoyers/users.

DLC_MOD_SHEPARDREBELTED.moddesc: Simple mod that replaces the ME3 legs with the ME2 legs for those who prefer Shepard's belt pre-ME3.

DLC_MOD_SHIRTLESS_JAMES.moddesc: Makes James Shirtless when not in combat, such as on the Normandy, Citadel party and other non combat locations.

DLC_MOD_SHORTHAIRSTYLESFEMSHEP.moddesc: A variety of shorter hairstyles by MoooD (Sims 4) converted for Femshep.

DLC_MOD_SHORTHAIRSTYLESFEMSHEPII.moddesc: A variety of shorter hairstyles by Obsims converted from the Sims for Femshep.

DLC_MOD_SHORTHAIRSTYLESFEMSHEPIII.moddesc: A variety of shorter hairstyles by MoooD converted from the Sims for Femshep.

DLC_MOD_SHPTANKS.moddesc: Adds new tank top outfits to casual appearance for both Female & Male Shepard. Includes optional additional casual outfits for FemShep.

DLC_MOD_SILENTTRAYNOR.moddesc: Removes Traynor's reminders about unread messages.

DLC_MOD_SKIPGC.moddesc: Adds the ability to immediately leave the Geth consensus and end the mission.

DLC_MOD_SKIPKID.moddesc: Makes conversations with the Catalyst skippable with Spacebar (or X on controller).

DLC_MOD_SKIPPABLEINTRO.moddesc: Allows user to skip through the cinematic scenes during the Earth Prologue. Mostly intended as a resource to get to screen-shottable moments faster, but also handy for that 1000th playthrough.

DLC_MOD_SMALLERGAMEPADDEADZONE.moddesc: This mod reduces the gamepad "look" stick's deadzone size, greatly improving sniper rifle fine aim control.

DLC_MOD_SMELLTHEROSESLE3.modname: Smell The Roses (Slow Down & Walk) LE3
DLC_MOD_SMELLTHEROSESLE3.moddesc: Have you ever wished Shepard would slow down, take a breath, and just smell the roses instead of rushing headlong through every hub and mission? Well now they can! Take in the sights and sounds, and when you are ready, you can even resume running at a quicker pace than before!

DLC_MOD_SMOOTHERGUI_LE3.moddesc: This mod increases the fps in the menus and other GUI animations from LE3.

DLC_MOD_SOLOWARFARELE3.moddesc: Solo Warfare LE3 brings ME3 Multiplayer's thrill to single-player. Face endless waves alone or with an AI partner. New threats like Cerberus helicopters and varied enemy loadouts keep you on your toes. Deploy sentries, call in air support, or summon Delta Force backup. Upgrade mid-fight, extract when overwhelmed, and compete for high scores!

DLC_MOD_SOMEARMORSFORSHEPARD.moddesc: Three new Ajax and Garmr (Cat-06) armors each (six total) for Femshep with new Alliance, N7, and Spectre texture sets. Also three new helmets with a clear front compatible with the new textures in this mod.

DLC_MOD_SOVEREIGNREAPERSOUNDCONSISTENCY.moddesc: Replaces most of the reaper horns with Sovereign's sound from LE1 during gameplay with an option to play during the galaxy map chase.Comes with other options and patches.

DLC_MOD_SPACER_FASHION_MALELE3.moddesc: Adds a variety of casual and formal outfits from The Outer Worlds for Male Shepard to purchase.

DLC_MOD_SPECTRE.moddesc: The purpose of Spectre Expansion Mod is to improve the under used Shadow Broker and Spectre terminals, to give the player new difficult choices to consider via Spectre authorisations, to improve the presence of background races in ME3, to expand the galaxy map and provide clues to the battles happening beyond the scope of Shepardâ€™s missions.

DLC_MOD_SPECTRE_HOODIE_LE3.moddesc: Gives Shepard a Spectre version of the N7 hoodie as a casual in 2 different colors. Works for both male and fem Sheps.

DLC_MOD_SPECTRE_WEAPONS.moddesc:
This mod changes the
- Cerberus Harrier
- Black Widow
- Wraith
- Paladin

Into Spectre Weapons! This is a texture change only, no change to the weapons stats.

DLC_MOD_SQUADMATECHEESEBURGER.moddesc: Demo of the Squadmate Outfit Merge feature. Gives James cheeseburger armor.

DLC_MOD_SR1PHOTO.moddesc: Simple retexture for the photo frame in Shepard's cabin to memorialize the Normandy SR-1. Now updated, super easy installation for ME3LE ...however ME2LE is giving me some trouble.

DLC_MOD_STARCRAFTSTYLEGHOSTINFILTRATORLE.moddesc:
To all but a few top Alliance officials, Ghosts do not exist, even unofficially. . .
-o-o-o-o-o-
This mod changes the Infiltrator class to resemble Ghosts from the StarCraft franchise.

DLC_MOD_STEALTH_SPIRIT.moddesc: Are you a fan of Shaundi452's Stealth Spirit retextures of Cerberus Spirit, Nightmare and Shade armor sets? This mod adds three armor sets: Armax Spirit, Nightmare and Shade using Shaundi's textures. It also provides one torso and one helmet for players who prefer to use armor pieces.

DLC_MOD_STEAM_CONTROLLER.moddesc:
This mod improves the game experience when using xinput and kbm inputs at the same time, such as with the Steam Controller.
Issues addressed:
You can now control the camera using the mouse in Power/Weapon Wheels
The interface can be locked to gamepad mode, and will no longer flash when switching input modes.
overloaded mappings

DLC_MOD_STORM_IMPROVEMENTS.moddesc: This allows for sprinting by tapping a button rather than holding for LE2 and LE3, and decreases the delay after sprinting before you can do other things. It also optionally allows for camera control while sprinting with a controller in LE3.

DLC_MOD_SUBTLE_FACES_LE3.modname: Subtle Faces for Quarians (and Tali) - LE3
DLC_MOD_SUBTLE_FACES_LE3.moddesc:
More visible and detailed faces for Tali'Zorah and other Quarians.
New textures and fully animated face meshes.

DLC_MOD_SWYMC.moddesc: This mod removes the bug-eyed, open-mouthed expression every Shepard has when holding their rifle.

DLC_MOD_TAAP.moddesc: Adds Tali's LE2 Alternate Appearance Pack outfit as a standalone.

DLC_MOD_TACCAM.moddesc: Ever get tired of the pause menu being so.... useless? Ever felt like the Dragon Age camera would be way cooler? Well here you go, this mod allows you to enter tactical camera mode and move it freely around your characters to cast your powers on ennemies, see exactly where they are, and prepare your attack plan accordingly.

DLC_MOD_TALIGARFRIENDS.moddesc: Tali and Garrus will stay as friends when neither are romanced in Mass Effect 3.

DLC_MOD_TALIGARRUSALWAYSROMANCE.moddesc: Allows Tali and Garrus to always flirt and hookup, even when being romanced by Shepard.

DLC_MOD_TALIOVERHAUL.moddesc: Overhaul of Tali's LE3 appearance with a completely new, fully animated face.

DLC_MOD_TALI_OUTFITS.moddesc: Out-Of-Combat replacers for Tali. Switch outfits in-game using the Mod Settings menu.

DLC_MOD_TCO.moddesc: Adds Tali's Casino outfit as a new outfit.

DLC_MOD_TEB.moddesc: An overhaul for the final mission of Mass Effect 3 with the aim of representing the allies you have gathered over the course of the trilogy, fixing bugs and adding ambient immersive events. In addition, this is natively built to be compatible with story mods such as Expanded Galaxy Mod and Spectre Expansion Mod.

DLC_MOD_TECHBERSERKER.moddesc: Rework of the Engineer class to include Adrenaline Rush, Tactical Cloak and Disruptor Ammo.

DLC_MOD_TECHRAIDER.moddesc: Rework of the Engineer class to include Tactical Cloak and Defense Matrix.

DLC_MOD_THANE.moddesc: Thane Lives is a mod that allows Thane to survive the event of Mass Effect 3 and lets him rejoin the Normandy as a fully voiced non combat crew member.

DLC_MOD_THANECANLIVE.moddesc: Makes it possible for Thane to fight Kai Leng and live.

DLC_MOD_THANE_SWAP.moddesc: Swaps Kaidan's mesh for Thane's to give players some more drell in their LE3

DLC_MOD_THEIAFORCASINO.moddesc: New batch of outfits that contains dresses and skirts from Sims CC Creators and Original Sims Content as buyable Casual Clothes for FemShep LE3

DLC_MOD_THEKENNETHBONKER.moddesc: The Kenneth Bonker removes some of Kenneth's ambient lines about EDI, Traynor and others.

DLC_MOD_THN_ALT.moddesc: Replaces Thane's outfit with the one from the Alternate Appearance Pack in LE2.

DLC_MOD_THREESTAGEMELEE.moddesc: Restores the 3-stage melee attack to LE3.

DLC_MOD_TIMEDILATION.moddesc: Removes time dilation effect when sprinting as Soldier, scoping in as Infiltrator and when losing shields.

DLC_MOD_TINTS.moddesc: More metallic armor tints that can be used with the parts armors or EGM Armor's with the torsos unlocked.

DLC_MOD_TIW.moddesc: Gives femshep a new suit based on The Illusive Man's outfit.

DLC_MOD_TIWCAS.moddesc: Gives femshep new suits based on The Illusive Man's outfit. Now also includes suits for maleshep.

DLC_MOD_TLI_CSTCY_ME3_L1_OTFT.moddesc: Replaces Tali's LE3 model with her model from LE1.

DLC_MOD_TLI_LE1.moddesc: A collection of new outfits for squadmates.

DLC_MOD_TMSBOOST.moddesc: Need a Boost to get a better ending for your playthrough? Look no further, T.M.S.B comes to the rescue! Added a few options to choose from.

DLC_MOD_TRANSLATION.moddesc: This is a Chinese translation of LE3.

DLC_MOD_TRANSPARENTHELMETSHEP.moddesc: Replaces the vanilla default breather helmet with a transparent visor version for both Shepards.

DLC_MOD_TRAYNOR_HEAD.moddesc: new custom head mesh for comm specialist samantha traynor. requires community patch/framework

DLC_MOD_TSONI.moddesc: Are you a fan of Shaundi452's Commander T'Soni's retextures of Cerberus Spirit, Nightmare and Shade armor sets? This mod adds three armor sets: T'Soni Spirit, Nightmare and Shade using Shaundi's textures. It also provides one torso and one helmet for players who prefer to use armor pieces.

DLC_MOD_TURIANFIRETEAMLE3.moddesc: Recruit Decius Tarkus and Phantom Company, enhancing your Normandy crew. Customize and deploy this elite Turian Fireteam alongside your chosen squadmates in various missions. Face off against increased enemy forces, making missions more dynamic. Dive into the heart of battle with your new Fireteam ready for action.

DLC_MOD_TVF_LE3.moddesc: Gives Tali and the Quarians visible faces by adding new meshes and lowering the opacity of the visor.

DLC_MOD_TWEAKS_CHEATS_LE3.moddesc: Mod adds different gameplay tweaks and cheats; unlocks basic outfits, armor, hats, weapon mods.  You can use casual outfits instead of armor.

DLC_MOD_UKTEXT.moddesc: This converts the text strings and subtitles from american english to british english. This is applied to the base game and all DLCs, with the intention to add strings from content mods in the future to keep compatible.

DLC_MOD_UNDERWEAR_REDONE.moddesc: Adds new underwear to FemShep's wardrobe, and optionally changes the default. May affect romance scenes.

DLC_MOD_UNIBLU.moddesc: Brings KH/heleuss' clothes mods to LE. Currently includes the dresses (one dress, four recolors), and two Alliance dress uniforms with skirt (which will replace the vanilla Alliance uniform).

DLC_MOD_UNIQUEQUARIANS.moddesc: Gives quarians in LE3 unique, fully animated, custom faces

DLC_MOD_UNIVERSALTHERMALCLIPS_LE3.moddesc: Thermal Clips are now a singular item used to cooldown your weapon. The clips are shared between all non heavy weapons and used from a single pool. Each clip will completely reload your weapon.

DLC_MOD_UNLIMFUELME3.moddesc: DLC mod for Unlimited Fuel for the Normandy in ME3

DLC_MOD_UN_RESTORE.moddesc: Prevents most of the dialogue from Anderson's conversation about having children from playing.

DLC_MOD_UULE.moddesc: Save the galaxy - or don't - in your underwear.

DLC_MOD_VACPLE3.moddesc: A project to model the characters after their actual voice actors.

DLC_MOD_VANILLAHAIRTWEAKS.moddesc: A port of ELE08's Vanilla Hair Tweaks for LE3.

DLC_MOD_VANPOWERS.moddesc: Replaces Shockwave with Warp to make your own explosions from afar.

DLC_MOD_VEGASAPT.moddesc: Restores the apartment from Pinnacle Station, originally ported by ME3Tweaks, to LE3 with some additions.

DLC_MOD_VIKING_INSPIRED_BRAID.moddesc: This mod is the first hair I ever made by myself. It was requested by a friend. For Femshep and Broshep

DLC_MOD_VIRMIRESAVE.moddesc: Allows for Ashley and Kaidan to seamlessly both appear in ME3.

DLC_MOD_VIRMIRESAVIOR.moddesc: Allows for Ashley and Kaidan to seamlessly both appear in ME3.

DLC_MOD_VIRMIRE_RESPECT.moddesc: Removes Joker's comment about the VS post coup

DLC_MOD_WARASSETSTWEAKS.moddesc: Various tweaks and cheats and QOL / consistency features regarding the War Assets.

DLC_MOD_WARLOCKARM_LE3.moddesc: Adds a few warlock armors from Destiny 2 as both casual and Torso armor options for Male Shepard to wear in LE3.

DLC_MOD_WARLORDWREX.moddesc: Makes Wrex look the part of the warlord that will save the krogan, whether they like it or not.

DLC_MOD_WEAPON_MOD.moddesc: This mod is an attempt to bring several assault rifles and most submachine guns in line with the Cerberus Harrier, on Insanity Difficulty.

DLC_MOD_WEAPON_ZOOMFOV_INCREASE.moddesc: For LE3. Increases the FOV when you Aim your weapon (ADS), so it doesnt zoom in so close to your character anymore with.

DLC_MOD_WEDDINGSTOREFEMSHEP.moddesc: Bunch of wedding dresses, jumpsuits, and suits for Femshep.

DLC_MOD_WEIGHT_REMOVER.moddesc: This mod removes the power regen speed penalty associated with weapon weight. Use whatever weapons you want without regard to a weapon's weight. Feel free to spend that point you normally spend on increasing weight capacity on the alternative.

DLC_MOD_WONG.moddesc:
Learn Emily Wong’s fate by an email from Diana Allers. Regardless if you allow her on board or reject her immediately. Diana would still send you an email with Emily’s last messages from the ANN Twitter feed.

Diana would also send another email if you kick her off the ship.

DLC_MOD_WREAV.moddesc: Lets Grunt (also Wrex, Wreav, and Dagg!) show some Urdnot pride with Wrex's iconic red in LE2 and 3.

DLC_MOD_WREXGRUNTCASUALS.moddesc: Casual outfits for Wrex and Grunt in non combat scenarios

DLC_MOD_WT_ARMOR_REMOVAL.moddesc: Do you suffer from armor-itis? Are you tired of scrolling through vanilla armor sets or pieces that you'll never use? This mod may be for you.

DLC_MOD_WT_ASH_VEGA_ARMOR.moddesc: Four collections of armor pieces using Ashley William's and James Vega's Armor.

DLC_MOD_WT_BLACKGUARD_ARMOR.moddesc: Blackguard Armor made possible by CelestialZ's textures.

DLC_MOD_WT_BLACKKNIGHT_ARMOR.moddesc: Thanks to CelestialZ's liberal permissions we're able to release the Black Knight Armor set! AKA Blood Dragon Armor with black textures and without the red dragon.

DLC_MOD_WT_BLOOD_DRAGON_ARMOR.moddesc: Ever wanted to use the Blood Dragon Armor but were not enthusiastic with the stats? This mod may be for you!

DLC_MOD_WT_BUFFED_ARMORY_100.moddesc: This mod adds one or more copies of LE3's default armor pieces: helmets, torso, shoulders, arms and legs with standard sets of stats for all pieces.

DLC_MOD_WT_BUFFED_ARMORY_80.moddesc: This mod adds one or more copies of LE3's default armor pieces: helmets, torso, shoulders, arms and legs with standard sets of stats for all pieces.

DLC_MOD_WT_IAP.moddesc: The Empress' Clothes is a mod that provides invisible armor pieces for the head, shoulders, arms and legs. This mod can be used stand alone or with IVAP and/or the EGM Armors.

DLC_MOD_WT_KAIDAN_LIARA_ARMOR.moddesc: Four collections of armor pieces using Kaidan Alenko's and T'Soni's  Armor.

DLC_MOD_WT_KAI_LENG_ARMOR.modname: WiredTexan's Kai Leng and Spirit Armor (LE3)
DLC_MOD_WT_KAI_LENG_ARMOR.moddesc: Pair of armor pieces using Kai Leng's and Cerberus' Spirit Armor.

DLC_MOD_WT_PHANTOM_ARMOR_PARTS.moddesc: Are you a fan of Shaundi452's T'Soni themed textures or MoonKissedAgara's Alliance themed textures for Cerberus Spirit, Nightmare and Shade armor sets? This mod may be for you.

DLC_MOD_WT_PREDATOR_ARMOR_PARTS.moddesc: Are you a fan of Shaundi452's Stealth Spirit textures or MoonKissedAgara's Spectre themed textures for Cerberus Spirit, Nightmare and Shade armor sets? This mod may be for you.

DLC_MOD_WT_QOL_HOTKEYS.moddesc: A collection of useful and not-so-useful hotkeys for LE3. Will be updated periodically.

DLC_MOD_WT_SEARCH.moddesc: Improves system and planet scanning in LE3.

DLC_MOD_WT_TERMINUS_ARMOR.moddesc: Ever wanted to use the Terminus Armor but were not enthusiastic with the stats? This mod may be for you!

DLC_MOD_YOUNG_MSHEP_3.moddesc: A DLC retexture of maleShep to make his appearance more lore accurate to his in-game age.

DLC_MOD_ZAEEDC.moddesc: Allows for Zaeed to join you as a squadmate for the entirety of Citadel DLC

DLC_MOD_ZAEED_CONVO.moddesc: This mod turns Zaeed's ambient dialogue on the Citadel into a cinematic Conversation.

DLC_MOD_ZEBSCASUALOUTFITS.moddesc: Three brand new casual appearances for female Shepard based on the concept art in the Mass Effect concept art book.

DLC_MOD_ZEBSFORMALAPPAREL.moddesc: Three brand new dresses (including re-colors) available for purchase in game for female Shepard. Casino dress replacers available.

DLC_MOD_ZEBSFORMALFORCASINO.moddesc: Three brand new dresses (including re-colors) available for purchase in game for female Shepard. Casino dress replacers available.

DLC_MOD_ZEBSTHIRTLEGGINGS.moddesc: One new outfit for female Shepard with three different color variations.

DLC_MOD_ZEN.moddesc: Based upon concept art by Bioware artist Matt Rhodes, this mod replaces the battle scene in the Catalyst dialogue with the Reaper fleet watching your moment of choice regarding their fate.

DLC_MOD_ZSJ_LE3.moddesc: Jumpsuits/coveralls for both female and male Shepard for LE3. Three different body types which can be picked upon installation, with two different sleeves and four different colors/affiliations, found directly in the appearance selection in game.

DLC_ONLINEPASSHIDCE.moddesc: DLC included with Mass Effect 3 Legendary Edition

DLC_UPD_PATCH01.moddesc: DLC included with Mass Effect 3 Legendary Edition

DLC_UPD_PATCH02.moddesc: DLC included with Mass Effect 3 Legendary Edition

DLC_ME1RE.moddesc: A patch/bug fix mod, this fixes a number of unresolved issues with Mass Effect.

DLC_MOD_ADAMS.moddesc: This mod changes Engineer Adams uniform into the standard Alliance fatigues to maintain consistency between the first and third games.

DLC_MOD_AMDLIGHTINGFIX.moddesc: Fixes the 'black blobs' glitch on Noveria and Ilos when running on an AMD CPU after 2011.

DLC_MOD_BLACKMARKET.moddesc: Grants galaxy-wide access to the purchase and salvage of weapons and gear from various shady or private manufacturers.

DLC_MOD_CASUALHUBS.moddesc: Allows Shepard and squadmates to wear casual clothes on the Citadel and Noveria.

DLC_MOD_CHARM_INTIMIDATE_REMOVER.moddesc: Removes Charm and Intimidate so you don't have to waste talent points leveling it up.

DLC_MOD_CHTW.moddesc: Marks the location of mineral deposits and other points of interest on the UNC world maps.

DLC_MOD_COMBATBARKS.moddesc: Removes some of the more repetitive NPC combat barks from the game.

DLC_MOD_EDEN.moddesc: Makes Eden Prime's sky more realistic by changing it to a blue tone, while maintaning the cloudy environment and the original lighting.

DLC_MOD_ELVTR.moddesc: Makes most elevators in the game twice as fast.

DLC_MOD_ESSENTIALASSIGNMENTS.moddesc: Reduces the amount of assignments in the game, leaving the ones most important or easiest to complete.

DLC_MOD_FEM_APPR.moddesc: Port of ME3's Default Femshep headmorph into ME1.

DLC_MOD_GMTS.moddesc: Tracks active and undiscovered UNC assignments on the galaxy map.

DLC_MOD_ILOSRUMBLE.moddesc: Mute or quieten the loud rumbling sound on Ilos.

DLC_MOD_KAIDANASHLEYOFFICER.moddesc: Gives Kaidan and Ash an Alliance Officer appearance while they are on the Normandy.

DLC_MOD_KPRS.moddesc: Marks unscanned Keepers on the Citadel maps.

DLC_MOD_LIARABLUEEYES.moddesc: Changes Liara's eye colour to a darker blue, similar to the one in Mass Effect 2 Lair of the Shadow Broker and Mass Effect 3.

DLC_MOD_ME1RE.moddesc: A patch/bug fix mod, this fixes a number of unresolved issues with Mass Effect. MUST be installed before ALOT or MEUITM texture mods.

DLC_MOD_N7MAKO.moddesc: Exclusive MAKO upgrades for N7 operatives: more powerful engine, improved suspension system, faster shield generator.

DLC_MOD_PINNACLETWEAKS.moddesc: This is a small DLC mod which tweaks two Pinnacle Station scenarios to make them more playable on Insanity. Volcanic and Tropical Hunt scenarios will start with more time on the clock, and give you slightly more time on kills. This is intended to bring the difficulty of these scenarios on Insanity to the level of the other scenarios. Lower difficulties are unchanged.

DLC_MOD_POLISHTRANSLATIONS.moddesc: Paczka spolszczeÅ„ dla modyfikacji do ME1: Black Market License, Charted Worlds, Galaxy Map Trackers, Keepers Finders autorstwa  55tumbl, oraz Me1Recalibrated autorstwa Kinkojiro. Paczka zainstaluje spolszczenie tylko dla zainstalowanych modyfikacji, wiÄ™c WPIERW zainstaluj wybrane mody, a pÃ³Åºniej tÄ™ paczkÄ™.

DLC_MOD_REPLENISHGRENADES.moddesc: This mod adds an interactable locker on the Normandy, from which you can restock your grenades! The locker is near Shepard's Locker, across from where Kaidan hangs out. Finally, you can stock up on grenades without digging through crates. It works like the Medi-gel Dispenser, or the grenade locker in Shepard's apartment from Pinnacle Station.

DLC_MOD_SAMEGENDER.moddesc: This mod allows Ashley and Kaidan to be romanced by both male and female Shepard, utilizing unused dialogue in the game files.

DLC_MOD_SAREN_STAGES.moddesc: This mod aims to both resolve and add to Saren's transformation throughout the game using hand created new meshes and HD textures. It introduces early forms of Saren before his heavy Geth implants. These looks should be less conspicuous and should help explain why the council could see him and still trust him.

DLC_MOD_TALIMASTERME1.moddesc: This DLC add Creative Machinima's 3D model of Tali Zorah to Mass Effect 1.

DLC_MOD_WREX_ICONIC_ARMOR_CONSISTENCY.moddesc: This mod has Wrex start out with his iconic heavy mercenary armor instead of the medium armor and lets him wear it when you first meet him and throughout the scenes on the Normandy. It also equips this armor when he first joins the squad.

DLC_MOD_XPRS.moddesc: Gradually increases the XP rewards (from kills, missions, etc) while leveling up, so that max level (60) can be reached in a single playthrough.

DLC_UNC.moddesc: A batarian extremist group has hijacked a mobile asteroid station in the Asgard system, setting it on a collision course with the nearby colony world of Terra Nova. Only you, and the hand-picked crew of the Normandy, can save the millions of innocent civilians before the asteroid completes its deadly descent.

DLC_VEGAS.moddesc: Test the limits of your combat prowess aboard a remote, top-secret Alliance space station. Do you have what it takes to hold the top spot among the best of the best? This module includes a new land-able space station, 13 exciting combat scenarios, and approximately 2-3 hours of game play.

DLC_XMEOW.moddesc: Mass Effect Overwritten - MEOw - is a collection of subtle textual modifications for Mass Effect. Currently comprising over 600 edits, MEOw allows for a more consistent and immersive experience in detail.

DLC_MOD_ADVANCEDWEAPONMODELS.moddesc: Replaces each of the weapon models in LE1 with their counterparts in LE2 and LE3. Lancer modeled assault rifles now have the Lancer model from LE3.

DLC_MOD_AFSHIR.moddesc: Adds several hairstyle conversions for custom Female Shepard in Mass Effect 1 Legendary Edition

DLC_MOD_AHSOKA.moddesc: This mod replaces default femshep with Star Wars Force Arena model of Ahsoka Tano. It also replaces the Onyx Heavy Armor b with Ahsoka's rebels outfit and also replaces the helmet and breather with Liara's breather. Use this mod with Iconic Fashion Party !

DLC_MOD_AHSOKA_TSONI.moddesc:
Ahsoka Tano replaces Liara T'Soni.
Use with Iconic Fashion Party.
You can use this mod with "Play as Padmé" or "Play as Bo Katan" mod.

DLC_MOD_ALLGEARTYPES.modname: All gear types for all classes
DLC_MOD_ALLGEARTYPES.moddesc: Makes Omni-tools and BioAmps equipable for all 6 Shepard classes.

DLC_MOD_ALLIANCEMARINEARMOR.modname: ME3 Alliance Marine Armor for LE1
DLC_MOD_ALLIANCEMARINEARMOR.moddesc: Alters all instances of the Alliance Marines in LE1 to wear their armor from LE3. Helmet assets obtained from Audemus and Mellin from their ME3 N7 Armor mod. Female Alliance armor texture obtained from Mellin. Light overlay texture obtained from SerjRozov. Includes patch for Mistyvail's Alliance Uniform Consistency Mod.

DLC_MOD_ALLIANCEMARINEARMORSHEPARD.modname: ME3 Alliance Armor for Shepard LE1
DLC_MOD_ALLIANCEMARINEARMORSHEPARD.moddesc: Replaces the Light Onyx Armor for Shepard with the ME3 Alliance Armor.Also comes with a casual option on the Normandy.

DLC_MOD_ALLIANCEUNIFORMCONSISTENCY.moddesc: Backports the Alliance fatigues and officer uniforms from Mass Effect 3 to Mass Effect 1.

DLC_MOD_ALOVUWLE1.modname: A Lot of Videos(ALOV) Ultrawide for LE1
DLC_MOD_ALOVUWLE1.moddesc:
This mod optimises ALOV for ultrawide monitors by scaling, reframing and in some instances recreating in-game footage in 21:9.

ALOV (A Lot of Videos) is an exhaustive and comprehensive 4K 60fps video overhaul project for Mass Effect LE, powered by AI and augmented with faithful in-game remakes, error corrections and other misc. improvem

DLC_MOD_ALTERNATECASUALFEMSHEP.moddesc: Gives Shepard a different casual outfit of your choice.

DLC_MOD_ALTERNATECASUALMALESHEP.moddesc: Gives Shepard a different casual outfit of your choice.

DLC_MOD_ALTERNATEMASSEFFECTTHEME.moddesc: Plays the original Mass Effect Theme in the prologue.

DLC_MOD_ALTN7.modname: Alternative N7 Armor for Femshep LE1
DLC_MOD_ALTN7.moddesc: Replaces the Light and Medium armor variants of femshep's Iconic Onyx gear with a modified version of the default N7 armor from ME3, using maleshep's chest and arm pieces.

DLC_MOD_ALTPERSUASION.moddesc: Roll the dice for Persuasion, and be ready to make some hard choices. Paragade/Renegon friendly. Also includes a cheat option to make all Charm/Intimidate dialog lines always available.

DLC_MOD_ARKHAMKNIGHTARMORFORMALESHEPARD.modname: Arkham Knight Armor For Male Shepard
DLC_MOD_ARKHAMKNIGHTARMORFORMALESHEPARD.moddesc:
Report In All of You! This is Militia Commander Shepard

Ports the Arkham Knight Armor from Batman Arkham Knight For Male Shepard

DLC_MOD_ARMORGAPFIX.moddesc: Fixes the gap for the male console unused armor.

DLC_MOD_ASHLEYHEAVYPHONEIX.moddesc: Makes Ashley use the heavy version of her armor depicted in the Mass Effect 1's  promotional material,the geth live feed on eden prime,squad screen and during the geth cutscene. Designed to be used with Iconic Fashion Party (LE1) if you use Ashley's heavy armor in that mod.

DLC_MOD_ASLE1.moddesc: Some options to replace the default Femshep with!

DLC_MOD_AUDIOOVERHAUL.moddesc: Overhauls a ton of sounds ported from LE2 and LE3 into LE1. For a better continuity and crispier audio.

DLC_MOD_BARASHIRT.moddesc: Ports the N7 hoodie and leather jacket for use in LE1.

DLC_MOD_BATMANV804ARMORFORMALESHEPARD.modname: Batman V8.04 Armor For Male Shepard
DLC_MOD_BATMANV804ARMORFORMALESHEPARD.moddesc: Time to put this suit to the test...

DLC_MOD_BATTLEDRESS.modname: Battle Dress Uniform for Male Shepard
DLC_MOD_BATTLEDRESS.moddesc: Ports the N7 hoodie and leather jacket for use in LE1.

DLC_MOD_BDTSTIMER.modname: Bring Down the Sky Timer Restored

DLC_MOD_BENEHAUL.moddesc: New meshes for Benezia's head and body and optionally puts her in commando armor for Noveria.

DLC_MOD_BENI_OUTFIT.moddesc: This mod gives Benezia a retinted version of the vanilla asari commando armor as well as a recolored version of Liara's headpiece from her pink armor in LE3. Patches available for LE1DP and Saren Stages. LE1 Community Patch Required.

DLC_MOD_BIOG_2DA_MOD_ASTEROID_X57_GALAXY.moddesc: A Galaxy Map fix that makes an asteroid (X57) at least look a like one (also in size) and not like the planet (Terra nova) which is located right next to it. I mean Bioware basically copied the assets of Terra nova made it like 50% smaller and they were done. This mod makes it look like a barren planetoid with even more reduced size.

DLC_MOD_BLACKMARKET.moddesc: Gives natural in-game access to weapons, armors, and mods from the four hidden manufacturers. Also fixes and rebalances the corresponding weapons.

DLC_MOD_BLOODDRAGONMALESHEPARDLE1.modname: Blood Dragon Armor For Male Shepard LE1
DLC_MOD_BLOODDRAGONMALESHEPARDLE1.moddesc: Created for Earth's Urban Combat Championship league, this set of armor has arrived in LE1 For Male Shepard!

DLC_MOD_BLUE_HANAR_LE1.moddesc: Makes Hanar blue across the trilogy

DLC_MOD_BOKATAN.modname: [Star Wars] Play as Bo Katan Kryze
DLC_MOD_BOKATAN.moddesc: This mod replaces default femshep with Bo Katan Kryze, with her Mandalorian armor and helmet from the Clone Wars.

DLC_MOD_BROOKSHR.moddesc: Adds Brooks' hair as a hairstyle option to Mass Effect 1, 2 and 3 Legendary Edition.

DLC_MOD_BROSHEPARM.moddesc: New armors for BroShep in LE1, including armors borrowed from Jacob & Kaidan.

DLC_MOD_BUFF_EFFECT_LE1.moddesc: Bigger and Buffer bodies for BroShep, FemShep, Ashley, Kaidan, Garrus, Wrex, Anderson, Nhilus, and Kirrahe. Supermodel bodies available for Femshep, Liara, and Tali.

DLC_MOD_CALESTON.moddesc: Adds the cut planet Caleston back into the game.

DLC_MOD_CASUALHUBS.moddesc: Allows Shepard and squadmates to wear casual clothes on the Citadel and on Noveria.

DLC_MOD_CASUALOUTFITS.moddesc: Replaces female Shepard's default fatigues with custom outfits.

DLC_MOD_CATSUIT.modname: N7 Cat Suit for Female Shepard
DLC_MOD_CATSUIT.moddesc: Replaces the "hidden" armors with a custom N7 cat suit. For female Shepard only. Compatible with all skin tones.

DLC_MOD_CHAKWAS_ALLIANCE.moddesc: A port of my LE3 Dr. Chakwas Alliance Uniform. Optional Alliance Uniform Consistency patch included.

DLC_MOD_CHARM_INTIMIDATE_REMOVER.moddesc: A mod that changes the powers of the Mass Effect 3 - Legendary Edition squadmates to be more useful on an Insanity playthrough.

DLC_MOD_CHARTEDWORLDS.moddesc: Marks the location of mineral deposits and other points of interest on the UNC world maps.

DLC_MOD_CHILDRENOFRANNOCH.moddesc: An extensive visual overhaul for quarians

DLC_MOD_CNLOCALIZATION.moddesc: Simplified Chinese translation of Mass Effect Legendary Edition

DLC_MOD_COLLECTIONUNCS.moddesc: Reduces the required amount of items for the UNC collection assignments.

DLC_MOD_COLLECTORCHITINARMORMALESHEPARDL.modname: Collector Chitin Armor For Male Shepard LE1
DLC_MOD_COLLECTORCHITINARMORMALESHEPARDL.moddesc: The Collectors' armor is flexible and even tougher than ballistic fibers which has arrived for Male Shepard in LE1!

DLC_MOD_COMBAT_COMMUNICATION_LE1.moddesc: Makes Shepard and Squadmates communicate more in combat.

DLC_MOD_COMPARATIVEWEAPONRY.moddesc: Evaluates and displays more accurate/relevant/informative weapon statistics, for easier comparisons.

DLC_MOD_COUNCIL.modname: Actual Effort Required (to Save The Council)

DLC_MOD_CREHA.moddesc: This adds about 23 hairs in the character creator. IMPORTANT READ DESCRIPTION!!!

DLC_MOD_CUSTOMFEMSHEPHEAD.moddesc: My custom female Shepard. Not a save game or sliders, but a fully custom head mesh.

DLC_MOD_DEADLYCOMBAT_LE1.moddesc: Deadly Combat enhances gunplay for a fun but terrifying experience. Combat is fast and furious with far more rounds being shot at you. This is not a balance mod, this mod emphasizes fun, hectic firefights, and more difficult combat in lieu of balance.

DLC_MOD_DEATHSTROKEARMORFORMALESHEPARD.moddesc:
These things should never be personal.I'm a trained killer.

Ports the Deathstroke's Armor from Batman Arkham Knight For Male Shepard

DLC_MOD_DEBUGSAVES.moddesc: Do you wish you could create debug saves and then see the the debug name on the load screen like you can in LE2 and LE3? Well now you can. I have hacked this ability into LE1. Useful for keeping track of saves for testing or replaying parts of the game to make different choices. Simply run the console commnad "DebugSave [your save name]"

DLC_MOD_DIVERSITYLE1.moddesc: A project designed to diversify LE1 through increased population count, better species' population balancing, outfit/appearance diversification and overall breathing more life into the world. This project is currently in ALPHA and is only partially complete.

DLC_MOD_DIVERSITYLE1_LOC.moddesc: Voiceover localisation for LE1 Diversification Project. Supports German/Deutsch, French/Français, Italian/Italiano, Polish/Polski & Russian/???????

DLC_MOD_EASIERFEROSCHECK.moddesc: Makes the persuasion check with Ethan Jeong on Feros easier.

DLC_MOD_ECLECTICEMAILS.moddesc: Adds several emails in LE1 to organically introduce and flesh out certain aspects such as characters, missions, and DLC (X57 & Pinnacle), in line with how LE2 and LE3 use emails.

DLC_MOD_EDENPRIMEEG.moddesc: This mod adds the Eden Prime easter egg that was unable to be added due to time constraints.

DLC_MOD_EDENPRIMESKY.moddesc: This mod does exactly what the title says, it restores the OG red sky that was present in the OG ME1.

DLC_MOD_EPDSFIX.moddesc: Alters all instances of the Alliance Marines in LE1 to wear their armor from LE3. Helmet assets obtained from Audemus and Mellin from their ME3 N7 Armor mod. DLC_MOD_EVIESHEPLE1.moddesc: My custom Evelyn Shepard, replaces the custom FemShep for all three games.

DLC_MOD_FASTERAIRLOCK.moddesc: Speeds up the processes of entering and exiting the Normandy.

DLC_MOD_FA_PADME_LE1.moddesc: This mod replaces default femshep's headmorph with PadmÃ© Amidala's from Force Arena game.

Players who want to use them will need to use the Trilogy Savegame Editor to change their Shepard's hair as for the moment it is not possible to include them on the Character Creator.

DLC_MOD_FEMSHEPHAIRLE1.moddesc: More Hairstyles for Femshep, for MELE1.

DLC_MOD_FEROSFILTER.moddesc: Removes Feros' yellow color filter and attempts to restore post-processing and fog from original ME1.

DLC_MOD_FRECKLES1_LE1.moddesc: A DLC mod with various freckled complexions for femShep.  This is NOT a texture mod!

DLC_MOD_FRECKLESM1.moddesc: A DLC mod with various freckled complexions for maleShep. This is NOT a texture mod!

DLC_MOD_FSHEPCAS.moddesc: Casual outfit replacers for femshep in LE1.

DLC_MOD_GALAXYMAPTRACKERS.moddesc: Tracks active and undiscovered UNC assignments on the galaxy map.

DLC_MOD_GAR_VSR_LE1.moddesc: A random collection of mods (and ports) I made for myself and decided to share.

DLC_MOD_GDLGLE1.moddesc:
Corrección de erratas e introducción de nuevas reglas de la RAE y modificaciones/unificación de formato para los textos en español de los tres juegos de la saga Mass Effect (LE).
-Versión para LE1-

DLC_MOD_GREEN_SHIALA.moddesc: A random collection of mods (and ports) I made for myself and decided to share.

DLC_MOD_GROUNDED.moddesc: Allows the Player to interact with the Galaxy map after the first 4 main story missions without immediately being grounded by the council, and allows for going to the citadel to turn in any remaining quests until they are grounded and the game prevents you from returning after you steal the Normandy.

DLC_MOD_HAIRMIX.moddesc:
Another bunch of hair mixtures for LE1, LE2, and LE3.
Two new hairstyles now available.

DLC_MOD_HALCYONHAIRPACK.moddesc: A dozen new hairs (5 male, 3 female, 3 crossgender) used by NPCs in LE1 Diversification Project and based on hairstyles from The Outer Worlds.

DLC_MOD_HKSHADOW_CORAARMOUR.moddesc: Cora's armour from ME:A for femshep

DLC_MOD_HKSHADOW_PEEBEEARMOUR.moddesc: Peebee's armour from ME:A for femshep

DLC_MOD_HOTLABSRESTORED.moddesc: Restores the Binary Helix Hot Labs area on Noveria that was heavily cut down in the final game.

All hairstyles plus the beard are custom meshes with new textures, meaning this mod provides 3D hair options and are not just painted over his face.

DLC_MOD_HUDENHANCE.moddesc: Makes various improvements to the HUD, including allowing an additional 4 hotkeys, a better medigel button, and various fixes for mixed input (simultaneous mouse/keyboard and controller inputs, as on the Steam Deck).

This application helps assess soldiers, but can be useful in any high-risk situations which will aid Male Shepard in LE1. Replaces Light Generic Armor(Phoenix,Colossus etc.)

DLC_MOD_INFINITEMAKOBOOST.moddesc: Quick and clean edit that makes the Mako's jump and boost infinite, allowing you to fly across maps. Optionally, there's a force duplicator to make this process quicker.

DLC_MOD_INTROWINDOW.moddesc: Removes reflections on window that Shepard looks out of during the opening cinematic.

DLC_MOD_JCKTLE1.moddesc: Casual outfit replacers for femshep in LE1.

DLC_MOD_KBASH.moddesc: Allows you to save the Hostages and Kill Balak at the end of Bring Down The Sky.

DLC_MOD_KEEPERSFINDERS.moddesc: Marks unscanned Keepers on the Citadel maps. Plus a new secret assignment on the Citadel.

DLC_MOD_LE1ALTERNATIVEBODIES.moddesc: Mesh edits to female default casuals, science outfit, and romance bodies.

DLC_MOD_LE1CACMUSICSWAP.moddesc: Swaps LE1 and LE3's character creation synth themes during Reconstruction.

DLC_MOD_LE1CP_LOC.moddesc: A simple, unopinionated, community bugfix mod for Mass Effect 1 Legendary Edition.

DLC_MOD_LE1DPSP.moddesc: Traducción al español del mod 'LE1 Diversification Project' adaptada al formato de texto de todas mis otras traducciones y mods.

DLC_MOD_LE3KAIDANARMOR.moddesc: Replace Kaidan's armor with any of his armors from LE3.

DLC_MOD_LIARA_CONSISTENCY_MOD_LE2.moddesc: Makes Liara's facial appearance fully consistent within Mass Effect, by either choosing her Lair of the Shadow Broker look from Mass Effect 2, or her Mass Effect 3 appearance. It includes her romance body as well. No further changes are included in her.

DLC_MOD_LIARA_CONSISTENCY_MOD_LE3.moddesc: Makes Liara's facial appearance fully consistent within Mass Effect, by either choosing her Lair of the Shadow Broker look from Mass Effect 2, or her Mass Effect 3 appearance. It includes her romance body as well. No further changes are included in her.

DLC_MOD_LIA_BRTH.moddesc: A random collection of mods (and ports) I made for myself and decided to share.

DLC_MOD_LINSDFR1.moddesc: There are many Shepards, but this one is mine. And she could be yours! This is a totally custom default head replacer, which means she works out of the box, no save editing required.

DLC_MOD_MALESHEPARDTURTLENECKSLE1.moddesc: Replaces the default fatigues in LE1 with a turtleneck option for Male Shepard.

DLC_MOD_MIXH.moddesc:
Miranda mixtures are now available as DLC.

New NPC mixtures DLC is now available for all 3 games.
Miranda mixture weighting issues should be fixed. See IMPORTANT NOTE in description for more details.

DLC_MOD_MORNINGMALESHEPHAIRPT4.moddesc: New Hairstyles for Maleshep by JohnnySimmer and WistfulCastle.

DLC_MOD_MORNINGSHAIRSTYLESFEMSHEP.moddesc: Bunch of Hairstyles by Anto and SonyaSimsCC for FemShep in LE1

DLC_MOD_MORNINGSHAIRSTYLESFEMSHEPPT2.moddesc: Bunch of Hairstyles by AHarris00Britney, Okruee, RavenSim, SheaButtyr, Oakiyo, Simandy, Kamiiri, Wild Pixels, and AladdintheSimmer for FemShep in LE1.

DLC_MOD_MORNINGSHAIRSTYLESFORFEMSHEPPT3.moddesc: Bunch of new hairstyles by SimsTrouble and Luutzi for femshep LE1.

DLC_MOD_MORNINGSHORTERFEMSHEP.moddesc: Shorter hairstyles for femshep using ccs from JohnnySimmer, DaylifeSims, and Simandy.

DLC_MOD_MORNINGSMALESHEPHAIRSPT3.moddesc: New hairstyles for Maleshep by Simstrouble and Luutzi LE1.

New Hairstyles for MShep - MELE1 is a conversion, for the Legendary Edition, of some girlplaysgame hair mods (https://girlplaysgame.com/mods/hair/).
This mod only includes male hairstyles.

DLC_MOD_NORTRANSMISSIONS.moddesc: Cinematic overhaul for the Normandy transmissions, so that NPCs such as Admiral Hackett appear as holograms in the comm room.

DLC_MOD_NOSKILLCHECKREQUIRED.modname: No Skill Check Required for Loot (LE1)
DLC_MOD_NOSKILLCHECKREQUIRED.moddesc: Automatically pass the Decryption and Electronic skill check for opening loot for all characters. Enabling you to take any squadmates with you without worrying about opening loot boxes.

DLC_MOD_NO_BUBBLE.moddesc: This mod allows you to select the renegade dialogue option in response to the asari consort's gift of words without the bubble sex scene that follows.

DLC_MOD_OMNIKEY.moddesc: Adds Use, Cover/Roll and Sprint as separate entries in the Key Bindings Menu for Legendary Edition.

DLC_MOD_ONYX.moddesc: Gives Shepard the N7 Onyx appearance, no matter what armor s/he is wearing. Similar options are given for each squadmate individually.

DLC_MOD_OPAQUEVISORS.moddesc: This mod makes Shepard default and Eligible squadmates' helmet visors non seethrough.

DLC_MOD_PADME.moddesc: Play as Padme Amidala. You can select different outfits as armors and casuals, from all episodes, including the clone wars.

DLC_MOD_PADMEFEMSHEP.moddesc: This mod replaces default femshep's headmorph with PadmÃ© Amidala's from Force Arena game.

DLC_MOD_PADME_AMIDALA.moddesc: This mod changes the default femshep headmorph's with hantzgruber's model of Padmé Amidala.

DLC_MOD_PADME_WHITE_OUTFIT.modname: Padme Amidala White Outfit for LE1
DLC_MOD_PADME_WHITE_OUTFIT.moddesc: This mod replaces the Onyx Heavy Armor for Femshep with Padme Amidala's White Outfit from Fortnite. Use this mod with Iconic Fashion Party mod.

DLC_MOD_PARAGADEPERSUASION.moddesc: Changes the way Charm and Intimidate options are unlocked by using Shepard's total combined amount of Charm and Intimidate points (ME1) or Paragon and Renegade points (ME2) for all persuasion checks.

DLC_MOD_PERSISTENTMODSETTINGS.moddesc: Allows you to change settings in-game that persist across saves. Currently only for adjusting the FOV of the camera.

DLC_MOD_PISTOLS_FOR_COMBAT_CUTSCENES.moddesc: Pistols are used for scenes that has them use weapons they are not trained in.

DLC_MOD_PISTOLS_REMADE_LE1.moddesc: Pistols resized to be smaller and SMGs altered to look like and be held like a rifle.

DLC_MOD_PRIVATETERMINAL.moddesc: Adds a private message terminal in the control center of the Normandy, and serves as a Framework for any mod author to add emails or other messages into the game.

DLC_MOD_PROTHEANCONSISTENCY.moddesc: Changes the appearance of Vigil to that of an actual Prothean to match their updated appearance in ME3.

DLC_MOD_PUNCHCHARLES.moddesc: Now you can punch Charles Saracino!

DLC_MOD_PUT_YOUR_GUNS_DOWN.moddesc: Makes Shepard and Kaidan holster the Assault Rifle when they speak to Ashley for the first time.

DLC_MOD_REALINFINITESPRINT.moddesc: Enables actual infinite sprint - you can run for hours!

DLC_MOD_RECKONERKNIGHTARMORMALESHEPARDLE.modname: Reckoner Knight Armor For Male Shepard LE1
DLC_MOD_RECKONERKNIGHTARMORMALESHEPARDLE.moddesc: Commander Shepard's unique armor for Kingdoms of Amalur Reckoning can now be used in LE1 for males!

DLC_MOD_REMIXED_NORMANDY_SR1_THEME.moddesc: Pretty much just fuses the normal theme in Mass Effect 1 and Mass Effect 2's Prologue Theme of The Normandy SR1.

DLC_MOD_REPLENISHGRENADES.moddesc: Replenish your stock of grenades from the Normandy in Mass Effect 1 LE.

DLC_MOD_RESPECCONSOLE.moddesc: Adds a terminal that allows spent talents to be reset.

DLC_MOD_RETURNTONOR.moddesc: Makes the return to normandy button useable while inside of UNC structures.

DLC_MOD_SALEONSCENE.moddesc: Adds new camera angles, animations, and more to the saleon cutscene with Garrus in Mass Effect 1.

DLC_MOD_SAMEGENDER.moddesc: This mod allows Ashley and Kaidan to be romanced by both male and female Shepard, utilizing unused dialogue in the game files.

DLC_MOD_SARENBIOTIC.moddesc: This mod fixes the bugged biotic vfx for Saren during his arrival to Virmire.

DLC_MOD_SARENBOSSEDIT.moddesc: Alters the encounters with Saren in Legendary Edition Mass Effect 1, with enhanced or classic versions of those boss encounters.

DLC_MOD_SAREN_STAGES.moddesc: This mod aims to both resolve and add to Saren's transformation throughout the game using hand created new meshes and HD textures. It introduces early forms of Saren before his heavy Geth implants. These looks should be less conspicuous and should help explain why the council could see him and still trust him.

DLC_MOD_SHEPARDHEAVYONYXUPGRADE.modname: Shepard Heavy Onyx Stats Upgrade and Representation Consistency
DLC_MOD_SHEPARDHEAVYONYXUPGRADE.moddesc: Well what about Shepard?...It only made sense that The Commander got some love too. This mod basically gives Shepard's Heavy Onyx armor the respect it deserves.Perfect for Heavy Onyx enjoyers/users.

DLC_MOD_SHUT_AVINA.moddesc: A random collection of mods (and ports) I made for myself and decided to share.

DLC_MOD_SKEPTICALSHEPARD.moddesc: Allows the player to be skeptical of the Reapers in the beginning of the game and opt out of the mind-melding scenes with Liara.

DLC_MOD_SMALLERGAMEPADDEADZONE.moddesc: This mod reduces the gamepad "look" stick's deadzone size, greatly improving sniper rifle fine aim control.

DLC_MOD_SMOOTHERGUI_LE1.moddesc: This mod increases the fps in the menus and other GUI animations from LE1.

DLC_MOD_SPECTREGAMEPLAYREWORK.moddesc: A modular general gameplay rework with features like: A weapon accuracy behavior overhaul, mobility improvements, difficulty rebalance options, various quality of life tweaks, new custom keybinds and more. Some features come with multiple options to choose from on install. Major update for ME3Tweaks. See description for more details.

DLC_MOD_SQUADDIALOGUE.moddesc: Re-enables squad dialogue on Asteroid X57 that was originally removed due to VO issues.

DLC_MOD_SSVNORMANDY.moddesc: Changes the decal on the Normandy to be SSV instead of SR1.

DLC_MOD_STORMIMPROVEMENTS.moddesc: Improvements to storming/sprinting in LE1. Tap a button to sprint instead of holding, sprint in any direction independent of the camera, control the camera while sprinting with a controller, turn faster and generally be more agile while sprinting.

DLC_MOD_SUBTLE_FACES_LE1.moddesc:
More visible and detailed face for Tali'Zorah.
New textures and fully animated face mesh.

DLC_MOD_SUPERGUN.moddesc: Fixes the "GiveSuperGun" console command weapon to actually be a super gun.

DLC_MOD_TALICONSISTENCYMOD.moddesc: Transforms everyone's favorite quarian squadmate into her appearance from ME2 and ME3. Featuring an alternate Tali texture by MaryseDynasty as seen in the ALOT texture collections for ME2 and ME3. Now includes compatibility for Alliance Uniform Consistency and Liara Consistency Project.

DLC_MOD_TALIOVERHAUL.moddesc: Overhaul of Tali's LE1 appearance with a completely new, fully animated face.

DLC_MOD_TALITRANSPARENTVISOR.moddesc: Makes Tali's face visible through her visor. New, hand-painted texture and a higher quality face mesh. For LE1.

DLC_MOD_TERMINUSARMORMALESHEPARDLE1.modname: Terminus Armor For Male Shepard LE1
DLC_MOD_TERMINUSARMORMALESHEPARDLE1.moddesc: Terminus armor is environmentally sealed with an independent air supply for use in space and extreme planetary conditions and will aid Male Shepard through space in LE1

DLC_MOD_TLI_LE1.modname: Tali's LE1 Outfits for Tali Overhaul HD
DLC_MOD_TLI_LE1.moddesc: A random collection of mods (and ports) I made for myself and decided to share.

DLC_MOD_UKSPELLINGLE1.moddesc:
UK english subtitle translation for Mass Effect 1 Legendary Edition!
EN-GB British spelling.
This mod changes base game plus Pinnacle Station subtitles.
Useful for ROI/AUS/NZ and anywhere else that uses similar!

DLC_MOD_UNCREQUIREMENTS.moddesc: Removes the morality requirements for the assignments "UNC:Besieiged Base" and "UNC:The Negotiation" and replaces them with level requirements.

DLC_MOD_UNIQUEMOONS.moddesc: Adds unique moon textures to Altahe, Amaranthine, Binthu, Chohe, Eletania, Klensal, Nepheron, and Trebin.

DLC_MOD_UNUSEDSARENVIRMIRE.moddesc: Plays a section of Saren's theme on that was unused on Virmire

DLC_MOD_UWDLC.moddesc:
The ALOV (a lot of videos) mod is an exhaustive and comprehensive 4K 60fps video overhaul and upscale of all Mass Effect cutscenes, and misc improvements.

This mod is a total conversion of ALOV to a 21:9 aspect ratio - rescaling and reframing over 550 videos for a fully immersive, full-screen experience on ultra-wide monitors

DLC_MOD_VAMPLE1.moddesc: A project to model the characters after their actual voice actors.

DLC_MOD_VANILLAHAIRTWEAKS.moddesc: A port of ELE08's Vanilla Hair Tweaks for LE1.

DLC_MOD_VEGAS.moddesc: Test the limits of your combat prowess aboard a remote, top-secret Alliance space station. Enhanced port of the original Mass Effect DLC, which was not included in Legendary Edition due to lost source code.

DLC_MOD_VIKING_INSPIRED_BRAID.moddesc: This mod is the first hair I ever made by myself. It was requested by a friend. For Femshep and Broshep

DLC_MOD_VIRMIRESAVIOR.moddesc: Ever wanted to save both squadmates on virmire?

DLC_MOD_VISORCLIPPINGFIX.moddesc: Fixes the clipping between Male Shepard's visor and breather.

DLC_MOD_VISOR_TURIAN.moddesc: A random collection of mods (and ports) I made for myself and decided to share.

DLC_MOD_WARDSSKYBOX.moddesc: Retexture for the LE1 Wards Skybox to resemble the aesthetic of the original.

DLC_MOD_WEAPONLOADOUTS.moddesc: Reduces the weapons each character has equipped on their person to the weapons they are proficient in using, similar to how weapon loadouts in LE2 and LE3 work. Squadmate weapon loadouts are restricted. Shepard can equip any weapon but will start the game only with the weapons corresponding to their talent tree.

DLC_MOD_XPRESCALE.moddesc: Gradually increases the XP rewards (from kills, missions, etc) while leveling up, so that max level can be reached in a single playthrough.

DLC_MOD_YOUNG_MALE.moddesc: A DLC retexture of maleShep to make his appearance more lore accurate to his in-game age.
